Remember the old rotary telephone. With that kind of polymer that was indestructible....it's like that.
It's called Bakelite....... I believe .......
The metal build is done well. Nice and solid..
Had no problem getting it running.....Cut you wicks to size. Insert into the 4 reservoirs fill with alcohol...
Light wait about 30 sec to a min.....one turn.....and off it goes......used 91% alcohol worked fine....
Also well packaged used two boxes one inside the other.....
Very happy with purchase...........

％商品名: Testors Promotional Enamel Paint Set
タイトル: Great Value Do All Enamel Kit! Love Testors Paints!!!
レビュー内容:
This is a Great Value! There is no way you will find a better price on this many colors, a free brush and tray anywhere...even locally at craft/hobbie stores. In fact, those prices are nearly double in some circumstances. I bought this for some odd projects like highlighting gun sights and the punch marks in my wrenches so that I can see the tool size easily from a distance or in bad light situations.

I have used these ENAMEL PAINTS since I think I was 8 years old and I am now in my mid 30s and they are still the go to choice for me for when I need durability and a quality job that I dont want to redo for a long long time. This is a quality set and you get a ton of colors and enough colors to make your own custom colors by mixing colors in the kit. Google it to find out what red and yellow make! lol

Anyway, great kit, great contents, great longevity and theres not much more to say. If you need a durable finish or want to paint something that wont rub off easily then these are for you. I love enamel....acrylic...ick!!!

％商品名: Testors Promotional Enamel Paint Set
タイトル: Best of all it had no affect on the curing ...
レビュー内容: This is the classic Testors enamel we all used for model building as kids. However I bought it for a different purpose this time. I quit building models decades ago but now build custom fishing rods. I was looking for an economical was to add pigments to my epoxy in place of expensive marbling pigments. These enamels mixed with my epoxy and created exactly the effects I was seeking. Best of all it had no affect on the curing of the epoxy.

％商品名: Testors Promotional Enamel Paint Set
レビュー内容:
It's been years since I painted model planes, but Testors is still the oil-based enamel paint to use. I bought this promotional set to paint small hockey game players. The paint is outstanding. Instead of using the enclosed solvent, I use my own paint solvent from the garage and pour some into a glass holder (like the ones used in restaurants to hold au jus or horseradish for your prime rib) The paint brushes on very nicely and smoothly, but because solvent evaporates very quickly from the paint brushes and on the model, try to paint your model just once and don't repeatedly go over the same area because you will lift the paint. Wait until the paint is dry before brushing it over. This is especially true if you want to cover up so boo boos. If you paint over another area before it is dry and set, the solvent in the fresh paint will lift the original paint off causing it to mix it in with your fresh paint, and voila, you just created a new paint color. If you make any painting mistakes, don't worry, solvent comes to the rescue. The paint will cover other colors usually in one stroke. Changed some color areas may require two separate coats. Be sure to stir up the paint with a toothpick before using. The gold and silver paints have to be stir frequently because the metallic flakes separates rather quickly. But once stirred, the metallic paint paints on evenly and looks very nice. I used only 1/3 or less of the paint in each bottle, so there are enough paint to paint several small model planes.

Although I wore nitril gloves will painting, if you get paint of your fingers and hand, take a clean brush and dab it in some clean solvent (of dirty solvent) and brush it on your fingers and immediately wipe it off with a paper towel. This will also work easily on dried paint. Wash your hands with soap and water and you ready to go out dancing

％商品名: Desktop Wooden Model Kit Modern House
レビュー内容:
After purchasing the trebuchet kit for my wife, I felt compelled to get the Garden House A kit. While it may be for ages 12+, it was still something of a challenge for me as an adult. But not in a bad way.

First, the construction. I never once felt frustrated with the parts. There are some parts in this kit, such as the window frames and deck rails, which are very delicate and should be removed carefully. Fortunately they are laser cut so fine that there's only a few small points where they're joined to their sprue boards.

Some parts had extremely tight tolerances with their slotting (such as the chimney), but a couple of light passes with an emery board solved that problem. In fact, the tolerances were so good that for the majority of this model you don't need any of the supplied glue. The only places I would recommend glue would be the windows, stairs, deck supports (on the front under the deck), and the back door steps just to be sure. Everything else goes together tight enough that tension is all you need.

There were moments during the build that I thought it would come right apart in my hands, but it never did. Once you have the walls and floor together, it stands up nicely and you can immediately see the strength.

The instructions, while in both Korean and English, use written language sparingly. In fact, the majority of the instructions are all visual, using a pretty standard series that repeats: Find parts to use, assemble the first half, assemble the second half. When recommended, gluing is labeled on that step.

The only tools I recommend you have on hand for this are some fine-point tweezers (some parts are very small), an emery board, and possibly an Xacto knife. The knife is optional but may come in handy for some pieces that are stubborn to get off the board.

And if you're feeling adventurous, there is a hole in the bottom of the model for you to wire up LEDs. The one problem I ran into with this is that the plastic for the windows is tinted orange and is dark enough to knock down a 2x2 array of off-the-shelf LEDs to near nothing. So you might want to consider putting something with a little more punch inside if you're going to light it.

If you're looking for a nice challenge that will keep you busy for a couple of hours, then you could worse than try this model.

％商品名: Desktop Wooden Model Kit Modern House
レビュー内容: This model is the first kit I've ever assembled, and it's a lot of fun to build. Complicated enough to keep things interesting without major frustration. When I saw how many pieces the house came with, I was immediately nervous...but the instructions were great! There aren't many worded steps, but the pictures were clear and detailed enough that I had no deciphering issues. Plenty of adhesive included; I had about 1/3 of a tube left. I worked on it for about 4 days--a few hours each day, including time for the adhesive to dry. The model is beautiful when finished and definitely worth displaying. Right after completing this project, I bought two more house model kits from this company. I highly recommend this kit!

％商品名: Desktop Wooden Model Kit Modern House
レビュー内容: What fun this was to build! Comes with lots of pictures in the instructions, but very little English text. Pay attention and look a few steps ahead and you'll have a good time with it. Also, get some glue on the side. The glue that comes with is it is not great. Some regular school glue works fine. It functions too!

％商品名: Desktop Wooden Model Kit Modern House
レビュー内容: This kit was amazing and super detailed, had a blast putting it together. An an xacto knife, glue and a pair of pliers (for securing the metal rings) is all that was needed. The pieces were cut by laser and fit together very well, almost snapping into place (glue still needed). The instructions are easy to follow even if they only consist of pictures. As will all models, look through the instructions first and fit the pieces before you glue them so you don't end up in a panic mode. Very sturdy and detailed kit.

％商品名: Academy da Vinci Clock
レビュー内容: After seeing this sitting on the table not working despite hours spent by my husband and son reading and assembling the clock according to the directions, which were worse than some huge Ikea piece, I was ready to return it. However, after examining it myself I decided to give it a try. Having thrown out the directions I went in blind, just using the movements, gears, and weights as my guide. And guess what? I did it! However I gave it 4 stars as the directions are incorrect with respect to the placement of basically every moving part. If you take the time to fit it together and test the gears to see if the turn, especially for the escapement piece which actually has different sized spokes that need to be fitted to ensure the top ticks and the entire piece works. A must have for anyone who loves clocks and wants to actually build the mechanisms from scratch! It is so worth it! I've attached a picture of mine and am in love with it. Although it only works for a short time due to the length of the weight, I see this more as a working model than a clock. However, if you can figure it out you can make your own clock which I plan on doing as soon as I can settle on choosing a regulator pendulum wall piece for my office. Enjoy!

％商品名: Academy da Vinci Clock
タイトル: ... with the other review that this clock is not useful for telling time but
レビュー内容: I agree with the other review that this clock is not useful for telling time but...my 11 year old son built this with no tools and it was a great lesson that not everything needs batteries. We carefully popped out each piece and nothing broke. I was very surprised -- it is well made. It took about 2 hours for my son to build. GREAT learning experience for him and very fun for me to listen to him explain how it all works. Very cool project!

％商品名: Academy da Vinci Clock
タイトル: its a TIMER. not a clock. but still fun!
レビュー内容:
yes, this is plastic. not wood. a wood model of this sort would cost MUCH more actually.

still. its a neet looking timer. notice i said TIMER. this is not a 'clock' as such. the description from the seller doesnt make this very clear and i my self thought it was a true clock. bummed out for a bit but what the heck, for $15 it seemed okay so the bummed feeling faded.

ive seen many reviews about how the instructions were in JAPANESE and they couldnt read them an it was impossible to assemble. my kit came with instructions in both japanese AND english and it took me about an hour to finish it and do the first test run. even if only japanese language was used, the pictures are clear and concise and there are only like 30 parts to the kit. so i dont understand all the difficulty.

now as to the actual working part of this kit.

as i said, its a primitive timer. upper face minutes, lower face seconds. load the little weight basket with coins or whatever (i used washers) and wind it up while holding the pendulum on top then let let it go. the weight drops, which drives the gears, which move the hands of the two faces.

you can use different amount of weight along with the adjustable pendulum to vary the speed at which it ticks (tho only slightly)

the 'counter weight' on the model (right side teardrop shape) is 'for show' only and serves no actual purpose so i left it off my finished model.

after much playing around with it i find that with the 'tabletop' stand, it will run for about 8 mins before the weight hits the table and thus, it stops.

i currently have it hung on my wall to give the weight rope more room to drop and it runs for almost 15 mins till it reaches the end. it does seem to run a little fast but still accurate enough to time simple cooking :)

i intend to modify it a bit with a longer rope, re-attach the counter weight pulley and re-thread the whole thing with ACTUAL counter weights (more washers) to give it longer run times.

this was a lot of fun and easy to assemble. works great (ish) and looks really cool. a little simple paint on the faces and a couple of 'washes' to age it a bit (see my pic) and you got nifty item sure to draw attention.

％商品名: Academy da Vinci Clock
レビュー内容:
This is a great value escapement / clock model. The pieces are substantial and easy to separate from the sprue. The instructions were clear, if a bit detailed. Assembly is more fussy than difficult, as close attention must be paid to the orientation of parts. Don't mix up axles; a ruler can be handy for identifying which is which as they are identified by shape (round or hexagonal) and length in the instructions. Also, make sure that your string is facing the right direction before completing assembly.

Once assembled, you'll be expected to provide your own weights. The weight carrier looks like it's set up for about $2 worth of quarters, but washers ought to work just as well. The black teardrop weight pictured on the right is ornamental.

The ticking action is soothing and this seems like it will make a great desk toy.

％商品名: Academy da Vinci Clock
タイトル: Really fun model that is super educational.
レビュー内容: This was a really fun clock to put together. It is definitely only for demonstration purposes and is not an actual clock that you can count on (unless you want to get really accurate with the weights and wind it every three minutes or so). If you have a da Vinci style room somewhere in your house (like I do) then this will fit in really well. It is also fun to build with your kids to show them how gears work. I built this with my 8, 10, and 12 year olds and they all enjoyed it.

タイトル: I would definitely recommend this product to anyone who asked
レビュー内容: I wasn't sure what to expect with this purchase. Frankly I just thought it was a model. I was pleasantly surprised to find out it actually runs. The item itself is a heavy plastic but the design is marvelous. I would definitely recommend this product to anyone who asked.

％商品名: Academy da Vinci Clock
タイトル: Functional mechanical model that is very easy to assemble.
レビュー内容: Very easy to assembly and it works without frustration, but it runs for only 4 minutes at a time. 4 stars because the short run time is not disclosed in the description but this is a decent mechanical model. The instructions and box were in Korean but you can down load English instructions from the academy web site. The instructions are nicely illustrated and all parts are easily identifiable. I assembled this kit with a 14 year old in 1 to 2 hours. The kit contains parts to make either table top or wall mounted versions, the clock can be configured for either 4 or 60 minute indication.. Do not bother making the 60 minute version, there is only a short length of cord to allow the clock to operate for about 4 minutes. If you want longer operation of about 30 minutes then wall mount it and use a longer string for the weight.

％商品名: Revell 1:48 P - 51D Mustang
レビュー内容: This is another great model from Revell. The kit comes with a easy to read but very detailed instruction sheet that includes photographs of the real plane for reference as well as suggested readings. The kit itself is very straightforward to build. The details are very good and you have optional materials to put on the plane such as external fuel tanks and machine guns. It took me a few evenings to build it. I recommend this kit to everyone.

％商品名: Revell 1:48 P - 51D Mustang
レビュー内容: This was my first aircraft model build. Went together pretty well although it took a good bit of sanding/filling to get a smooth seem. Not a ton of fine detail, which is good for beginners because there isn't an overwhelming amount of parts. Decals are great; I was impressed with the number of them and things like the pilots name on the canopy. Keep in mind the checkered decals require care and patience. I used water only, however, decal solution may help you. I have never used it so I can't say. I did not try to weather it since it was my first try aside from some wear in the cockpit. I think it turned out well. Overall a good first build.

％商品名: Revell 1:48 P - 51D Mustang
タイトル: Built this as a confidacne booster - it was a great choice!
レビュー内容:
I chose this model because I needed a confidence booster after I built the German Focke Wulf (Revell Focke Wulf FW 200 C-5/ C-8 Condor).

The P-51, to me, is a classic US war plane. Second only to the F-4 gull-wing Corsair from WWII (which I also built, see photo). The Corsair was the first model I built since my pre-teen years, and that was quite a long time ago.

Back to the P-51 ... I had a lot of fun with this build. Not too many parts so I really tried to focus on taking my time. As with all the models I am building, I try to keep close to the recommended paint scheme but using what paint I have on hand. The pilot can come out and the canopy do open and close, and the prop turns. There were decals for two or three set ups, I sort of combined all of them.

I think that an intermediate would have no trouble with this - easy build but lots of fun.

％商品名: Revell 1:48 P - 51D Mustang
タイトル: It was an easy kit to assemble with the exception of the checkerboard ...
レビュー内容:
I built this Mustang for my Buddy Parker, He wanted it built in the flying configuration hence no landing gear.
It was an easy kit to assemble with the exception of the checkerboard decals. read the instructions carefully
as you have to notch two of them or they won't conform to the nose/engine area. The canopy slides open & closed
and the pilot is very detailed. I have built 4 of these now and enjoyed every one of them.

％商品名: Revell 1:48 P - 51D Mustang
タイトル: ... project really cheered him up they said it's their favorite gift so far
レビュー内容: My nephew got sick and this little project really cheered him up they said it's their favorite gift so far!! Yey!

％商品名: Revell 1:48 P - 51D Mustang
レビュー内容: Fast shipping and was just as expected

％商品名: Revell 1:48 P - 51D Mustang
レビュー内容: beautiful

％商品名: Revell 1:48 P - 51D Mustang
レビュー内容: I know this Revell 51D Mustang model is a "toy" but I bought it for my 55 year old Dad. He's retired and I wanted to give him a new hobby. He loved reading about the plane's history and working on the plane. It filled up a weekend for him, all the parts fit together nicely (after he filed down the edges) and between the gluing and the painting (he did his own custom paint job), it provided him with hours of enjoyment. Now his friends want to get in on the action too. I'd recommend this for any young person or those young at heart that want to flex their building muscles and learn a little bit about our history. Also the model is historically accurate and to scale and looks great (not cheap) once completed/painted. Would make for a nice display once you've done a few of them.

％商品名: Revell 1:48 P - 51D Mustang
レビュー内容:
This was a nice build. Although I am not a pro, much more towards the beginner side. The main things for me is relative good fit and I like to build models wheels up. This model fits together well. If, you are willing to sand off any little bits you make stick out when taking the pieces off the panels, and fit the pieces together properly. The only tight spot was connecting the wings to the fuselage. I was a hair off on the top/bottom wing and let it dry.... I would advise doing that all while the glue is still a bit wet. It did still fit together however it was just more of a snap into place. The reason I only gave four stars would be the decals. If you want to do the big beautiful doll version (there are two options) for an experienced modeler it probably would be fine, it was a challenge for me but isn't that the point?

Pros
-good fit
-two options
-beginner friendly
-wheels up friendly

Cons
-decal option challenging (big beautiful doll)

％商品名: Revell 1:48 P - 51D Mustang
タイトル: A good solid kit, for all levels of experience.
レビュー内容:
I have fond memories of this old kit. Dates from the 1960's, and I built my first one as a kid in late '60s. I have done at least four of them over the years, in different color and decal schemes. They change the decals every reissue. Originally a Monogram kit, before they merged with Revell (no close relation to my family, sadly).
Details are good for it's vintage, and it is unfair to compare it to more modern kits from Tamiya, IPM, etc. It is simple enough for less experienced modelers, a bit of a challenge for beginners, but still good enough for experienced modelers (with room for extra detailing).
This issue is molded in light gray plastic, rather than the silver plastic of years back. Only a couple tiny bits of flash seen on unboxing. Decals are for two different aircraft.
Overall, a good solid kit with long legs.

％商品名: Revell 1:48 P - 51D Mustang
タイトル: A very simple and easy model to build
レビュー内容:
A very simple and easy model to build, but with some fitting issues and way too much excess plastic to have to trim off.
Next Mustang I build will be a Tamiya or something with better quality parts.

％商品名: Revell 1:48 P - 51D Mustang
タイトル: very nice Revell Moel. i recommend it highly!
レビュー内容: Nice Revell model. Only wished it came in the metal coloring instead of the gray color. i had to paint it three times to get the color right. i guess using testor paints has its draw backs. but that is another story. also wish it came with some additional and different numbering. i am building a flying scene in my basement with a few of these p-51d, a few mf 190's and a few b17g's so different numbering would be great. but if that is all i can complain about then that says a lot about this model. two thumbs up.

％商品名: Revell 1:48 P - 51D Mustang
タイトル: Keeps one occupied for some time..
レビュー内容:
.. for mostly the wrong reasons though. I understand that filing and smoothing defects with putty is a time-honored model building tradition. I also realize that it might be the most engaging part of the pursuit.

However, it is just a bit irritating to work with this model. You cannot help but compare the quality of the moulding to the quality that one sees in modern plastic components and products. Though in a minority, I would welcome an improvement in the fit and finish of this product.

％商品名: Revell 1:48 P - 51D Mustang
レビュー内容: Item is as described. Pretty much the baseline infamous model kit. Thousands of build videos out there and examples of this unit. Possibilities are endless. Great starter kit for the price. Or fun kit to test out new techniques or colours.

％商品名: Revell 1:48 P - 51D Mustang
レビュー内容: It's alright. Somewhat decent fit. I had a massive gap down the middle on the top and bottom, no big deal. I hope you're terrifically skilled at decals if you plan to do the checkerboard pattern on the nose. I ended up throwing the model away after the flimsy decals failed miserably.

％商品名: Revell 1:48 P - 51D Mustang
タイトル: Very nice model of the iconic Mustang
レビュー内容:
Very nice model of the iconic Mustang. Kit comes with two options for decals, so you can choose. I thought that was kind of nice. However, the one with the checkerboard around the cowling is a little difficult, but looks cool. They did not include the red stripes that you see from the engine cowling to the cockpit (bordering the green drab paint). I had to make them from the slightly curved lines from the other design (cutting them in half lengthwise, too, to get the right thickness). Very pleased with the end product though.

One thing to note, there really isn't an option of putting it together without the landing gear , if you want it to hang it up as in a combat flight. This is because the tail gear doors is permanently molded open. I suppose you could cut them off and then re-glue them in the closed position. Overall, a very nice model. It was a nice project for my 12 year old son and me to do over Christmas break.

％商品名: Revell 1:48 P - 51D Mustang
レビュー内容: I really liked putting this together. parts fit well. The only problem was with the landing gear. It really needs more support, it bends too easy even after assembly. I realize you have to keep this authentic. a little help at this area would be great.

％商品名: Revell 1:48 P - 51D Mustang
レビュー内容: This kit went together well. There was some fit issues where the wings met the fuselage. It's a very simple kit with not a lot of detail. It did not require a lot of skill to build. Lots of decals were included. An easy build with good results.

％商品名: Revell 1:48 P - 51D Mustang
タイトル: For a Long Time Giving Gift
レビュー内容: Fun to build , requires time and dedication. Get it and enjoy yourself with a timepiece! The P-51 Mustang was indeed a different breed of airplane. It was fast, for one thing; as it red-lined at 505 and, though it was no Spitfire, its turning ability wasn't bad at all - especially if you sneaked down 10 degrees of flaps. It was pretty good in the climbing department too, and accelerated very fast in a dive. But the thing that really set the Mustang apart from any other fighter, friend or foe, was its range. With a 75-gallon tank slung under each wing, it could perform the unheard-of: It could fly six-hour missions. Physically, it was pleasing to the eye and looked fast, even sitting on the ground. Power was provided by a V-1650 Rolls-Royce Merlin engine built under license in the States by Packard, the luxury automobile company. The V-1650 was a fine engine and could be taken up to 61 inches of manifold pressure at 3,000 RPM for take-off or, if needed in combat, 67 inches for up to five minutes in Emergency Power. Normally aspirated engines tended to run out of power as altitude increased, usually between 15,000 and 20,000 feet. The P-51 had a two-stage blower in the induction system that was controlled automatically with a barometric switch. Around 17,000 feet, when the throttle had been advanced almost all the way forward just to maintain normal cruise, the blower would kick into high, the manifold pressure would jump up, and the climb could be continued to 30,000 feet. The P-51 could be taken a lot higher than that, but above 30,000 feet the power was way down and the controls had to be handled gingerly. So get this piece for the enthusiast. Because in the maturing world during times of war, this machine lead history to be written in the books. Thank you Revell for keeping our ideas alive..

％商品名: Revell 1:48 P - 51D Mustang
レビュー内容:
I was looking for something to occupy their time. I wanted to put their hands to work
besides playing video games. This was a hit. They now want more. They were very
proud of what they did and couldn't wait to show everyone.

％商品名: Fascinations Metal Earth Apollo Lunar Module 3D Metal Model Kit
レビュー内容:
Very excited!!

Took it out of the envelope and the first thing that struck me was how heavy it was. I'm used to dealing with photo-etched bits, which are much finer and lighter. I realize these aren't the same thing, but it still (pleasantly) surprised me.

There is no "flap" on the package to open so just rip off the top. Inside you will find the separate sheets of parts, two in the case of this model. Also a double sided folded sheet of paper that are the instructions. The instructions seem deceptively simple. The individual parts of the model are not labeled on the metal sheets, only on the instruction sheet. Do carefully go over the instructions before you start fiddling with the pieces.

The instructions don't tell you how to remove the pieces off the sheets, which seems a terribly odd omission. The back of the package does state "Parts can be easily removed from the metal sheets using a pair clippers ..." though it fails to mention what kind. I use the Xuron 410 Micro-Shear Flush Cutter. Works great. The package does go on to say that tweezers are good for "bending and twisting the "connection tabs."

I'm not going to get into the details of building the kit, other than to say you should take your time and not be in a rush. There are a lot of videos on YouTube of people doing step-by-step construction, some with just the basics while others document the entire build of specific kits. You should heck them out.

Finally, enjoy putting together these little masterpieces!!

％商品名: Fascinations Metal Earth Apollo Lunar Module 3D Metal Model Kit
レビュー内容: If you think you're an expert model builder and an have an ego to match, get ready for a slice of humble pie! This kit is one of my all time favorites not because its a great build, but because I survived to conquer it! Many parts fit well, but when they don't fit well you are challenged with grappling and squeezing things together in such a way as to destroy the delicate delicacies experienced craftsmen drool over. As a result one is constantly bending and straightening, bending and straightening and breaking many of the same parts as fast as you can repair them. That's why I ordered another kit and after writing down sanity hints, I piece by piece grafted the second kit to the first kit thinking I was only going to replace a few parts. By the end of it all, all I had left over was what looked like a handful of blast debris, empty containers of several different glues and instant curing sprays, acetone, and four hundred used cotton swabs. After a month of building and destroying, ordering and waiting, grafting and repairing using my overly complete arsenal of photo etch kit tools I finally completed my master build. It was only after spraying the whole scuffed up project with "wet look" Testors High Gloss Clear Lacquer that my trophy looked gleaming bright just like it does in the promotional photos. I suggest the manufacturer make a larger scale kit with thicker pieces, maybe one that can be assembled using screws. (Did I really just say screws? OMG!) At least if the holes don't line up one can just drill a hole that does. I very painfully gave birth to this wonderful token of the Apollo moon space program and don't anybody dare touch it for I love this kit like it were my own child. Can we have a Command/Service Module kit too?

％商品名: Fascinations Metal Earth Apollo Lunar Module 3D Metal Model Kit
レビュー内容:
I've built several of these models and the Lunar Lander is pretty challenging. I had to spend a lot of time figuring out how to attach the small pieces without bending other pieces. Great fun. Does require patience though, can't be in a rush.

All of the Metal Earth models I've completed have been super-precise. Laser cut means no mistakes or missing pieces.

Tip: Super Glue Gel is your friend! Great for fixing that little oops.

％商品名: Fascinations Metal Earth Apollo Lunar Module 3D Metal Model Kit
タイトル: Very difficult to put together, took me about 3 ...
レビュー内容: Very difficult to put together, took me about 3 hours and 4 parts. Very stressful, but very rewarding when done.

％商品名: Fascinations Metal Earth Apollo Lunar Module 3D Metal Model Kit
レビュー内容: Pretty challenging. Definitely look ahead in the instructions to see what goes where. Otherwise you'll be bending things back and forth and they could get broken off. Also, as others have said, save the thrusters for last.

％商品名: Fascinations Metal Earth Apollo Lunar Module 3D Metal Model Kit
レビュー内容: I love the Apollo models.

％商品名: Fascinations Metal Earth Apollo Lunar Module 3D Metal Model Kit
レビュー内容: I would have given this 4 or 5 stars, even though the pieces were ridiculously small (as in, you almost need a magnifying glass), hard to free from the metal sheet, and instructions weren't very clear. Those things were annoying, but what earned this model the one star rating is that the pieces are too fragile to complete assembly. I took my time and was very cautious, but even still the first piece, the main body of the module, broke. The pieces will break if you bend or twist them too much. Overall just a poorly designed model. I wouldn't recommend it, even though it looks cool.

％商品名: Fascinations Metal Earth Apollo Lunar Module 3D Metal Model Kit
レビュー内容: hard to put together

％商品名: Fascinations Metal Earth Apollo Lunar Module 3D Metal Model Kit
レビュー内容: This is just Junk. Don't waste your money. It come on a flat square with out tools and by the time you are done separating the pieces, the whole thing is broken. Just just

％商品名: Fascinations Metal Earth Apollo Lunar Module 3D Metal Model Kit
タイトル: Metal Earth Lunar Module Model Kit
レビュー内容:
I received mine (The LM) from Amazon today. It's *not* packaged like some of the other Metal Earth/Works kits I've seen in retail outlets like Barnes and Nobel bookstores which are packaged in nice small white boxes.

This Lunar Module is in an odd scale, probably about 1/110 - 1/115 and stands about 2 1/2 inches tall when complete. It's a bit smaller in scale than any of the various Revell, Aoshima or Heller 1/96 - 1/100 LM plastic model kits. Completed, it will look exactly like the digital illustrations for the product. The Ascent and Descent stages are separate but designed to be permanently attached to each other. Obviously, there's some major details that aren't quite right (the windows are way too small, the thrusters too big, etc) and the fact it's a photoetch kit means some things like the tubes that comprise the landing gear are flat pieces that can't be rolled into proper tubes or cylinders but for the size and especially price, it's quite nice looking when completed.

The really good news is that it looks to be exactly the same scale as the rudimentary toy-like LM included in the (supposedly 1/100) 4D Puzzle cutaway Saturn V. With a little work and some scratch-(re)building some of the tiny fiddly details, adding gold foil to the Descent Stage and painting (I'd leave the Ascent Stage unpainted steel because it looks cool except the black patterns and some white antenna to paint), it would likely make a vastly superior replacement LM for the 4D display for a bargain price (about 13 bucks).

This kit's parts come on two small stainless steel metal sheets packaged in a slim paper package with two sheets of wordless instructions much like a small photoetch detail kit for trains or military model subjects. The kit requires above average skill with small, delicate photoetch/metal kits. Small needle nose pliers, a hard sharp hobby knife and some women's cuticle snips are the most important tools needed to cut the parts from the sheets and fold them. Assembly takes some patience and skill with tiny, delicate metal parts and it really helps if you are familiar with the subject beforehand. I would not recommend this kit for young kids and it is possible to cut your fingertips on small, sharp edges of some parts during assembly.

All parts are held together by very tiny tabs and you really need to think through the assembly beforehand or you will get stuck trying to bend a few tabs in areas not even small tweezers will get to. The wordless instructions are good for identifying parts but you have to guess at times how certain parts form into a complex shape. The hardest part is rolling the little thrusters into cones - basically I used tiny medical forceps and tediously wrapped and formed each thruster around a steel pen tip. I didn't do any part modifications aside from using thin rod for the main landing gear legs in the "folded" position as the photoetch leg parts are flat pieces and way to short (although my scratch built legs are too long, lol!).

My goal was to build it quickly, more as an experiment and an evening's fun than anything else. For my build up, I gold foiled the Descent Stage and painted the patterns on the Ascent Stage flat black with a brush as well as the two antenna dishes flat white. Because of the way the Descent Stage body goes together (top, left and right side of the body, two pieces for the bottom) I didn't even need glue to secure the foil to the parts, just bent the excess over backsides of the parts and putting the parts together holds the foil in place. I substituted thin brass rod for the main landing gear legs and bent the relevant parts to display the LM in it's pre-flight configuration to fit inside the 4D Fame Master Saturn V.

It's a fun little diversion and I'll buy a few more as I think some parts might be usable to accurize similar scale plastic LM kits.

％商品名: Fascinations Metal Earth Apollo Lunar Module 3D Metal Model Kit
タイトル: High quality materials. Clean cut pieces. Make sure ...
レビュー内容:
High quality materials. Clean cut pieces.
Make sure you have clippers and tiny tweezers before you start assembling.
The weakest parts are the thrusters. Do Not Follow the instructions and Leave them for last.
Once your done assembling the whole vehicle then install the thrusters.

％商品名: Fascinations Metal Earth Apollo Lunar Module 3D Metal Model Kit
レビュー内容: Extremely fragile. Or maybe my unit is defective. The tabs holding the component on the metal sheet are much stronger than the component and their 'bend junctions' itself. So do not try to 'pop it out' as they mention. Use shear cutters to do that. Do not drop the components. I dropped one of the small parts on a carpet floor and it broke apart from the bend junction. Some of the big parts are very fragile. Everything clips on to the big parts, so at least the big parts need to be sufficiently stronger. I bent a big component in a direction opposite to the designated one. I tried to bend it in the right direction and the whole thing came off. Now it maybe because my unit was defective or I just was careless. But I think that at the very least the big parts should be stronger. Things should not break from a 1 feet fall on a carpet floor. The way instructions are written, you are bound to break parts. Try reading everything first and come up with a sequence that enables building smaller components from tiny ones. Then clip on the smaller assembled components on to the main frame.

％商品名: Fascinations Metal Earth Apollo Lunar Module 3D Metal Model Kit
レビュー内容: I would give this zero stars if I could. I thought this is going to be a fun and interesting build that would be challenging but I would get through it in the end. I couldn't even get past step five before one of the hinge joints snapped on a right angle. You can't superglue things on a right angle there was no way it could have been fixed. While very cool looking, it is very cheaply made. UGH!!

％商品名: Fascinations Metal Earth Apollo Lunar Module 3D Metal Model Kit
レビュー内容: i love building things and fixing things but this was a pretty unenjoyable pain in the ass. the instructions are less clear than even ikea instructions and i broke at least three pieces in my first hour or two attempting to assemble this thing. because i don't completely hate myself, i called it on the whole endeavor and am giving the half completed lander with the remaining pieces. maybe someone else will want to assemble this. it was not remotely enjoyable OR easy.

％商品名: Fascinations Metal Earth Apollo Lunar Module 3D Metal Model Kit
タイトル: The first four steps of this model have you bending a large piece that easily breaks. There are ways they could have improved ..
レビュー内容: I have built a few of these now and the models are really hit or miss. They need to put more thought into how the steps should progress and they need to make improvements to the cutting. All of the "difficult" models I get end up getting are such because they are poorly thought out. The first four steps of this model have you bending a large piece that easily breaks. There are ways they could have improved the instructions to reduce how many times you have to bend a piece and run the risk of it breaking.

％商品名: Fascinations Metal Earth Apollo Lunar Module 3D Metal Model Kit
レビュー内容:
Out of 8 models I've build this one is probably as hard if not harder than the Model T. The biggest problem with this is the order they have you install some of the items, the thrusters for one are so tiny and fragile - for them to have you install them right off the bat then have to work around building the rest of the structure without knocking these out was a challenge. There were many other components too that I ended up installing toward the end to avoid bending/braking. The biggest challenge though for this was it has you right away bend the shape of the major section, this wouldn't be a problem except in order to install the other panels you have to open this back up. I ended up opening and closing this so much that the panel actually snapped off, fortunately with all the tabs twisted in the end you could never tell this broke.

It is an amazing model and I highly recommend this to anyone with patience, I do stay study the instructions first and ask yourself - is this step adding a small prone piece, if so can it be added later, and before I bend this will this inhibit me from adding another part without having to reopen it. If you do decide to do this I would also highly recommend buying Xuron 450BN Bent Nose Plier, 5 Inch Long Reach Needle Nose Pliers Jeweler Hand Tool, and Hakko CHP-170 Micro Soft Wire Cutter, 1.5mm Stand-off, Flush Cut, 2.5mm Hardened Carbon Steel Construction, 21-Degree Angled Jaw, 8mm Jaw Length, 16 G. These tools made it that much easier to bend the tabs in the smallest places.

One more note on these is when bending a part for a wheel or to be round, use a nail, pen, Sharpie, highlighter, etc to use to bend the metal around, this will help keep the parts in the round form. My first model I did, the Model T I didn't think about this and the wheels didn't turn out as well as they could've.

This model probably took me about 10 hours (I could be exaggerating here but it seemed like it), some of the other models such as the 747 took 45 minutes.

％商品名: Fascinations Metal Earth Apollo Lunar Module 3D Metal Model Kit
レビュー内容: This has been one of my favorite metal earth models to build, and I think it has taken me the longest of all the ones I have purchased. It is definitely not for beginners, but offers a good challenge. I would say that it took me probably 4-5 hours to complete. My only gripe is that the directions (as usual) lack some direction. You will find yourself looking at the package as well as the 3D model view on the website to get a better idea of how some of the pieces fit together. I'm glad that I read the other reviews prior to purchasing on Amazon and putting this together, as my one piece of advice matches theirs: SAVE THE THRUSTERS FOR LAST. If you don't, you'll probably find yourself smashing them to pieces or bending them and other pieces quite often. Otherwise, this model looks great on my desk with all the rest, and is probably the most impressive. Definitely would recommend to anyone!

％商品名: Fascinations Metal Earth Apollo Lunar Module 3D Metal Model Kit
レビュー内容: After 4 tanks, Hubble, and the Graf Zepplin I felt I was ready to take on the lander. I was a bit apprehensive after reading the reviews but Mary Ellen was right. DO THE THRUSTERS LAST! There is no need to do them early and they only get in the way and break easily. With that in mind and taking my time I still got this done over a 1 hour lunch break and with nothing broken.

％商品名: Fascinations Metal Earth Apollo Lunar Module 3D Metal Model Kit
タイトル: but maybe not the most fun Metal Earth kit to build
レビュー内容: Definitely the most difficult set I've built from Metal Earth. Some of the pieces are very hard to get into place and part of that is the build order they give you, the other part is just how weird some of the angles are done on the actual lander design. All in all, very challenging and rewarding, but maybe not the most fun Metal Earth kit to build.

％商品名: Fascinations Metal Earth Apollo Lunar Module 3D Metal Model Kit
タイトル: Fun, cool, detailed, well worth the money
レビュー内容: Well designed and detailed. Instructions are easy to follow. Some steps were a bit fiddly but that's the fun of stuff like this. I would buy all the kits they offer if I had the money and the space to display them.

％商品名: Revell Monogram Shelby Cobra 427 Plastic Model Kit
タイトル: Very nice model with one problem
レビュー内容:
Some model builders think kits should be challenging to complete. I don't. I think we're free to introduce all the challenges we want by adding extra details, movable parts, etc. I believe that kits should provide reasonably clean parts that actually fit, and instructions that help guide the builder to successful completion of the model, with minimal frustration and confusion, by combining good text with helpful pictures (be they artwork or photos). Sadly, too many kits have instructions that oppose the builder instead of offering helpful guidance.

Well, I'm happy to say that this kit, in my opinion, is just another example of how kits should be done, and why Revell/Monogram kits are better than average. My one and only complaint is that despite having built over 600 models in my time, I was unable to get the kit's hood hinge to work. I finally just cut the hinge off and made the hood removable. Oh, and the hood is missing its air scoop. A 427 Cobra with no air scoop? Tsk tsk. Still, it was fun to build and it makes a nice looking dust collector on a nearby shelf. (Mine sits on a Testors trailer behind a Ford pickup truck.)

GLBanks@knology.net
Madison, AL

％商品名: Revell Monogram Shelby Cobra 427 Plastic Model Kit
タイトル: Good Detail, but NOT for your teenage son
レビュー内容:
(I have some great pictures. But I cannot figure out how to upload them. Someone please comment to my review and tell me what I need to do. They are all .jpg's, under 300kb.)

I used to build model cars when I was a kid. On a whim, I bought this.

It has good detail, and the picture of the completed car looks fantastic.
This model looks harder to assemble than the ones I remember as a kid. It also requires a lot of different colors of paint.

 I have not assembled it yet. I will update my review after I get it put together.

Edit after Assembly-1/16/2017
 I was enthusiastic with the difficulty and the challenge of this model.
The detail is there, and therefore the potential to make a masterpiece is there. It is all up to the abilities of the person assembling it.
 For my first model in 45 years, I think I did well. I modified the paint scheme somewhat, adding even more detail, and I added plug wires. I hope I did well enough that the ‘real’ modelers are impressed. (Or at least I didn’t embarrass myself to them.)

 This is a VERY nice model car. I am giving it a low 3 stars based solely on their marketing this to young people. The box says 10+, and a skill level of two. It angers me when I think how many parents have bought this car for their young son (or daughter), and then to be disappointed.
 Yes, I see someone, much more experienced at models than me, has stated this kit is easy. And he has beautiful pictures of his car. But, he also says he has built over 600 models!!!
 This is not for your teenage child. This is not the same as the model kits that they sold when I was a kid. This is a model for modelers. It has over 100 VERY detailed parts. That age on the box of ‘10+’ is BS. A two in my day would be ‘easy’. This is no easy. This is about an 8 on a scale of 10.
 There are at least 14 pieces that are smaller than 1/4” across. If you sneeze, you could lose a good part of the model. All of these pieces need to first be removed. That in itself is a task. Then most pieces have to be trimmed, and painted.
 You will need additional ’stuff’. The box lists 10 different colors. I ended up with two different paint sets, and still had to buy an additional 4 colors. To make that pretty paint job on the outside body, you will need spray paint. After the decals are applied, you then need a clear-coat spray. You will also need one of those head worn magnifiers with an attached light.
 I spent over $100.00 for paint, brushes, and other things. I have provided a list of items I needed, at the end of my review, for anyone interested.

 Problems with the car itself:
1. Slight errors in the directions, but nothing that cannot be thought out.
2. Lower radiator hose cannot be installed as described. I suspect modifications could be made to make it fit. But it seems un-necessary, and I suggest not installing it. Then you can install the radiator assembly to the car body front, making a nice tight fit in the front, and at the same time making it possible to remove the frame from the body easier.
3. The tires are ‘quirky’. You will probably end up gluing them on. (I did.)
4. The hood will not work correctly. I found the problem to be a part of the hinge needed to be sanded down. And I also filed the notches in the body a little.
5. The decals are near perfect in length. But getting them to curve around sharp bends is hard. They could mention in the directions to apply a small dab of glue at the bends.

 The rest of this review is intended as advice to anyone wondering what it will cost to build this model.

After an analysis of costs (Amazon, with prime.), I ended up with the following:

Paint-Sets
 Testors Gloss Finish Enamel Paint Set ($22.87) This is a nice set that includes many other things you will need, including cement, sandpaper, a razor knife, and brushes.
 Testors Auto Detail Enamel Paint Set ($14.20)

Paint-Individual Bottles
 Testors-Steel-Flat ($4.30)
 Testors-Semi-Gloss Black ($5.93)
 Testors-Natural Wood ($4.63)
 Testors-Flat Aluminum (5.78) Flat steel and flat aluminum are near identical. Use either.

Spray Paint
 Red Metallic Speck-Rust-Oleum 251598 ($11.66)
 Clear Coat-SEM 13003 Clear Coat Spray ($16.39)
The professionals use paint sprayers. But that’s a whole another world that I didn’t want to explore for one model car.

Paint Brushes
 Virtuoso 15 pc Detail Brushes ($14.99)
 Solabela Montreal 24 pc Brushes ($9.99) (I think the cost has tripled for this item.)
I bought two brush sets because I didn’t know what I really needed. Both sets of brushes were very nice. I used brushes out of both sets.

For a total of ~$110.74
Cost, of course, will vary depending on your paint scheme, and how ‘detailed’ you want to be.

EXTRA’S
 Spark Plug Wire Set-Mad Modeling ($8.95)
 Pin vise and drill bit set, to make the spark plug wire holes-Pit Bull CHID B003 ($6.53) (Not very good quality, but worked for what I needed.)
 SHINEY Chrome-General Paint Chrome PDS-94 ($11.43) I bought a can of spray chrome paint solely for approximately one drop of paint, to touch up where I had trimmed the chrome pieces. For some reason, Testors does not make the ‘shiny’ chrome, in their little bottles. You can take spray paint and spray it into the cap, to get a liquid paint.
 Display Case-Illumibox 10004 ($17.99)
If you actually complete this model satisfactorily, you will need a case for it. Get acrylic.

About the paints listed on the box:
 Not Needed:
Gold - Only for the carburetors. Who paints carburetors gold?
Gloss Black & Silver - Not needed. In fact, directions do not even show any item they suggest painting with these colors. I had both, and still did not use either.
Wood - For Steering wheel, and gear shifter knob. They can be painted any color you want.

 Needed:
Red for the body.
Clear coat.
Ford blue (Dark Blue) for the engine.
Flat black for the hoses, mounts, strut/shock boots, interior, and misc.
Semi-gloss black for the starter, gear shift boot, frame, and misc.
Aluminum\steel for all the aluminum and steel parts. Side by side, the paints look identical to me. Use either.
Turn signal amber for the front turn lights. The rears are already pre-colored.

％商品名: Revell Monogram Shelby Cobra 427 Plastic Model Kit
レビュー内容: My son and I built this model not to long ago and it turned out really nice. This is his favorite car and everytime we go to a car show this is the one he looks for. The parts were clean, there wasn't much slag on the chrome, which is always nice and it went together with out much "tweaking". Everything went great until we got to the stripes. Those were a bit tricky and time consuming if you want them on there right. Take your time and only do a few at a time and let those dry. All in all this was a great build and my son and I got to do another project together. He loves it...so I am Happy!! I hope this review helps and Happy Shopping!!

％商品名: Revell Monogram Shelby Cobra 427 Plastic Model Kit
タイトル: You get what you pay for
レビュー内容:
I found this particular model a bit difficult to assemble. I realize that if model building were a snap to assemble, everyone would be doing it. In this model, some of the tiny parts were very difficult to glue on and to keep in place as the building process continued. It really sucks having to go back and re glue previous steps that were hard to do the first time out. Some of the components were a fraction of a grain of sand! Way too small to deal with. A surgeon would have gripes trying to fit some of these teenie parts and keeping them attached. The word "delicate" is an under statement when it comes to building this super small car. The car assembled is about the size of my hand. Some of the instructed building steps were not too clear cut and difficult to maneuver. Some of the pieces didn't seem too terribly precise as far as the molding process goes. I probable will select a different manufacturer for my next build. I will also try using super glue instead of Testors glue. I will also spend a little more in hopes of getting better quality parts to work with.
UPDATE: Car is now in the trash!

％商品名: Revell Monogram Shelby Cobra 427 Plastic Model Kit
タイトル: He will have hours of fun building it
レビュー内容: This is a Birthday Gift for my Grandson! He will have hours of fun building it!

％商品名: Revell Monogram Shelby Cobra 427 Plastic Model Kit
タイトル: Not bad for a practice run.
レビュー内容:
Decent model for the most part. Some part do not fit as they should. Lower radiator hose had to be discarded. There was no way to get it into place without cutting the front cross-member. The right-from wheel would not snap into place and had to be glued. Passenger seat will not fit with the handbrake in place. i had to file a notch in the seat bucket.

Order of operations should be reviewed as well. For example, don't glue the headers in place until you're ready to dry-fit the mufflers. Glue the headers in place, tape the body in place, then tape the mufflers in place and use them to hold the headers at the correct angle.

Revell also needs to rethink their sprue placement on chrome-plated pieces. I realize that some touch-up will always be needed but I have to believe that strategic sprue placement could minimize touch-ups and improve the quality of the product,

％商品名: Revell 85-8883 1/4 Visible V-8 Engine Plastic Model Kit, 12-Inch
レビュー内容:
I’m an old retired mechanic. I have been wanting to build one of these for a long time. I finally got the time to do it. I was very patient. I spent the first day, (about 6 hours) just trimming parts and looking through the directions. It took another 3 days, or so, to complete. Some pieces MUST be allowed to dry thoroughly before proceeding.
 Most of the parts fit very well. However, some pieces need to be ‘shifted/pushed’. Its wise to pre-fit, and understand how everything is going together, and, some temporary assembly is also helpful. The finished engine looks very good, with some mis-alignment where the water pump matches up with the heads; mostly caused by slight warpage in a front clear piece. Its minor to me.
 The box recommends paint. But I think that is an error. This model looks great without painting. Instead of adding detail and realism, I believe painting just distracts from the purpose of this model. (Having said that, there are exceptions. Some of the pictures other builders have uploaded, are impressive.)
 I used Canola vegetable oil, It seems to be working fine. You really need to be careful to clean the oil off the end of the rocker arm shaft, before gluing the cap on. And then work that closest rocker arm back and forth, to be sure no glue is stuck to it. (OR, just lubricate it after gluing.) DON”T apply oil to the cylinder walls. It is not necessary, as the pistons are a loose fit. The oil will just cloud up the view.
 I used Testors Clear Parts Cement where it said to use epoxy. I think the clear parts glue worked very well. It takes longer to dry, but it also gives you time to clean any glue from the threads, and you can even install the screw, and tighten the nut into the hole, getting it perfected centered. AND, it dries clear.
 The screws and nuts in my kit were nearly perfect. The sole exception was putting the screw through the generator bracket into the thermostat housing. I had to enlarge the hole opening a little bit, then it worked.
 It is a copy of an old small block Chevrolet. (Although, you can modify it to look like other engines.) If you assemble it correctly, the valves and pistons are in correct ‘time’. HOWEVER…some fool put the rotation direction on the bell housing pointing in the wrong direction. The engine actually turns clockwise…looking at it from the front. (The same as a real engine.) It doesn’t hurt to turn the wrong direction, its just that the valves work backwards then.
 It has great detail, and a lot of parts. I actually would have liked to have seen even more detail. Such as, a timing chain, camshaft bearings, a rotating distributor shaft, and a clear distributor cap. They also need to include spark plug wire looms. My pictures do not show them, but I have some split wire wraps on the way from Amazon. That should make the wires look better.
 Interestingly, if you build this correctly, some of the important items can be disassembled. You can add oil to the parts, or even swap out pistons, heads, etc.
 I don’t really see this as a great father/son project. This is a model you will need to concentrate on. (I believe this is the same, or very similar to a model engine that I tried to build 45 years ago…and failed. If my memory is correct, I gave up after messing up installing the nuts. I had them crooked, with glue in the threads. But, back then, we didn’t blame others, for our own failures, like I see many reviewers here doing.)

％商品名: Revell 85-8883 1/4 Visible V-8 Engine Plastic Model Kit, 12-Inch
タイトル: Very satisfied with Revell Visible V8
レビュー内容:
Very satisfied with Revell Visible V8. I'm 69 yrs. old so have built a few models.
I knew that this model is not an exact replica of any particular engine. It is Revell Visible V8. However, I've always seen it as a possible representation of Chevy 283 and by adding details like fuel lines etc and decals which are not included in the kit, it is my build.
Since completing It I ordered another and have just finished building it to represent a Ford 289. This required a lot of modifications as there are so many differences. This is one reason I have enjoyed this model engine kit so much: it is not an exact replica of any engine, so I can build it to represent whatever I want, build it and modify however I can and be proud to display it.
I had no problems at all with parts fitting etc. just the normal trimming and sanding.as with any good kit.
As I said, after completing the first, I order another one

Having said that, my daughter loves working on it and it is a very cool model. You might consider working on it with one of the "elaborated" instructions posted by the other reviewers which clarifies missing and/or incorrect aspects of the instructions. I wish I had done that but I was too lazy.

％商品名: Revell 85-8883 1/4 Visible V-8 Engine Plastic Model Kit, 12-Inch
レビュー内容:
This is a skill level three kit, age 12+ years. Younger children may be ok with adult supervision. This kit will fit together if you take your time. It does not just snap together. Styrene Glue, epoxy, a small file set and a sandpaper assortment is required. You must trim the flash, file down the ejection pin marks and dry fit each part before gluing. If you are skill level three, then of course you already know this. If you have built plastic model cars or planes before, then this kit should be no problem. If you are looking for a simple kit that can be put together in a afternoon, this is not it. Allow a few days of off and on work to finish. I got my first Visible V8 as a Christmas present in 1961. I have built five Visible V8s since and I am working on #6 now. There is a DVD available that gives step by step instructions for building the Visible V8 on E ---, if needed, however with some time and effort, these kits become a nice little model to show to all your friends. Please remember, this is a scale model and not a toy for little kids to play with, even though it is listed as a toy on Amazon. The Visible V8 is a great educational tool for that young future auto mechanic or engineer.

Important product update: May 31 2010. Do NOT use vegetable oil to lubricate your Visible V8 as the instructions tell you to do. Soybean oil will destroy your Visible V8. Unsure about other types of vegetable oil at this time. I would use Labelle plastic safe oil available from Labelle lubricants until a different type of oil can be found that does not melt the plastic used in the Visible V8.

％商品名: Revell 85-8883 1/4 Visible V-8 Engine Plastic Model Kit, 12-Inch
レビュー内容:
I am a very patient guy and this model kit has destroyed it all. Do mind, that is a given when using glue that there will be some kind of mess. Regardless, the way the manufacturer created all the parts I expected little to no REDESIGNING of parts. I quit building this 3/4 of the way once I realized I will never get the pushrods to actually function with the valves. The plastic camshaft bends the pushrods instead of pushing it up. The pushrods do not even contact the valve lifters.

On the brightside, this monumental project does look good after u get the cylinders in and watch the motion of components.

I will not recommend this to any of my peers for it is a doomed project from the start. Plastic components are just not made accurately nor precisely and will never fit together unless you make a living re-engineering a catastrophe.

％商品名: BXQINLENX 25 PCS Gundam Modeler Basic Tools Craft Set For Car Model Assemble Building(E)
タイトル: A terrific gift for the novice to professional model builder!
レビュー内容: I frankly don't understand why a few customers were so quick with a "thumbs down" review? I'm a pro builder, with my ship models contracted by the USN Museum in Norfolk. Buy this same stuff in a glitzier box from Brookstone and you'll pay 5x more. One of my sharpening stones was broken, but it's still quite effective. Granted, it's not made in Switzerland, but in China. I like to buy USA made stuff too, but give this kit to the most prolific builder you know, and he'll (or she'll) find something that they'll use every day. It has a set of metric high speed drill bits, from 0.5mm through 5mm in 0.5 increments; I usually use the closest Imperial size when drilling for a tap, but using these, you get the correct pitch diameter for the best strength (Wolf, MSME, PE). It will be a wonderful set of tools fr the novice builder's birthday gift. In truth, I'd cut the last star in half, but the one thing that's missing is a saw blade.

％商品名: BXQINLENX 25 PCS Gundam Modeler Basic Tools Craft Set For Car Model Assemble Building(E)
タイトル: A good serviceable set of modeling tools
レビュー内容:
Arrived on time, all items present and accounted for. Nothing broken or missing. The only thing I could want added would be a simple plastic case to hold the tools, instead of a ziploc bag.
Have already used the 550 grit sandpaper on a couple submarine model kits.
I am a forty year veteran of scale modeling, recently retired, and getting back seriously into modeling. Been getting tools and materials haphazardly, paying more money than this kit for similar items. These can be used for other craft hobbies too. Maybe some items are cheap, but all are fully serviceable. Overall, a good set of tools.

％商品名: BXQINLENX 25 PCS Gundam Modeler Basic Tools Craft Set For Car Model Assemble Building(E)
レビュー内容: came in good condition except one of the sharpening rocks was broken, but it broke off close to the end so its still useable. the "scissors" that it came with kinda sucked since the alignment of the blades were off, I tried to fix it but I ended up breaking it instead so that ones on me. other than that it is overall good and you should ignore the other reviews that say the quality was cheap.

％商品名: BXQINLENX 25 PCS Gundam Modeler Basic Tools Craft Set For Car Model Assemble Building(E)
タイトル: While marketed for Gundam kit builders this toolkit is perfect for any Modeling subject
レビュー内容:
You get exactly what you order. Average quality tools produced in the Asian Market. While marketed for Gundam kit builders this toolkit is perfect for any Modeling subject.

As to be expected, everything is in metric and either japanese or chinese kanjis. They're tools and extremely self explanatory. The lack of English text is not a factor at all for this kit.

The only small detractor is the lack of a Scribing tool, but I haven't seen many kits that include one. I would personally have replaced one of the two sets of tweezers or one of the knife sharpening stones with a scribing tool if I were putting it together.

All in all, it's a solid starting place for a modeling tool kit.

％商品名: Revell 1:426 Uss Arizona Battleship
タイトル: SAILING SOLO FOR THE FIRST TIME!
レビュー内容:
"It makes me think that I'm building the Arizona itself. I'm the dry dock, and I'm building it."

The words of my 9-year-old son, who pretty much put this together on his own. He has been fascinated with World War II for about a third of his life (since he was 6), and we even gave him a Pearl Harbor cake for his last birthday. As the school year is coming to an end, he decided that he wanted to begin putting the model together while I was out of town on a conference.

This is an excellent reproduction of the Arizona. The turrets of the guns actually turn. Although several of the pieces are quite small, the instructions are very clear. Although he did need some assistance from his parents when it came to putting the hull together, my son was able to do an extremely passable job on his own.

He loves it, and that's all that matters!

％商品名: Revell 1:426 Uss Arizona Battleship
タイトル: Good for Beginners but the Instructions are too Vague
レビュー内容: The directions seem a little bit too vague as there are no written instruction, only pictures. There is an extra boat that is included in the kit that is not present in the instructions, you can see where it goes but it should still be listed. The overall quality of the boat is good, definitely worth the price. It is a very good beginner project and is fun to assemble.

％商品名: Revell 1:426 Uss Arizona Battleship
タイトル: Good kit, but get the photoetch to got with it.
レビュー内容: Nice model. Most parts well molded with minimal flash, instructions are easy to use. Couple of minor issues but overall great kit. Do yourself a favour and get the photo etch kit that goes with this. Huge difference.

％商品名: Revell 1:426 Uss Arizona Battleship
レビュー内容: Had fun building this with my son. Overall, he was able to do all but the hull assembly (which was a bear!). At least on ours, the two pieces were warped and did not want to fit together properly. Ended up using super glue and holding them together for almost an hour (contours didn't allow for clamps to be used). Otherwise, we had a great time with this.

％商品名: Revell 1:426 Uss Arizona Battleship
タイトル: This model is very detailed and easy to assemble
レビュー内容: This model is very detailed and easy to assemble. I did this model as a kid and now as an adult, I have found a great conversation piece. Like all Revell models the instructions were clear, and the paint scheme was easy. The only thing I would add is that I would have liked to have more decals for the model. I only had the name and American flags, but other than that, great model.

％商品名: Revell 1:426 Uss Arizona Battleship
タイトル: Absolutely the best gift for a fan ever
レビュー内容: It was a gift. Absolutely the best gift for a fan ever.

％商品名: Revell 1:426 Uss Arizona Battleship
レビュー内容:
I bought this model few weeks ago and started to assemble as soon as I got it. The model broke into pieces when I opened the box...this means that you have to figure out which tiny pieces should go where by yourself, and might miss some parts. When you finally assemble your model and find that there is a missing part, that would be very annoying. The bottom parts of the ship hardly fit together, I used a lot of cement.

I have some collection of models with different brand since I was a child. I can say that this one is really not worth money. Spend 10 or few more dollars and buy a better one like Trumpeter Model. I have a Trumpeter USS Yorktown and its so good. At the very least, the box is rigid, so that shipping won't damage your model. Also, they wrap the parts separately and carefully, and there is even a small box to put in model planes. If you are still confused, just buy them and find out the truth yourself.

％商品名: Revell 1:426 Uss Arizona Battleship
レビュー内容: Its a fun model to build if you do it right, I am a novice model builder myself and i made the mistake of assembly before painting. Paint it before you put it together!!!

％商品名: Revell 1:426 Uss Arizona Battleship
タイトル: Poor quality takes away the fun.
レビュー内容:
This model kit consists of over 100 pieces. The design is very good. Nearly all pieces are of reasonable sizes, so it would have been ideal even for beginners.

I say "would have" because the manufacturing quality is horrendous. Deformed pieces are common and feathers are everywhere. Trimming and in fact sculpting become a big part of the construction process, easily doubling the work load than had the quality been at Tamiya level.

Fortunately, the plastic is soft enough to curve with relative ease. There are no thin wires in the kit, so unlike the case with 05038 1/144 U-BOOT TYP VIIC RVL05038, breakage is not a big problem. Fitting large pieces together, however, can be a real struggle. I eventually use a lighter to soften the plastic into the right shape and end up having to buy a second set after ruining the first one. This is obviously not something that young kids should be allowed to attempt.

The documentation is weak and error-prone. The guns are not to scale. The design is of dubious historical accuracy. The main guns cannot maintain their elevations. But the main problem remains the poor manufacturing quality. If one can overlook or overcome this issue, the USS Arizona kit is a great project for novice or intermediate modelers.

％商品名: Revell 1:426 Uss Arizona Battleship
レビュー内容: In my life i have built this model maybe 5 times. Each time i have tried to do the memorial justice. This is history at its best. I also built one of these as my dads ship.. the USS Nevada. I just changed the bow numbers.

％商品名: Revell 1:426 Uss Arizona Battleship

Great build for the price.

The hull length measures approximately 17.5 inches. The model has good overall detail and looks the business built straight out of the box. The model can be further enhanced with the addition of rigging and even aftermarket photo-etched detail parts. A terrific kit for less than $18.00.
