タイトル: Cool design, doesn't shoot very far
レビュー内容: The engineering of it is the cool part. It does not shoot very far. I would buy again based on the finished look and learning process from building it.

％商品名: Leonardo da Vinci Catapult Kit
レビュー内容: Bought for my 9-year-old grandson. He and his 7-year-old sister put it together in 45 minutes and have had a ball catapulting everything they can find, both inside and outdoors. I love buying toys that make the kids think but are still a lot of fun, and this one definitely did both!

％商品名: Leonardo da Vinci Catapult Kit
タイトル: Fun to build and play with
レビュー内容: Fun and easy to build. Like others have said, it doesn't shoot far but that is because it's an inefficient design. When your kid finally finds the limits of the machine, you can explorer better designs with them. I love that it isn't trying to go as far as possible and it's easy to see how it works.

％商品名: Leonardo da Vinci Catapult Kit
レビュー内容: My nephew LOVED it! He had a lot of fun putting it together, and it arrived here fast. A few parts were missing on the first one we ordered, but, Amazon took care of the problem, and saved the day!!! Thank you Amazon!!!! This product was a hit!!!

％商品名: Leonardo da Vinci Catapult Kit
レビュー内容:
It works as-is. I bought and built two. Everyone I've showed them to, liked them a lot.

I built the first one with some modifications.
1. I used wood glue instead of the included white glue.
2. I used thin hemp twine instead of the included white twine.
3. I sealed the wood with Tung oil after assembly. Doing this after assembly is required because the glue will not hold otherwise.
4. I moved the loop on the holding-chock to the top, away from the axis of movement. This made it easier to pull the cable.

I built the second one with the modifications of the first.
1. I sanded the wood to make it smoother. The sand paper included is tiny, so extra is needed for this.
2. I stained the wood with a light color (Minwax Golden Oak) and let it dry before assembly.
3. I applied graphite to the axles where they spin in the wood. I used woodless graphite 8B pencils. This worked far better than graphite powder.

％商品名: Leonardo da Vinci Catapult Kit
タイトル: Good quality and customer service, but missed out in packaging
レビュー内容:
It is nicely a done piece. My kids put it together w/o any supervision. However, it was missing one piece - the stopper which arrests the swing of the catapult. We were using it for a science fair and we had to improvise. When we called them they were very understanding and immediately shpped the missing piece. But, it arrived 2 weeks later, that is after the science fair was all done and forgotten.

I still appreciate their great customer service attitude but in the end it was a poor effort.

％商品名: Leonardo da Vinci Catapult Kit
レビュー内容: Bought this for my son to build. Although he managed to build it, he made some mistakes since some blocks look exactly the same but is just slightly different such as a hole in it mount at a certain way. The instructions could be a little clearer I guess. But I managed to fix his mistakes and it turned out great. Great for shooting paper balls too!

％商品名: Revell 1:96 USS Constitution
レビュー内容: You can never go wrong with a Revell kit. I've been building them for over 50 years. This 1:96 model is very well made. The molds are getting on with age so expect a bit extra flashing here and there. Always have tons of sharp #11 Exacto blades on hand as well as ALL of your 'TINY' tools ready. TOOL-UP before hand if needed. Be sure to get some Beeswax for the rigging. High precision glue tips are a must. Micro drill bits and a pin vise are a must also. I use many different kinds of tweezers and clips to act as a third and fourth hands. Your work space should be at least 4'x6' for this kit, well lit, and with movable intense lighting. Magnification of all kinds will make assembly a pleasure. Most important, keep your work space clean, and be very patient. Sometimes all you can do is glue two or three things, then you must wait for at least a day for the glue to set 'hard'. Take advantage of your "Off Time" and read ahead in your instruction books. You can always paint something. Have fun, be professional, and proud.

％商品名: Revell 1:96 USS Constitution
レビュー内容:
First time I ever did a model ship. Took me 3 weeks, not including the sails. My next model will be wooden, though!

Used Hammered Copper spray for the bottom and stand. Found a small shelf the right size for the stand and drilled out the logical holes in the hull and attached with couplings. I think this looks so much better than the included stand.

At 62 (woman at that!) I had to use a magnifier. Found this one on Amazon that worked perfectly (after a few adjustments, of course.)SE MH1047L Illuminated Multi-Power LED Head Magnifier

Thank you, Michael Larson, for suggesting to glue and winch the lower deck. This worked perfectly! (and probably saved me undue frustration).

The front rail was too flimsy and disintegrated before I could assemble it. Made my own railing out of wire.

I used wood stain on the deck to give it a more natural color. Looks more like wood.

The u sections of the railing were equally flimsy. Had to make half out of wire again. And many of the ones that made it during the roping broke during the rest of the construction. Perhaps one should replace these with a metal part.

There were not enough eyebolts. Had to buy brass ones.

The manual was a little off in places. Found myself having to put eyebolts in very hard to put places after the fact. Maybe read the rigging manual before to see if all the bolts are in place.

My boyfriend loves how it looks and now it displays beautifully in our living room.

％商品名: Revell 1:96 USS Constitution
レビュー内容:
This is a very nice kit. Lots of detail and most of the parts fit well. However, I was very disappointed when it came time to install the upper main decks (part numbers 36,37,38). After gluing up the two hull halves I installed the three lower gun decks (part numbers 18,15,14) with no problems...snug and tight they were, but it worked. Later in the assembly, as I was attempting to install the three upper main decks, I found the upper part of the hull was too wide for a good fit. In other words, there was a heck of a gap around the edges of the decks. After a lot of time and work I fixed the problem, but I think with a little planning the problem could be avoided should I build another one.
At the very beginning, when gluing up the hull, I would run a narrow bead of 15 minute epoxy the entire length and then apply my clamps. Now, I would temporarily install the three upper decks into the upper part of the hull,(you can pop them back out when done) to ensure a good fit against the waterway. Hold or bar clamp the hull halves together until the epoxy has set up. I should think once done the lower gun decks will fit equally well, and if not, they are much easier to remedy. Keeping in mind, the whole process is to ensure a good fit of the upper main decks, which of course is what everyone will see once you're done. I hope this helps other modelers.

％商品名: Revell 1:96 USS Constitution
レビュー内容: GREAT PROJECT, ABOUT 6 WEEKS TO COMPLETE. ADDED MORE PHOTOS.

％商品名: Revell 1:96 USS Constitution
レビュー内容:
I almost built this ship in 1980 but gave up on it. I bought it again this year and am working slowly because that is how you have to do it This is absolutely the most difficult plastic model sailing ship ever made. Be sure to search online for building tips because there is a lot of help out there.

I have used superglue only on this ship - believe me, nothing else is good enough. I think I will throw out the plastic sails and make my own from linen.

I am 52 years old - I use glasses and magnifiers for everything I do with this model - painting, gluing, tying the rigging.

If you love a real challenge, take this one on!

％商品名: Revell 1:96 USS Constitution
レビュー内容: Once you are sure you will not need to access the lower hull, i.e. Rudder rope assembly, GLUE the entire gun deck to the hull and winch it tight. Even though it says not to glue. Just do it. After 12 hours of glue set, 36,37,38 fit perfectly. See photo.

％商品名: Revell 1:96 USS Constitution
レビュー内容: I bought this ship for myself, as it's going to be winter soon, and I needed something to do inside to keep busy. I had tried this exact ship many years ago and had two cats at the time who kept stealing my parts. So maybe this time I can complete it. I have just begun and it is time consuming and very intricate work so it makes for a great long term project. I'm sure it will turn out beautiful. Some of the tags on this item are incorrect: It is not a "Disneyland Ship", nor is it a "Pirate Ship". It is an Historical Ship that still exists, retired of course.

％商品名: Revell 1:96 USS Constitution
レビュー内容: I built this kit over 30 years ago and the quality still remains as high as ever. Revell is a master at creating quality, detailed plastic model kits. The plastic sails were crushed a bit by the newer packaging (an attempt unfortunately to prevent this exact thing). Given I don't use the sails, preferring the rigging, it was not a problem for me. I'd recommend this kit for anyone who enjoys building 16th century model ships but hasn't the patience nor the funds for the museum quality wood kits.

％商品名: Revell 1:96 USS Constitution
タイトル: Cheap Production, look for an older production kit...
レビュー内容: Junk. Plain and simple. The quality of the molds is pathetic. Warped hull halves, decks, masts, etc... Not to mention the new molding and plastic formula used in the production of this kit is so cheap it's not worth the hassle. Save your money, go onto ebay and search for a pre 1970's version of this kit. You will pay more for it in the long run...but the quality and fit of the parts of the older kits are a billion times better then this current production run. Revell went cheap on this current run of the 1/96 scale USS CONSTITUTION. Be warned. I have been building models for over 20 years and have never seen a kit so cheapened by cost cutting measures. Look for an older 1/96 scale kit and you will be much better off.

％商品名: Revell 1:96 USS Constitution
タイトル: The model is everything we thought it would be.
レビュー内容: I bought this as a gift for my husband and he has worked on the model everyday since he received it and loves it.

％商品名: Revell 1:96 USS Constitution
レビュー内容:
If you love building models and have time and patience, this is the model for you! This is my second time around building the same scale model. The first time was way back in my younger years. Flash forward many moons to present day, I wanted the challenge again of building this model. Make sure you have the right tools to build this model: Hobby knife, magnifier, sand paper, hobby glue, bees wax, pair of tweezers, rubber bands, clips, and of course paint. I would also recommend toothpicks to help with glue management. I spread a little glue on wax paper, dip the tip of the toothpick into the glue and place that on pieces/part to fuse together. Also different sized paint brushes, (some of the areas are really really small that needs to be detailed). Have notice the tread spools are now color coded to help with what type to use for the rigging.

Revell does give you the option to build your model a couple ways. And for those that are really into model building, you can make some of your own changes to enhance the ship. Have fun, but have patience. Tie, glue and let set before moving on.

This isn't a model that you can rush through and expect it to look good. This will take time and patience. Tie this, glue that let it set.

％商品名: Revell 1:96 USS Constitution
タイトル: A challenging model that yields terrific results
レビュー内容:
I used to put together models as a kid, but they always turned out like crap. You know, no patience. But now that I'm older, I thought I'd give it another go.

This model is listed at their highest level of difficulty, and justifiably so. You have to do a lot of tricky painting, and more than that, boy, will you ever be tying tiny knots! Wow, they really have me cursing on some days.

However, the results are looking awesome. The model is very detailed, and seems to be well-thought out. The instructions are actually readable (for the most part), and they offer useful tips. The most important tip they offer is to USE THE RIGHT TOOLS. This is not something you can just snap together in a couple of hours. This is a model that will take painstaking patience and detail over the course of WEEKS or MONTHS to assemble and finish. I'm not done yet, but I love how it's turning out!

％商品名: Revell 1:96 USS Constitution
タイトル: All of which are easily accomplished with time and patience
レビュー内容:
If you plan to build this model kit, and you want it to be a work of art (and it can be one), plan to spend 9 months to a year on it. I have built six of them and am about to start my seventh. The parts have flash and pin marks which will need to be addressed but this is to be expected on a kit of this age. Any experienced model builder will surely take this in stride.

It is the addition of extras that brings the Revell Constitution to life. Real copper foil on the hull, replacing the plastic belaying pins with turned brass ones, full gun rigging, robands for the sails, real wooden decks, jackstays, etc. All of which are easily accomplished with time and patience. I have seen many finished kits that look like completed plastic models and I have seen finished kits that look like the real ship seen from a distance.

The 1/96 scale Revell Constitution, like anything in life, is what you make it.

％商品名: 1 X Wind-powered Animaris Ordis Parvus Strandbeest Model Robot (Beige)
レビュー内容:
This is a really cool model for a very low price, but the quality is lacking. The parts fit together somewhat loosely, leaving a decent bit of play in the finished model. Also, I had a problem with the propeller.

To prepare the strandbeest for the propeller, a shaft slides into the top of the body. Then the propeller slides over the shaft, and a rubber stopper slides over the end of the shaft to prevent the propeller from sliding off. The shaft in my kit had too small a diameter to fit snugly in the body, and as a result slid in and out freely. Almost immediately upon blowing on the propeller, the shaft would slide out and the gear on the propeller would disengage, causing it to stop working. The rubber stopper was too loose to prevent the propeller from moving and pushing it off of the shaft during operation, also causing it to stop working.

The propeller blades are held onto the propeller frame with provided strips of tape. The propeller blades have a curve to them and are quite stiff, however, so after a day or so the stiff blades pulled away from the tape and disconnected. This could be solved with some glue, but shouldn't need to be.

For this price point, I didn't expect super-high quality, but there are quite a few major problems with this model. It feels cheap, and several parts just can't be assembled as they are meant to be.

％商品名: 1 X Wind-powered Animaris Ordis Parvus Strandbeest Model Robot (Beige)
レビュー内容: This was almost a really cool toy. But several pieces were malformed to the point that the device was unusable. It was also missing parts. Just buy the authorized version and save the trouble of assembling everything and being disappointed.

％商品名: 1 X Wind-powered Animaris Ordis Parvus Strandbeest Model Robot (Beige)
タイトル: It's a great idea and I like how this kit is in ...
レビュー内容: It's a great idea and I like how this kit is in a box that's inside a book, but the wings didn't want to attach for me. The adhesive is not very strong and doesn't work well on curved surfaces. And even when wings are attached, they require incredibly strong current of air in order to move the mechanism. But it does walk in a pretty cool way.

％商品名: 1 X Wind-powered Animaris Ordis Parvus Strandbeest Model Robot (Beige)
タイトル: First kit and replacement kit both had defects
レビュー内容:
The first kit I purchased had a one of its crankshafts malformed and was unusable. I got a replacement kit and that one included two very small rubberbands instead of the one normal size one required for assembling. I actually compared the rubberbands between the two kits received and they were very different in size.

Individually the two kits I received were unassemblable, luckily I was able to use the first kit's rubberband to make the second kit work, then return the first as defective.

Once assembled, the actual strandbeest was very cool, and well worth the purchase, but getting two bad kits in a row makes me think there's something wrong with the supplier's quality checking.

％商品名: 1 X Wind-powered Animaris Ordis Parvus Strandbeest Model Robot (Beige)
レビュー内容: The model contains instructions in english which should be follow carefully to get the Strandbeest properly assembled. It takes about 1 hour to assemble. I wanted a quick understanding of how the Strandbeest works, which this model gave me.

％商品名: 1 X Wind-powered Animaris Ordis Parvus Strandbeest Model Robot (Beige)
レビュー内容: For what is is- It is very cool. However I ordered the same exact item on ebay direct from china for $16 with free shipping and only took a week to get to me. This one I highly overpayed for, no doubt. Also on one of the molds had a defect that I had to carefully chipout with a razor blade...twice... since there was two castings from the same mold. The one I ordered from ebay there is no defect

％商品名: 1 X Wind-powered Animaris Ordis Parvus Strandbeest Model Robot (Beige)
タイトル: A bit on the fence with this one.
レビュー内容:
While I hate to be the one contrary reviewer, it has to be said that it seems quality management of the outgoing kits varied a fair bit. The bulk of the assembly process was pretty straightforward. Having previously built the bipedal version from a more recent Gakken issue, I was able to complete it in just under an hour. Aside from a couple misgivings on one or two of the choices made concerning the finishing bits -the rubber band and the functionally pointless wire shafts and "stoppers"-- I was fairly pleased with it.

That is, I was, until I got to the turbine. This is where I noticed a lot of undercutting in the manufacturing process. A few of the blades had holes half-punched or not at all. Not to mention that they are out of place, as compared to the structure they mount to. In addition, previous kits have had the blades shipped with a predetermined arc already formed into them. That was not the case with this one, and it makes an obvious difference. The plastic seems to be a thicker gage than previous kits and that causes it to spring back into a flat surface, even when mounted with adhesive to the turbine frame.

Because of this, they occasionally come in contact with the frame and pop off. A stronger adhesive may correct this, but as of the initial build, I have four of the five blades trying their hardest to jump ship. Another effect is that, with the holes significantly out of place across all 5 blades, the turbine is completely unbalanced and causes the model to shudder as it walks. This also makes getting it moving in the first place much harder than it should be. Most obviously, when it comes to rest, the turbine always falls back into the same position; indicating that one of the blades is quite a bit heavier than the rest. Looking at it, it appears nearly twice as thick as the others and is the one which most frequently pops off.

Admittedly, I just get these things as a matter of curiosity and not as a serious undertaking in model-making. That said, it seems the models got better in later versions; this being from 2010 and the biped a Dec. 2012 product.

Get this product to scratch that model-making itch, but be aware there may be some functional flaws.

％商品名: 1 X Wind-powered Animaris Ordis Parvus Strandbeest Model Robot (Beige)
レビュー内容: Fun little model to build. If I were to nitpick, I would say that the double sided tape for attaching the "fan blades" isn't that good. I used a small amount of CA glue instead and it works well and is easy. Build time isn't too long, but you have to read the instructions carefully. There is the possibility they could be misread and mistakes made. If you follow the instructions the build goes smoothly and is fairly easy.

％商品名: 1 X Wind-powered Animaris Ordis Parvus Strandbeest Model Robot (Beige)
レビュー内容: It came from overseas, and it was worth the wait, even though it arrived late for my grandson's birthday. He and his Dad had heard about the full-sized Straandbeest machines, so he was really excited to have a model to build, especially one that worked as intended.

％商品名: 1 X Wind-powered Animaris Ordis Parvus Strandbeest Model Robot (Beige)
レビュー内容: I and my kids had a great time putting this little beast together. There many duplicative parts that make up the 12 legs, which allowed for the kids and I to form an assembly line of snipping, filing and sorting. The original straandbeests are just so clever and fascinating to watch and this model kit captures those aspects in a fun kit build. Do pay extremely careful attention to the instructions else you could end up having to start over again. Having had to do a tear down and rebuild of the kit I am happy to report that the plastic that the kit is made from is flexible enough to allow for careful disassembly and reassembly. Enjoy!

％商品名: 1 X Wind-powered Animaris Ordis Parvus Strandbeest Model Robot (Beige)
タイトル: Good model - probably not for kids without adult supervision
レビュー内容:
The model is great, but mine doesn't walk smoothly. I could get it to walk only with a blow dryer, blowing on the highest setting. That leads me to the other issue - the fan blades are weakly secured with double sided tape. The stiff plastic used for the fan blades wants to retain it's flat shape, but the blade holder has a curve in it. So, the tape is too weak to hold it to the curve, and blowing against the fan blades makes the blades easily fly off. I had to solve that by super gluing each fan blade. So far, that seems to work. I also had to trim one of the blades with scissors since it whacked against the body when the fan was spinning - might have been due to mounting holes that weren't punched in the right spot - the other blades have plenty of clearance.

Overall, worth the price, but be prepared to massage it to get it to work properly. I'm an adult and it took me 2.5 hours to get it working properly - around an hour to assemble (and I used a knife to trim all of the pointy edges as I broke them off the part holders used in the molding process) and an hour to fix issues and see if I could get it to walk more smoothly. A couple steps took a while to figure out, but overall, pretty decent directions. I don't think I'd turn it over to a kid without adult supervision - I think they might easily confuse minor steps, which could cause problems. Also, they might now know how to fix issues outside of the normal instructions.

％商品名: 1 X Wind-powered Animaris Ordis Parvus Strandbeest Model Robot (Beige)
レビュー内容:
Very clever design and this model does an OK job in most respects but the propeller design is not well implemented and that's a shame because the mechanism goes together and operates very well. The blades are a poor fit and following their instructions they will not stay on. Double back tape and it doesn't hold. They actually give you a full set of die cut spare tape because they know it won't work. Too bad.

Also, again the propeller, the shaft is way too tight to allow the propeller to spin on it as I believe it is supposed to do. Instead the shaft turns in the holes in the framework, lots of friction. No way you can blow hard enough, I finally tested using compressed air and got it to walk. Now I need to figure out how to make it work right.

Be careful when assembling. Test the sub assemblies for free swinging and if the bind, get out a magnifier and very carefully trim flashing. I took my time and had very low resistance when operating by hand. The prop implementation is a disappointment.

I've continued to work on this and it now works right but only after reattaching propeller blades. They stay on long enough to make the point and visitors are charmed, as I was.

Still, fun to build. Well worth the price.

％商品名: 1 X Wind-powered Animaris Ordis Parvus Strandbeest Model Robot (Beige)
レビュー内容: Simple Yet fun. Had a few spots that needed to be filed on to make it operate smoothly but after figuring out the first leg everything went very smooth. Built and working in under an hour. I did loose a piece so mine has a limp but still fun.

％商品名: 1 X Wind-powered Animaris Ordis Parvus Strandbeest Model Robot (Beige)
タイトル: A great educational and hypnotic build kit.
レビュー内容: This thing is absolutely incredible and I wish it was around when I was a child. Perhaps then I would've become an engineer rather than an overqualified struggling graphic designer more interested in physics than the psychology of selling inferior products. This mini "strandbeest" kit is based off the mechanical designs of Theo Jansen. He designed these massive wind-powered machines based on his knowledge and understanding of human anatomy and motion. The translation is evident in the smooth, almost hypnotic, walking motion that only requires a nominal amount of wind. While this kit may be too advanced for children, it still represents an exciting educational hobby toy that's worth the time and effort of assembly. The price of under $15 is beyond reasonable.

％商品名: 1 X Wind-powered Animaris Ordis Parvus Strandbeest Model Robot (Beige)
レビュー内容: Theo Jansen is a magician (check out youtube videos), and this model of one of his beach creatures is like a magic trick. Everyone I've shown it to has been mezmerized by how it moves. I thought it might be chintzy, but it's sturdy and quite nice to look at. My only complaint is that the propeller blades are held on with double-sided sticky tape. Looks fine, but not strong enough. I'm going to tack them on with some plastic-friendly cement. Building was entertaining - just hard enough to be fun and not frustrating.

％商品名: 1 X Wind-powered Animaris Ordis Parvus Strandbeest Model Robot (Beige)
レビュー内容: I guess I should have counted every piece before assembly - my bad. Assembled the model and only right at the end did I realize that I was missing one critical part. So the model is incomplete and cannot be returned. Seller's order confirmation email states "If you notice any issues ... please contact us so we can resolve the issue as fast as possible ..." Well surprise surprise - when I contacted them they told me to contact Amazon. Wonderful - love the empty customer service promises. Model itself I guess could be fun - if it didn't fall apart because of the missing piece.

％商品名: 1 X Wind-powered Animaris Ordis Parvus Strandbeest Model Robot (Beige)
レビュー内容:
Awesome model! I really enjoy building models and this one was no exception. The little parts all fit together very well and form an awesome little machine. I would say it took me roughly and hour to build this. No glue or paint required.

The strandbeest walks just like it should, you do need to use a fan to make it walk. Just blowing on it is not enough, and will probably make you dizzy if you tried.

％商品名: 1 X Wind-powered Animaris Ordis Parvus Strandbeest Model Robot (Beige)
タイトル: The packaging and instructions are excellent. Thank you
レビュー内容: I purchased two Ovdis Parvus kits, one from my grandson and one for me. The next time he comes to visit then we plan to put them together and race them across the floor to see who wins. The packaging and instructions are excellent. Thank you.

％商品名: 1 X Wind-powered Animaris Ordis Parvus Strandbeest Model Robot (Beige)
レビュー内容: This is a nice pricing and I enjoyed putting it together. It's not a 5 star because the two sided tape tabs supplied just aren't capable of holding the blades onto the windmill structure(not even close to holding in my experience). I used super glue and let the glue dry while little clips held the blades to the windmill structure.

％商品名: 1 X Wind-powered Animaris Ordis Parvus Strandbeest Model Robot (Beige)
レビュー内容: Fun to build, took about 30-45 minutes. Looks awesome and fun to fiddle with. On mine the legs function well when the axel is turned manually but there is too much resistance to turn with just wind power. This could probably be fixed with some sanding but meh, im happy just looking at it.

％商品名: USS Missouri BB-63 US Navy Battleship RC Marine Warship 1/250 Military Model Boat by POCO DIVO
タイトル: Fun Boat - Maneuvers Very Well - Tight Turns
レビュー内容: This is a fun boat, but there are a couple of tips that might be helpful. The only directions are on the bottom of the box. Don't forget to look for the little bag containing the two cannons that install at the stern near the helicopter. Also, the directions describe two vents, one at the rear, forward of the helicopter, and one at the bow. These are to release vapor after use. I haven't seen the need for this, but you may wonder what those are for. To the rear of the helicopter are two sensors. Place your thumb over those and the remote will operate the boat for the purpose of testing. Otherwise, when the boat is in the water, the boat will operate. The remote has two controls, one for each propeller. Both forward and the boat goes straight. Using only one will steer the boat, however, one forward and the other in reverse will make it do tight turns. It's very responsive. Also, it seems fairly watertight, but I did notice some water coming out of the stern at those two sensors. So after I use it, I tilt it up to see if any water will drain. The battery does not have any charging indication, so I don't know how long it takes to fully charge. The directions say 5-6 hours. The directions also say it will operate for 20 minutes. I suppose that's continuous use, which means longer otherwise. I've played with it for nearly 40 minutes. There is no low battery warning, but when the speed begins to get slower, there's still plenty of charge to bring it in. I've not run out of range. It's quite enjoyable - a fun boat!

％商品名: USS Missouri BB-63 US Navy Battleship RC Marine Warship 1/250 Military Model Boat by POCO DIVO
レビュー内容: Looks great, but product I received never worked. Charger was broken so I used one of my own. However, ship's reception thing wouldn't receive signal. Grandson disappointed. Had to pay return shipping cost myself and refund still not credited...Stay clear of this company's product

％商品名: USS Missouri BB-63 US Navy Battleship RC Marine Warship 1/250 Military Model Boat by POCO DIVO
レビュー内容:
DO NOT BUY THIS TRASH
My son asked for this RC Boat as a Christmas Present from Santa. The remote never worked. ％商品名: Ugears 3D Model Steam Locomotive with Tender
レビュー内容:
Really cool, and lots of detail.

I'm not a model builder. I bought this to assemble as a gift for a train aficionado who is not mechanically inclined. It took me about 12 hours to assemble. A few tips:

Get an X-ACTO #1 Knife, Z Series With Safety Cap and use it to cut the small sections of wood attaching the parts to the board. It's easier to see where to cut if you turn the board over to the back side.

Use a pair of Hakko CHP-170 Micro Soft Wire Cutter, 1.5mm Stand-off, Flush Cut, 2.5mm Hardened Carbon Steel Construction, 21-Degree Angled Jaw, 8mm Jaw Length, 16 Gauge Maximum Cutting Capacity to cut the toothpicks flush where required.

Some Mega Candles - Unscented Tea Light Candles - Ivory, Set of 50 work well to lubricate the moving parts. Sometimes I rubbed the wax on the wooden parts, sometimes I lit the candle and applied the wax (for the gears, especially) with a toothpick. Make sure you don't put too much or you'll clog up the works and it won't move freely. Of course, you won't need 50 of them.

Get some Tweezerman Nail File Collection Pack of Emery Boards, 5 Count to file the burrs off of the wheels and anywhere else you see a remnant of wood left over from separating the parts from the boards.

Sometimes you need to tap parts into place. Make sure to support everything, and make sure it's really aligned. Don't force anything.

I broke a couple of parts through carelessness, but was able to glue them back together with Gorilla Original Gorilla Glue Minis, 12 g, Brown. Nothing too serious. Just be careful.

It won't go very far when fully cranked up, but that's not the point. It's more of something that you look at, knowing that it all works.

If I built another one, it would probably only take 6 or 8 hours now that I'm more familiar with how it works.

Anyway, I hope he likes it.

％商品名: Ugears 3D Model Steam Locomotive with Tender
レビュー内容:
Bought this for my husband for a Christmas gift and he absolutely loved it! He really likes trains and he's into models and legos and such so I thought this was perfect for him. It takes quite a few hours to put together. It took him 7-8 total. Here's his list of pros and cons:

Pros:
-everything is made of wood. It comes with the rubber bands you need and toothpicks. You do need a wax candle though.
-the quality of the wood is really good.
-the attention to detail is amazing. Doors open and close and it has gears.
-directions are clear.
Cons:
-when you pop the pieces out they need a bit of cleaning up as far as excess wood that he had to cut off.
-some of the pieces do not pop out of the sheets easy to where you think you might break it.
-the smaller pieces do not pop into place easily.
-we both agreed that under other circumstances we wouldn't pay full price for it. I just knew he'd love it for Christmas and I went ahead and got it for him. But just as a frivolous purchase it's not really worth it.

Overall, he really likes it. After you wind it and put it in the appropriate gear it does move! We just found it takes more winding than the instructions say.

％商品名: Ugears 3D Model Steam Locomotive with Tender
レビュー内容: I love trains and building models so this was really enjoyable for me to do. It's a bit challenging but mostly just time consuming. You do have to be ginger when removing the parts from their boards. Do not force anything at any point! Learned this the hard way. But luckily it's wooden and all parts can be glued back together. My only real qualm with the design is that the engine is reliant on a single toothpick to hold it. I made the mistake of over-winding the engine and the toothpick snapped and all the rubber bands went flying back into the engineer compartment which proved to be a pita to fix. But ultimately i replaced the toothpick with a metal track pin so that won't be happening again. I suggest you also use something metal (or hard plastic even) and non-malleable in it's place. It looks pretty cool when it's finished and is nice on display. Don't expect this to be a show stopper in terms of performance as it covers very little distance even if you wind it up as much as possible. The amount of track provided is indication of this fact.

％商品名: Ugears 3D Model Steam Locomotive with Tender
レビュー内容: Totally awesome to build. A little harder than some of their other models, but well worth it. As with all their models, everything fits together perfectly. I highly recommend this one....

％商品名: Ugears 3D Model Steam Locomotive with Tender
レビュー内容: Gave this to a 14 year old grandson for his birthday. He thought it was cool in the box. It was great to see it finished and working. The instructions are very clear and he did well with the model. Outstanding challenge.

However; the directions are so well done, it's extremely easy to follow along. New life customer here. Looking forward to future builds.

The instruction book is in pictograph form, and sometimes is not immediately clear, but careful study usually clears up any confusion. The finished product is impressive, and it does run, but this is of little importance to me, this is not a toy. I enjoyed building this model locomotive, and look foreward to the next project, maybe the truck.

I highly recommend this as a gift or a personal project for any model hobbyist or anyone who loves to work with their hands!

％商品名: Mechanical Theater by Ugears Is 3D Puzzle Wooden Brainteaser for Kids, Teens and Adults
タイトル: Dad had a blast putting it together, but it did not work in the end.
レビュー内容:
My siblings and I purchase two Ugears products for our father this Father's Day. One of us had seen a video and figured these would be a perfect gift for our dad who is very mechanically inclined, a gifted woodworker and a lover of puzzles. Keep in mind that my father is in his mid-80's, is very detailed oriented, and has the patience of Job. Given that, here is our review of this product.

Pros:
1. My father LOVED putting this together. He texted us pictures has he progressed, He really got a kick out of assembling this piece.

Cons:
1. Piece are very small and weren't cut so that punching them out was difficult. My dad used a magnifying glass and X-Acto knife and patiently cut out the pieces. He said it would be very easy to break one of the tabs.
2. The materials of this product were not has good as the Ugears tram we purchased him.
3. In the end, it didn't work. My dad was really excited when he finished this project until he saw the video of how if was suppose to run. And believe me when I say, if it didn't work for my dad it surely would not work for anyone else. He said the pieces and gears were not cut correctly in order to have everything spin freely.

Note: Kit did not come with X-Acto knife, but it is needed.

If you want to purchase a Ugears product, don't purchase this one. The tram worked much better.

％商品名: Mechanical Theater by Ugears Is 3D Puzzle Wooden Brainteaser for Kids, Teens and Adults
レビュー内容: I bought this model so give to my wife and she was awed when she first saw it. This model kit is of very high quality with fairly easy picture instructions in several languages. I had some difficulty with the axle (toothpicks) at first but then I used a little wax and the tool they provided and I was good to go. Mine moves just as smoothly as the videos you see on line. I'm definitely going to buy some more.

％商品名: Mechanical Theater by Ugears Is 3D Puzzle Wooden Brainteaser for Kids, Teens and Adults
タイトル: This is a really fun kit to put together during an afternoon
レビュー内容:
This is a really fun kit to put together during an afternoon. The pieces are laser-cut and come on flat wooden sheets that are about 1/4 inch thick. I didn't have any trouble popping the individual pieces out of the sheets. The directions are clear and easy to follow, which was the biggest surprise! I had a few difficulties with the axles, which is why I only gave this four stars.

Tips:
Be sure to put candle wax on all of the parts that have an axle (AKA toothpick). I also found it easier to place the axles in first then add the gears around them - they sort of click in, so doing the axle in the middle of assembling each wheel/gear makes this easier.

I colored mine with Bic markers and Copic markers. Both worked well, but the ink bleeds a little into the wood grain so practice a bit before you color your parts. Also make sure to color the outward-facing side.

For final assembly, you may need to make minor adjustments to the placement of the gears on their axles to get everything to work correctly.

In general, assembly takes a bit more "elbow grease" (ie effort/force) than I expected, but if you're sure to wax the parts you should be okay.

％商品名: Mechanical Theater by Ugears Is 3D Puzzle Wooden Brainteaser for Kids, Teens and Adults
タイトル: Patience and passion and you shall mesmerize with this contraption!
レビュー内容: An enchanting fantasy of an experience to make! The toothpicks are tricky to insert, use needle-nose pliers to grip most of the tooth pick lengthwise and carefully insert them very straight a few mm at a time (it is IMPORTANT to grip MOST of the toothpick as you insert, don't grip just a little section or they will snap). Everything else can be assembled by hand. Don't rush and force anything. It is crucial to make sure you have the exact parts and alignment as shown in the instructions for everything to function properly. It works fantastic after precise assembly and a little fine tuning with candle wax on the tips of the toothpicks (after they are inserted, not before) for smoother lubricated spin. Patience and passion and you shall mesmerize with this contraption!

％商品名: Mechanical Theater by Ugears Is 3D Puzzle Wooden Brainteaser for Kids, Teens and Adults
タイトル: Great quality, fun to build, spins well, I'm a fan!
レビュー内容: Bought this model theater not knowing if it would work as it does in their product demo video. After putting it together in a couple hours and seeing it spin I was so thrilled. I added wax to the gears and used a blow dryer to melt it in a little. Works well!

％商品名: Mechanical Theater by Ugears Is 3D Puzzle Wooden Brainteaser for Kids, Teens and Adults
レビュー内容: I had a great time putting this together. Once I got started, I didn't stop until I was done. The picture only instructions are very easy to follow. This is going to make a neat conversation piece. I am definitely going to get the other items by Ugears.

％商品名: Mechanical Theater by Ugears Is 3D Puzzle Wooden Brainteaser for Kids, Teens and Adults
レビュー内容: It was a very fun project for someone that loves to tinker. Have had several people comment on the looks of the item. It functions better than I thought it would after finally getting it together. Keep up the good work.

％商品名: Mechanical Theater by Ugears Is 3D Puzzle Wooden Brainteaser for Kids, Teens and Adults
タイトル: This was definitely a fun little project
レビュー内容: This was definitely a fun little project. I thought it was going to be difficult to build and I was wrong. I built several models in the past and helped my father build several RC planes. Compared to an RC plane this is a cake walk. If you have never built anything like that you should be ok to work on one of these. JUST be patient with it. The only parts I had trouble removing were these tiny little ends that conceal the tooth picks. They give you extras for good reason. Lucky for me I didn't need them. Go for it guys and gals, it's fun and the end is rewarding. Very good cuts on the wood and this product functions exactly as advertised.

％商品名: Mechanical Theater by Ugears Is 3D Puzzle Wooden Brainteaser for Kids, Teens and Adults
レビュー内容: This whimsical model was fun to assemble and looks great on the mantle. I love the smell of it too, the laser cutting of the pieces gives it a slight aroma of toasted wood. After assembling out, I noticed that the fairy tale characters on the turning gears rotate at different speeds, so they encounter various other characters, which you might user to inspire a different story each time you give it a spin. It took me about 4 hours to assemble.

％商品名: Mechanical Theater by Ugears Is 3D Puzzle Wooden Brainteaser for Kids, Teens and Adults
レビュー内容: We got this for my 11-year-old daughter, and put it together in under an hour. (I helped, but she probably could have done it herself, with more time.) She loves it! The only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is that it is a little rickety, and took some finessing to get the toothpicks inserted and the gears to fit together smoothly. I would buy it again, and will likely try other Ugears products.

％商品名: Mechanical Theater by Ugears Is 3D Puzzle Wooden Brainteaser for Kids, Teens and Adults

％商品名: Revell 1:196 USS Constitution
レビュー内容:
I really love this model kit! I first bought it when I was about 10 (around 1956) and, after finishing it, kept it on a shelf until it gathered so much dust that my mom made me "sink" it in our cellar. This new kit is, as near as I can tell, exactly like my first one. It's beautifully detailed for a model this price and with careful craftsmanship, will provide a ship worthy of your mantlepiece. I preferred to NOT use the plastic sails--which look more cheesy than real. Instead, just run the rigging (with the thread provided) for a great finished look.
After all these years, it's good to know that Revell is still producing quality products for kids--of any age!

％商品名: Revell 1:196 USS Constitution
レビュー内容: This is the first model I have done in many years. Bought it to get started again and have something to do at night since most TV shows stink. The model is well molded with a minimum of flashing on the parts. This model is Small, and I am of geezer age. If your like me you will need plenty of light and tweezers for the parts. I bought this to pass the time and it is doing that for me. Take your time and have fun....remember it is small. I will build another model but next time get a larger scale. This model does come in a larger scale. I may try that one next time.

％商品名: Revell 1:196 USS Constitution
タイトル: This was a great model. I am now working on the 96 ...
レビュー内容: This was a great model. I am now working on the 96 scale now. It will be a great model, which will take me a lot of time to do it.

％商品名: Revell 1:196 USS Constitution
レビュー内容: I am experienced model builder, grandson (9 years old) is not. I bought the 1:96 size for me and the 1:196 for him. There is a few less pieces but we work on the same sections at the same time. It really helps him to understand.

％商品名: Revell 1:196 USS Constitution
レビュー内容: Good detail but not for the beginning model builder. Rigging can get very elaborate and requires far more patience than can be mustered by a pre teen. Great for a father son project.

％商品名: Revell 1:196 USS Constitution
レビュー内容: This was the second ship model i've built (3rd model overall), and it wasn't very hard to build. Considering that this model is 1:196 (about a foot long), the pieces are decent size, but still small. Very easy to piece together the big parts (hull and deck). I reccomend being very careful painting and gluing together this model since it will be very detailed in the end.

％商品名: Revell 1:196 USS Constitution
タイトル: it does produce a nice model if you stay with it
レビュー内容:
Lots of small parts,not crazy about working with plastic..a test of patience
for me but ,it does produce a nice model if you stay with it ! Rigging required
many cups of coffee to complete job ! I would not recommend unless you
have patience & some modeling skills...if you do ,go for it. It's not an exact
replica of the Constitution but does that really matter !

％商品名: Revell 1:196 USS Constitution
レビュー内容: Oh my..I'm so happy I decided to purchase this model for my dad. It arrived in two days and wasn't a prime item. Description accurate and no broken pieces. No damage at all. Sealed. I will be ordering from him again!

％商品名: Revell 1:196 USS Constitution
レビュー内容:
First of all I must say that this is my first try on something like this. I tried to make the ship as detailed as I could and I think it the end result is good, the ship has a lot of little details that make it really look interesting, which is obviously good.
The problem that I have is that I am an adult and it was pretty complicated to put together some things, I do not know if a kid would actually have the patience and ability to make it without getting frustrated. I think the order in the instruction manual is not the better.

％商品名: Revell 1:196 USS Constitution
タイトル: Great kit at a great price.
レビュー内容: This is a great model. It is not for the novice, but someone with a little more experience will find the little challenges welcome. It has great detail for a model of this scale and price. The customer service at Revell was great to work with. One call to replace a part I damaged and they sent it out strait away. I am now a Revell customer for life. Great model, great staff, and great experience.

％商品名: Revell 1:196 USS Constitution
タイトル: ... the box says 12 yrs & up) but it's easily doable in two days
レビュー内容:
This ship isn't intended for the novice modeler (though the box says 12 yrs & up) but it's easily doable in two days, assuming you're already well-stocked in paint & glue and have a decent collection of modeler's tools. Those are the oh-so-important items which you collect over the years that make model-making not only faster & easier but also leave you with a professional-looking project you can be proud of instead of an embarrassing waste of time and money that appears thrown together by an impatient child with shaky hands.
This little tip may be of absolutely no use to anyone, but I use strictly super glue (both liquid & gel) to build plastic scale models, and have for years. It dries quickly and if you're adept with it you need very little to do a good job. Don't laugh until you've tried it.

％商品名: Revell 1:196 USS Constitution
タイトル: The good kit, should make a beautiful finished product but ?
レビュー内容: This is a very promising kit, but it has an incredible number of small parts, and I am unsure when I will have the time to complete it, but I believe it will be a beautiful model when it's done.

％商品名: Revell 1:196 USS Constitution
レビュー内容: I love this ship. Very detail. You need patient to build this up. It took me about 2 month to finish the whole thing. It came out great.

％商品名: Revell 1:196 USS Constitution
レビュー内容:
It took me about a week to build it (about over20 hours). A lot of very small parts that require a lot of patient to glue them together. I had to use a head microscope to work on this project. My son (10 years old) loves watching me to build it and he is very fascinated when the model is completed. Very beatiful ship with a lot of details and it is very nice to display. My wife likes the ship a lot too. When I started building, she was not mind to take a look, she thought it will be a cheap toy ship that could not be display but she changed her mind when she saw it completed.
It is not for kids under 12, it is not easy to build but if you have patient, you should have no problem building it and all the parts are fit perfectly to me.

％商品名: Revell 1:196 USS Constitution
タイトル: Great kit for builders who love adding detail
レビュー内容: I enjoyed building the kit very much. I built it by incorporating the greatest detail possible and using historical accuracy. The kit is great for builders with a lot of patience and experience. The only thing I would change is adding clothe sails as a option to the kit. When complete the kit makes a great display piece, looking forward to building another ship of the same period.

％商品名: Live Cup of Caterpillars with Butterfly Life Cycle Stages
レビュー内容:
I highly recommend doing this project at least once in your life, whether you have kids or not. I did it once several years ago when my teenagers were young. Now I have a two year old and we were learning about caterpillars and butterflies so I decided to do it again with her. She was totally into the whole process and will tell anyone who will listen now that a butterfly lays an egg, then a caterpillar comes out, then the caterpillar hangs upside-down, then it makes a chrysalis, and then the butterfly comes out!

It's a fascinating process to watch. You may wonder how a company can ship live caterpillars without injuring them, but you'll understand when the cup arrives in the mail. The caterpillars at that point are the size of apple seeds and they are safely suspended in silk webs. They also don't move much at all that first day, so don't be alarmed by that. The next morning you'll wake up to find your caterpillars have somehow doubled in size overnight. And you'll continue to notice this day after day. They practically grow before your eyes.

Around day 7 (and I'm counting the days from the date of the arrival of the cup in the mail), our now huge caterpillars became very active and were frantically working at the top of the cup for hours. I had a feeling they were getting ready to pupate because of the sudden change in behavior. As expected, on day 8 they assumed their J positions and began to transform one by one. You would think it would take a while for a caterpillar to become a chrysalis, but it only takes a minute. It is so fast I was never able to catch any of them transforming "live". I would walk out of the room for a minute, go back in, and another one had transformed. So I recommend once your caterpillars get into position, keep a close eye on them so you might catch the transformation live. (If you miss it, there's a lot of YouTube videos where others have caught it.) It amazes me how they go from huge, super active caterpillars to small, hard as a rock statues in a matter of hours.

We did have some bad news though. At some point when they were getting into their J positions one of the caterpillars must have knocked another down from the top, and he was sort of suspended in a web in a j-shape. It wasn't looking good for the poor guy but there wasn't anything I could do to help him without sacrificing the other caterpillars. He did transform, but in the process fell into the food in the bottom of the cup and was laying there in all the muck. Normally you would wait a few days before moving the chrysalids to the enclosure, but I went ahead and moved them the following day because I was concerned for the poor guy at the bottom. I did as the instructions on Insect Lore's site said and carefully moved him out of the cup using a plastic spoon. However, his chrysalis never looked exactly like the others (it was oddly shaped) so I didn't have high hopes for him.

Days 9-15 were boring. After a week of seeing nothing happen, you start to wonder, "are there really living butterflies in there?" But nature is so amazing. On day 16 we woke up and a butterfly must have just emerged as he was just standing there next to the empty shell and hadn't expelled any meconium yet. (Note: when they do that, it's kind of scary. They appear to be bleeding to death. But it's supposed to happen and it's not blood so don't worry about it.) Within minutes the next butterfly emerged. You can tell they are about to come out because suddenly the chrysalis becomes transparent and you can clearly see the wings. If you look at my Day 16 - 10 AM photo you can see that the chrysalis to the right of the butterfly is almost completely transparent and about to emerge any second. The one to the left of the butterfly is starting to darken a bit, which happens about an hour before it turns transparent. The one below and to the left of the butterfly has not yet started to change in appearance at all. And the poor dude laying there on the bottom of the picture was our possible casualty.

Once you notice a change in the chrysalids' appearance, especially when they become transparent, don't blink or you'll miss it. I literally went and brushed my teeth and came back and butterfly #2 was out. So I got the camera ready when #3 became transparent and was able to capture the "birth" on camera, which was fascinating (my 2 year old, of course, loved seeing that). #4 ran about 24 hours behind the others and emerged just before we woke up on day 17. I was just amazed that after a week of "hibernation" 3 of the butterflies emerged within minutes of each other. It's as if they communicate with each other telepathically from the chrysalids and say "ok let's get out of here!"

Caterpillar #5 (The one who fell while pupating) is a mystery to me. I thought he was a goner. His chrysalis never looked quite right. Then on day 17 after #4 emerged, #5's chrysalis started looking really bad. It turned this dark greenish black color and started oozing. It had a horribly deformed shape. We could see pieces of the butterfly through it, but it looked deader than dead. I let it rest for several hours in that state and saw no change. So I took the really sorry looking chrysalis out of the enclosure, considered it a casualty and planned to bring it out to the garden later. I was quite shocked when I went back into the kitchen an hour later and there was a butterfly on my kitchen counter. I have no idea how on earth a living creature came out of that rotten-looking chrysalis, but there he was. I was shocked. I put him in the enclosure with the other butterflies and he was walking around and doing ok. Unfortunately he has deformed, underdeveloped wings and will never fly. I don't have the heart to kill him, so I'm just going to let him live out his 2 weeks of life in the butterfly enclosure. Poor little dude.

Overall, this is just a really inexpensive way to entertain your kids (and yourself) for about 3 weeks and it will give you a new-found appreciation for nature's wonders.

Update: Just thought I'd add in here that our deformed butterfly actually lived a full and happy butterfly life (2 weeks) in the enclosure sipping oranges. I couldn't believe it!

％商品名: Live Cup of Caterpillars with Butterfly Life Cycle Stages
タイトル: LOVED the caterpillar to butterfly project!
レビュー内容: We LOVED the caterpillar to butterfly project! My 3 year old grand-daughter watched in amazement as the tiny caterpillars transformed over about 3 weeks into butterflies. We got lucky and received 6. (I think it is supposed to be 5/cup.) All 6 matured into beautiful butterflies. Mya learned what a chrysalis is. She gently took each butterfly out of the butterfly enclosure to set it free. The butterfly enclosure was purchased on Amazon & it is collapsible. A WONDERFUL project for grandparents, parents, schools...anyone!!! Note - Read & Follow the directions and everything will work fine. We were worried that our caterpillars needed more air or food, but we left the lid on the cup as instructed. Don't put a cup of water in the butterfly habitat, as the baby butterflies can fall into it & drown...use the dropper provided & sprinkle sugar water over fruit & flowers. They will gobble it up! Amazing to watch. :)

％商品名: Live Cup of Caterpillars with Butterfly Life Cycle Stages
レビュー内容: We ordered this through amazon instead of the insect lore website so that we could get free/fast shipping. They actually arrived very quickly, a day before their habitat did. UPS just left them sitting on my door step but they were fine. We got 5 live caterpillars and 4 made it to be butterflies! We are very pleased with the experience, my 7yr old was in heaven:) FYI getting the chrysalises into the habitat was pretty gross.

％商品名: Live Cup of Caterpillars with Butterfly Life Cycle Stages
タイトル: The first time worked great; the caterpillars were all alive and after a ...
レビュー内容: My 1-star review is related to the company and not the concept of the product. This is the second time we've ordered live caterpillars. The first time worked great; the caterpillars were all alive and after a few weeks we had five beautiful butterflies to enjoy. The second time two of five caterpillars arrived dead and the other three were dead within a couple days. I contacted Insect Lore regarding their live insect guarantee within the time required for the guarantee to find out what the process was to get a replacement. We sent several emails back and forth, and they requested photos of the caterpillars which I sent. I explained to them that I had marked the location of the caterpillars in the cup and they had not moved. They just sent back canned responses saying that everything looked fine even going so far as to refer to my order of "ladybug larvae" instead of caterpillars. It became clear that they were not paying attention to anything I said so I gave them one more chance to honor their guarantee and I received no further responses from them. Fortunately Amazon provided a hassle free return.

％商品名: Live Cup of Caterpillars with Butterfly Life Cycle Stages
レビュー内容:
I was skeptical when ordering this of course, but I figured why not I'm just going to feed them to my chameleon. When I got them I was pleasantly surprised that all 5 caterpillars were alive. Even more surprising all 5 made chrysalis and all 5 hatched. Learned something new as well painted lady chrysalis MOVE when disturbed and even if they fall they'll still hatch and if they can climb something they'll not be deformed in anyway. 3 of the 5 did wind-up as tasty snacks for my chameleon. It was funny watching him hunt them down. I ended up letting 2 of them go since they are native to....everywhere in the US.
Would I buy again? Yes, but not for the price I payed. I spend a lot of $ on insects for my chameleon and while he did seem to enjoy these guys and it gave him something to hunt. The price is a little steep for 5 butterflies that might not be alive when received, might not survive to form chrysalis, might died during chrysalis stage, only to end up lizard food. At the end of the season when prices drop I may order again.

％商品名: Live Cup of Caterpillars with Butterfly Life Cycle Stages
レビュー内容: I purchased this Live Culture of Caterpillars for my kids. They are 3, and 7. We received 5 live caterpillars. They are currently in the cocoon process, and all 5 of ours have made it this far. We simply followed the directions, and have been enjoying watching them grow, change, and cocoon. It's extremely fun and exciting for our whole family. My Husband and I included have really enjoyed this. They come with all the food they need while in the caterpillar stage. It comes with clear, and easy to understand step by step directions. I would recommend this to anyone with little kids. It's a very fun thing to do with them. We have a butterfly garden to transfer them into once it is time, and then we will let them go. I plan to do this every Spring, for a fun tradition. It's also a great learning experience!

レビュー内容: We order these every year and have never been disappointed. I was sorry that they have changed to a chryislis station as opposed to being able to pin the disc in the top of our habitat. ％商品名: Live Cup of Caterpillars with Butterfly Life Cycle Stages
レビュー内容:
I don't even know where to start.
If I had spoken to someone about growing some butterflies/caterpillars, I wouldn't have done it.
I got this as a cool project to do with my four year old. The directions gave a timeframe much different (faster) than what it actually happened. It kept saying it would take many days for them to turn into chrysalides, and then into butterflies and this happened in a matter of 1-2 days, which would've been fine, but the way I planned it was around our parenting schedule with my ex-husband. My son missed a few things by being at his dad's
In the end, we got 2 healthy butterflies, one never came out of the cocoon and the other two were injured and then died. Again, my son was away when they "hatched". Then I also had to explain the dead and injured butterflies when he came home...
These also came in a little sad cup, sorry, but thats as best as I can describe it.
I spoke to some friends, and there are other healthier ways to grow butterflies. We are not going to help save some monarchs and then release them.

％商品名: Live Cup of Caterpillars with Butterfly Life Cycle Stages
タイトル: A treasured experience for my Kindergarten class
レビュー内容: I am a Kindergarten teacher and I order these every year for my class in the spring. It is, by far, one of the things they remember the most about Kindergarten: watching the metamorphosis from caterpillar to chrysalis to butterfly. It is always a little bit sad and a little bit happy to release the butterflies after all that time we spent watching, observing, taking notes, discussing, and learning about the butterfly life cycle. The kids get SO much out of this experience. It is worth every penny and then some.

レビュー内容: Caterpillars arrived alive and grew fast, it was lots of fun to watch them turn into pretty butterflies! Wish there was wider choice of butterflies, we are growing painted ladies allready for 3 years in row!)) it is our tradition and kids can't wait to get those caterpillars.

タイトル: ... of 5 caterpillars made it and we are so happy we were able to see and still have little ...
レビュー内容: 4 out of 5 caterpillars made it and we are so happy we were able to see and still have little figurines to remember them by. They were great for our little homeschool group. Truly neat to see the caterpillars grow before your own eyes, harden then come out of chrysalises to majestic butterflies. Kids love them so much that we were a bit sad to let them go :)

％商品名: Live Cup of Caterpillars with Butterfly Life Cycle Stages
レビュー内容:
This product is without a doubt the coolest thing I have ever purchased my son. My son is four and obsessed with animals and science, learning a lot from Wild Kratts. This product was right up his alley! We got the caterpillars quickly in the mail and followed all of the instructions, which are easy, we also purchased a butterfly habitat for the chrysallides once they began to form. The caterpillar container has all the food the caterpillars will need so you literally just watch them grow and grow until the attach to the removable tray at the top of the container. All of my caterpillars formed their chrysallides within a day or two of each other at which point we moved them into the habitat and waited for them to emerge.

One thing the manual tells you is to put something down under the butterfly habitat to protect your furniture underneath it, a warning I did not heed and maybe should have. I did not expect to see the blood that came from the emergence of the butterfly. It's not a ton but it is enough that it might get on something that shouldn't have blood on it if the surface is not protected.

My son had a BLAST checking his butterflies and caterpillars every morning. When the butterflies all hatched, allowing a good day for them to get their wings stiffened for flight, we set them free. I'm not a butterfly handler so we chose to wait and watch them fly out on their own, which was quite awesome to experience!

I would recommend this product and have recommended it to every person who is thinking about doing something cool and plan to do this with my kids every spring!

％商品名: Live Cup of Caterpillars with Butterfly Life Cycle Stages
レビュー内容: Our caterpillars arrived quickly and soon set about growing. They are now chrysalides and we look forward to watching them emerge. My 3 year old has been learning about caterpillars and butterflies and is very excited! We cannot wait to experience this with him.

％商品名: Revell Poe's X-Wing Fighter Building Kit
タイトル: The sound effect is also not as cool/laud as some others (TIE fighter sounds the best IMO). Nevertheless
レビュー内容:
I've got 6 Star Wars Build & Play models for my 4 Y.O. boy so far. I think this one is one of the first models in the Build & Play series. While all the others I've got have both "light" and sound effects, this one (and the other X-Wing with white & blue camo) has sound effects only. The sound effect is also not as cool/laud as some others (TIE fighter sounds the best IMO). Nevertheless, you can't skip this one if your kid wants a Star Wars Build & Play model I guess. One good side of this is that this one has a little higher chance to survive in your kid's hands, compared to the Level 2 X-Wing from Revell. The Level-2 X-Wing lasted a week or so (My son is extremely cautious when handling his toys) before its super thin laser cannons shafts were bent and some parts fall off. I don't see any advantage of buying Level-2 X-Wing over this one. This Level-1 model looks as good as the level-2 X-Wing.

Compared to other Build & Play models, this and the other X-Wings are exactly the same except for the color. The difficulty is on the low side. If you want to introduce this series to your child before the recommended age (8+), this can be a good starting point. You may also want to try TIE Fighter or Millennium Falcon. I wouldn't start with AT-AT though.
