％商品名: Revell Poe's X-Wing Fighter Building Kit
レビュー内容: Wow! Way better than we expected! Bought three others from this collection and all have been fantastic!

％商品名: Revell Poe's X-Wing Fighter Building Kit
レビュー内容: Excellent model. A great improvement over the glue/paint/mess of my model building days. Getting the whole line of ships.

％商品名: Revell Poe's X-Wing Fighter Building Kit
レビュー内容: delicious, great, excellent.

％商品名: Revell Poe's X-Wing Fighter Building Kit
タイトル: Are you a 90s Action Fleet collector like myself? This product is as close as it gets
レビュー内容:
What an awesome model/toy. I would consider it more of a model, it's sturdy but don't think this thing can't break on you. It only takes about 5 minutes to assemble and the addition of sounds really brings this piece together.

I grew up on the 90's galoob star wars line of toys, the micro machines and action fleet series. In terms of scale, they are bigger than the action fleet x-wings but maybe only by an inch or so length and width wise. A downside of this is that there is no pilot, I hope they introduce some micro machine style pilots for these things down the road. I actually tried to fit one of my old galoob pilots in but they don't comfortably fit in the seat, though you can maneuver them in there. Also I'm not sure why they don't include a stand, I still give it 5 stars because of how much it reminds me of action fleet toys and the price is really great. Another minor gripe is the landing gear doesn't retract on the wings like the old Action Fleet toys did, but they are easily removable.

Check out the pictures for scale, and how my pilot fits in the cockpit

％商品名: Revell Poe's X-Wing Fighter Building Kit
レビュー内容: Very good and better than the hasbro x-wing. The only thing I don't like is that the paint job is very light and the laser canons are turned on their side (which is not correct) - most likely to make it easier for them to mass produce this.

％商品名: Revell Poe's X-Wing Fighter Building Kit
レビュー内容: I'm a huge Star Wars fan so I love this . Some of my grapes are that only the front landing gear folds. The real in gear are there is left on . I understand it's a model but it's also still a bit flimsy and so you have to be careful with this . Everything connects together easily however if you wanted to be permanent you're going to need to use some glue. Everything connects together easily however if you wanted to be permanent you're going to need to use some glue

％商品名: Revell Poe's X-Wing Fighter Building Kit
タイトル: Received one with an ill-fitting piece that falls out when picked up
レビュー内容: I gifted this to one of my cousins for Christmas and he LOVES it (he loves all things Star Wars), but there's a piece that constantly falls out when he picks it up to play with it. It's just very ill-fitting in the spot it's supposed to be, so would need to be super-glued in. He's about given up on fixing the one loose piece and just accepting it as it is, which made me a bit disappointed in the purchase.

％商品名: Revell Poe's X-Wing Fighter Building Kit
レビュー内容: I usually don’t write reviews but we bought 4 of these Snaptite Star Wars models for my boys for Christmas. I’m impressed! These aren’t like the ones we had in the 1980’s, flimsy thin plastic that was easy to break. These are solid, the plastic is thick, and they have batteries in them and make sound! I’d almost say they are toys. The boys love them. Highly recommend!

％商品名: Revell Poe's X-Wing Fighter Building Kit
レビュー内容: Easy to assemble and my son likes it. It makes some short noises when you push the button on top. They have to use their imagination to play with it which I like. I suggest using a little glue when putting it together, we have had this start to come apart a few times

％商品名: Revell Poe's X-Wing Fighter Building Kit
タイトル: This Is A Very Durable And Easy To Construct Model Not A Toy
レビュー内容:
First things first, this is a very durable model not a toy. If you keep this in mind you won't allow your kids to try and crash this into a wall or drop it from a table and you will find this to be a very good product. The Skill Level required to build this is Level 1 so it is intended to be for beginners or kids with little to no experience with models. My 10 year old son was able to put this together in about 10-15 minutes without my assistance and he has only limited experience with building things. Once this model is built it is very durable and will be able to withstand light play by older children. The intended age group is 8 years so any child under this age will likely destroy this model.

Once this model is put together you will find that the attention to detail is very impressive. The fact that it comes pre-painted makes it look even more impressive. Pressing on the droid behind the cockpit activates the sound which is a nice bonus. The one big downside to this is that the rear landing gear do not retract even though the front one does.

Also worth noting is that the construction is almost too easy, even for a level one kit. Some may be disappointed that the building experience is so limited and so short. For comparison, a Lego Star Wars building kit is far more difficult to build but at least offer hours of patience and honing of fine motor skills before your kids can enjoy them. This kit only provides a one time building experience of less than 20 minutes.

％商品名: Revell Poe's X-Wing Fighter Building Kit
タイトル: Love it, the back of the X-Wing doesn't stay ...
レビュー内容:
Love it, the back of the X-Wing doesn't stay "shut" when you open the wings up, but with a little super glue it was easily fixed.
Great quality, crisp edges in the cuts, a large amount of detail. Definitely worth the buy.

％商品名: Revell Poe's X-Wing Fighter Building Kit
タイトル: Amazing detail and qualty for a snap together model
レビュー内容:
I picked this, the Tie Fighers, and Millennium Falcon from this manufacturer. The Tie Figher and the X-wing here look good. A surprising amount of detail for a snap-tite model. Not at all what they had in the 70's when I was a kid building real models with glue and paint.

This is a little more off scale than the Tie Fighter, which is the larger of the three I got, but it's at least not as tiny as the Falcon was.

For the price, it's a great representation of the ship, especially for someone like my son who hasn't built a real model yet, just did Lego and Megablok things.

％商品名: Revell Poe's X-Wing Fighter Building Kit
タイトル: While it lack detail paint, and the turbo-lasers are ...
レビュー内容: While it lack detail paint, and the turbo-lasers are oriented incorrectly, this model is REALLY well made (as are the other models in this series.) The parts fit together extremely well without glue, and have decent mold detail and some amount of pre-painted art. The lights/sound are a bonus!

％商品名: Revell Poe's X-Wing Fighter Building Kit
タイトル: Great model/toy for kids -- if you're looking for something more complex, move up to a model requiring glue and paint
レビュー内容: I'm just going to duplicate my review for the Resistance version of this model, since they are essentially the same. This is a great kit for kids, because it starts them out in the realm of model building in an easy fashion. Make no mistake, this is simply snapping pieces together, but you still have to do it correctly by following directions. The sound effects are a big plus, and I love the fact that once it's assembled, it's sturdy enough that my 8 year old son can actually play with it. The detail and quality is very high, which I would only expect from Revell. The only nit I have to pick with it is that the tips of the laser cannons are not oriented correctly. They should be vertical instead of horizontal. It would also be nice if the rear landing gear was somehow able to retract into the engine housing instead of having to be removed completely for flight. I'm just waiting for them to disappear. Still, I do not think either of these is enough to warrant losing a whole star -- maybe half of a star.

％商品名: Revell Poe's X-Wing Fighter Building Kit
タイトル: simple parts that are fun to snap together
レビュー内容:
It's mostly well painted and accurate, made from large, simple parts that are fun to snap together. The cockpit window joint has the sturdiness of a toy rather than a model. While the wings are a tad rattly when spread, they hold their place. All the colors on the box are there, finely pre-painted, except the black on the inside of the engines.

The biggest flaw is BB-8's gigantic (if detailed) head looming out the top of an otherwise sleek vehicle. I know it's partly a toy that makes laser noises, but two of the landing gear are detachable rather than folding so it could have a more movie-accurate shape. I wish they took that further and made BB-8 a small, white peg of a button rather than the most prominently visible feature. He's so huge, he's one size away from wearing the ship. As much as I'd love to watch Big Burly 8 go flattening entire platoons of Stormtroopers with his girth, he's out of place on this toy.

％商品名: Fascinations Metal Earth Wright Brothers Airplane 3D Metal Model Kit
タイトル: A fantastic challenge of patience and attention to detail.
レビュー内容:
I simply do NOT understand the negative reviews.
Let me address the two most common complaints:

Common complaint 1: "These are not for kids"
response: No, no they are not. nowhere does the product imply it is for young children, and giving the product a bad review because your kids cant put it together is simply daft. In-fact the product description clearly states it is ideal for "tweens" and older. That's a bare minimum age of 10. And that's no guarantee that it's appropriate for your kid. Maybe your 6 year old has extremely developed motor skills and patience and this model is perfect for them, and maybe you are 40 and don't have the level of motor skills and patience necessary for these models, it all depends on the user, so don't give a perfectly good product a bad review due to user error.

Common complaint 2: "these are made of flimsy, low quality metal"
response: yes, they are flimsy. no, the metal is not low quality. it's a thin sheet of steel, the product explicitly says that it is thin, ergo the end result is delicate. it is a model, NOT A TOY. if the metal were any thicker, the end results wouldn't look good at all. they are supposed to be thin. You cannot be clumsy with these models. you have to use the proper tools, have steady hands and pay attention. That is the challenge, and that is why finishing the model is so rewarding.

I'm usually not so combative with other reviewers, but after having such a good evening with a couple of these models, it irritated me that people wrote negative reviews on them simply because they had personal problems with them. They are well engineered, and there is nothing wrong with them. They look great on a shelf when you finish them and they are a challenge to build, especially with this particularly delicate one!

％商品名: Fascinations Metal Earth Wright Brothers Airplane 3D Metal Model Kit
タイトル: Quite a challenge but could be a lot better with better instructions
レビュー内容:
I am a usually patient 68-year-old great grandfather with years of model building experience and I thought this model would be interesting is as I was fascinated by the Wright Brothers' story and even visited Dayton last Summer and got an up close look at a recreation of their flyer.

The model is quite small and the metal can withstand a bit of manhandling but the assembly directions are cryptic pictures that are not very helpful in a couple of steps. I almost completed the model but one of the steps was not specific enough and directed me to attach the top wing to the almost-finished model before sub-assembling and attaching the rear struts. This made it impossible to connect the tops of the struts to the bottom of the top wing. From there, I was also not able the tail wings either. I gave up and threw it all away.

％商品名: Fascinations Metal Earth Wright Brothers Airplane 3D Metal Model Kit
タイトル: The rest of the models like this have had alright instructions
レビュー内容:
I've gotten these kits before, and they can be a bit of a challenge to put together. However I've never had issues with it before. The instructions for this model leave much to be desired, and when I put one piece on backwards it was a mistake I could not fix.

The rest of the models like this have had alright instructions, this one however makes it difficult to do it right.

％商品名: Fascinations Metal Earth Wright Brothers Airplane 3D Metal Model Kit
タイトル: I enjoy these doing these models
レビュー内容: I enjoy these doing these models, however, this one had some missing slots, so the final product wasn't display worthy.

％商品名: Fascinations Metal Earth Wright Brothers Airplane 3D Metal Model Kit
レビュー内容: Make sure you have a pair of needle nose pliers, and time. These suckers are not quick put me togethers but they are stunning once finished.

％商品名: Fascinations Metal Earth Wright Brothers Airplane 3D Metal Model Kit
レビュー内容: Wow!, enjoyed assembling it, cannot believe the quality of this plane.

％商品名: Fascinations Metal Earth Wright Brothers Airplane 3D Metal Model Kit
レビュー内容: These kits are amazing. The detail is unreal. But I am in my 50s and the kits are so small that I was unable to see the tiny tabs that have to be bent to hold the pieces together. I couldn't make the 2 that I had purchased. But if you can see well they would not be difficult to make and do look great when they are completed.

％商品名: Fascinations Metal Earth Wright Brothers Airplane 3D Metal Model Kit
タイトル: Looks Wonderful, but Think Before You Buy!
レビュー内容:
These products look amazing and highly detailed! But they can be extremely hard to assemble as the bend tabs are extremely small and can be hard to reach later in the process. Your fingers will be very mad at you by the time you're done.
Pliers are your friend through this time but they won't always reach and they can scratch up the finish. The other thing that really irritated me was that they are very small once finished. I was hoping they would be at least 6-8 inches across, but they are more like 2-4 inches across.
I used this as a part of a present for my friend, and it did the trick, but think before you buy. I love a good time putting something together, but this was pushing my boundaries of fun.

％商品名: Fascinations Metal Earth Wright Brothers Airplane 3D Metal Model Kit
レビュー内容: Poor, VERY poor 'pin' placements. Parts CAN be shaped as shown in the mediocre directions, but the amount of effort for something so small isn't worth it. They look great in the pics, but not worth the effort.

％商品名: Fascinations Metal Earth Wright Brothers Airplane 3D Metal Model Kit
レビュー内容: This is a beautiful model and is difficult to do. There are a couple of tricks to make it work. The most important is to twist the tabs after they are fitted into the slots. This helps prevent bending the parts that are being joined. The engine needs to be assembled so the longer belt side is positioned to the right when viewed from the front. I did mine wrong and it prevents me from attaching the braces for the propellers to the engine pulleys. Because the tabs are delicate, I can't disassemble the plane to fix this. I also assembled one of the wing brace boxes incorrectly and broke a tab when I disassembled the box. I was able to use some clear tape to hold it together after I mounted it to the wings. Not perfect but it works. The braces that the propellers mount to require that the parts where the tabs are (Not the tabs themselves) be bent to form a "C" to allow the propeller to be mounted. I'm 58 so lots and lots of light were needed for me to see what I was doing. A must have is a pair of needle nose pliers. I cut the end off of a tooth pick so I could use the flat end to push parts around but it may not be necessary for those more talented than me. In spite of the error I made that prevents me from attaching the braces to the engine pulleys, I have built a very fine model. It was very challenging but I was thrilled with the result and will be purchasing another model of a different kind soon.

％商品名: Fascinations Metal Earth Wright Brothers Airplane 3D Metal Model Kit
タイトル: Excellent first build for the young person or new model builder.
レビュー内容: I give this five stars because it is an excellent beginner build for these 3D metal sets. It has few parts (comes on just one sheet) and only one tough bend is required. I didn't think my 10yr old could build one of these with me because of the fine motor skills and patience required, but lo an behold my boy loved it. He built about 90 percent of it with me doing a couple of the tougher connections. He has ADD, but the focus required for this model had him dialed in tight. The model came out perfect. The people putting out bad reviews stating that these models are poorly built couldn't be more wrong. They are very small and delicate, but deliberately so. They are not beginner models, they are challenging on purpose. The reward for your patience is the huge sense of accomplishment and a gorgeous little model that will impress anyone you show it to.

％商品名: Fascinations Metal Earth Wright Brothers Airplane 3D Metal Model Kit
タイトル: Great piece to add to my collection!
レビュー内容: This one here was very, very easy to build. There wasn't any part that I found particularly hard, and this is my very second model, right after the Sporit of St. Louis which was my fist model. I have one model on top of each of my speakers and they look great

％商品名: Fascinations Metal Earth Wright Brothers Airplane 3D Metal Model Kit
タイトル: I read with great enthusiasm of the Wright Brothers and their quest of ...
レビュー内容: As a young boy, I read with great enthusiasm of the Wright Brothers and their quest of powered flight. I enjoyed assembling this kit in particular, as this is the fifth Metal Earth kit I have assembled. For all those who have written bad reviews on these kits, I encourage you to continue because they seem to get easier as you assemble more of them. My next kit is the China Clipper, then perhaps one of the space shuttles.

％商品名: Fascinations Metal Earth Wright Brothers Airplane 3D Metal Model Kit
レビュー内容: The pieces are very thin and you need a pair of pliers to get them in the proper position. I started the project with a 12 year old, and while the instructions were easy, it was a challenge even for myself to bend the tabs without wrecking the whole piece. I can French tip my own nails and my hands still weren't steady enough. I hope to try again, but gave up in frustration.

％商品名: Fascinations Metal Earth Wright Brothers Airplane 3D Metal Model Kit
レビュー内容: These are not toys, they are very intricate models that require attention to detail and precise placement. I not saw one bad review, obviously that person has never built a model. This is a good one for model lovers who hate glue and paint!

％商品名: Fascinations Metal Earth Wright Brothers Airplane 3D Metal Model Kit
タイトル: He seemed to really enjoy them and asked for more
レビュー内容: I got a few of these for my boyfriend while he was deployed to give him some entertainment. He seemed to really enjoy them and asked for more. When he got home he finished one that he had left over, and it seemed to only take him 30 minutes or so. Good quality item, and fun for people with mechanical minds.

％商品名: Fascinations Metal Earth Wright Brothers Airplane 3D Metal Model Kit
レビュー内容: This product is a complete sham... I can't believe that amazon would even allow these con artists to post such a product. When the package arrived I expected it to be METAL like the description said. It was worse them aluminum foil. I couldn't even build it because the pieces break when you try to remove them.

％商品名: Fascinations Metal Earth Wright Brothers Airplane 3D Metal Model Kit
タイトル: this one is the easiest one and might be a good start if you want to build your first one
レビュー内容: Compared to the other 3D laser cut models, this one is the easiest one and might be a good start if you want to build your first one. The instruction menu is not very clear and the manufacturer only provides pictures of the finished product on the internet. The parts are tiny so assemble them in a well lit location with small pliers is a good idea. Overall I enjoyed the build and will recommend this one to those who are interested in this type of models.

％商品名: Fascinations Metal Earth Wright Brothers Airplane 3D Metal Model Kit
レビュー内容: I have made about 12 of these and was very excited to make this model. I'm sure it is accurate and it was a relatively fun build but in the end and this is more the wright brothers fault it wasn't as cool looking as I thought it would be. Thus making any argument I have against a model of their plane invalid. If you like these models maybe get it only after you have built others unless you really like the Wright Bros. plane itself.

％商品名: Fascinations Metal Earth Wright Brothers Airplane 3D Metal Model Kit
レビュー内容: I bought this for my husband and it took him about an hour to put it together. I would not recommend for small children as it is VERY detail oriented and has numerous small pieces. My husband, however, loves it and it comes out looking exactly like the picture :)

％商品名: Crayola Model Magic Deluxe Variety Pack, 14 single packs, Net 7 OZ
タイトル: love the clay - the packs are small
レビュー内容: They are tiny packets - but my kids really love this clay. It is soft and moldable like playdoh, but it air dries so they can keep their creations. It was a nice treat for them.

％商品名: Crayola Model Magic Deluxe Variety Pack, 14 single packs, Net 7 OZ
タイトル: Easy to use! Easy to mold!
レビュー内容: This was a great alternative to playdoh or clay! This is very moldable material! Used this for my ELL students as we discussed idioms. After students discussed different idioms they were required to shape the material to encompass an idiom such as making a piece of cake, or a flying pig. Worked very well. This dough is a little sticky though, so once colors were put together there wasn't a chance to take them apart. I really liked how there were no crumbly pieces too!

％商品名: Crayola Model Magic Deluxe Variety Pack, 14 single packs, Net 7 OZ
レビュー内容: We love the Crayola Model Magic. It seems a bit expensive, but the kids spend hours molding different scenes and animals. The variety of colors is fantastic, and when it dries, it doesn't crack or crumble like Play-Doh. It maintains its soft appearance and dries like hard foam. If you don't let it dry out, you can re-use it over and over! Although, I now have little model magic creatures all around my house so it's about time to order more. But I love it! I would recommend it to any parent whose kids love to sculpt and mold with clay.

％商品名: Crayola Model Magic Deluxe Variety Pack, 14 single packs, Net 7 OZ
レビュー内容: We got a small sample of this in a crayola kit I bought my grandkids for Christmas. They couldn't wait to get more. I love that there is no mess to using this, it dries overnight, and is super lightweight. There is plenty of product in this pack for three or four kids to make a couple of projects. I also bought Model magic glossy glaze and that was a hit as well. We will be purchasing more in the future.

％商品名: Crayola Model Magic Deluxe Variety Pack, 14 single packs, Net 7 OZ
レビュー内容: Bought this for my psychotherapy practice, and my child patients love it! Lots of bright colors, the material is soft and stretchy and fun/soothing to play with, and does not dry out easily, so we could make lots of different models. Final product dries within 3 days.

％商品名: Crayola Model Magic Deluxe Variety Pack, 14 single packs, Net 7 OZ
タイトル: So much fun to play with this stuff and perfect to create ...
レビュー内容: So much fun to play with this stuff and perfect to create things. Just like clay but less mess and no oven needed. Just leave it out for 2 days and 2 nights and it will dry hard. The air dries it so to keep it soft and pliable, be sure to put it in a ziplock baggy.

％商品名: Crayola Model Magic Deluxe Variety Pack, 14 single packs, Net 7 OZ
レビュー内容: This stuff is so much fun and easy to use! It doesn't crack or flake or get hard as a rock like regular clay does. It doesn't stain hands or clothes. It air dries fairly quickly and looks especially great when used with Model Magic clay glaze. The colors are beautiful and don't fade after the Model Magic dries. We'll keep buying this stuff as long as our daughter loves playing with it!

％商品名: Crayola Model Magic Deluxe Variety Pack, 14 single packs, Net 7 OZ
レビュー内容: My Granddaughter adores this, and it doesn't get stuck in the carpet like Play-Doh. Unfortunately, it's a little stiff to put through the extruder, so that's less than ideal. If we keep it in a little snack ziplock and carefully evacuate all the air, it lasts awhile after it's opened.

％商品名: Crayola Model Magic Deluxe Variety Pack, 14 single packs, Net 7 OZ
レビュー内容: Growing up, I remember clay bits stuck everywhere, making clean-up a chore. I'm a huge fan of Crayola's Model Magic clay - you can air-dry or re-use by putting them back into the foil package. Clean-up is super easy, though might stain certain surfaces (we use a flattened cardboard box). Highly recommend - non-toxic and made in the USA. We were gifted the Play-Doh clay several years ago and kid had an allergic skin reaction to it. So far, we're good with Crayola's Model Magic clay!

％商品名: Crayola Model Magic Deluxe Variety Pack, 14 single packs, Net 7 OZ

％商品名: Metals Batman V Superman 1:24 Batmobile Model Kit
タイトル: Do you bleed? You WILL for this replica!
レビュー内容: Phenomenal! The detail on this piece is fantastic considering the price point. I cancelled my $160 pre-order for the Hot Wheels Elite for this version. This one is a little smaller (1:24 - about 9 in- instead of 1:18 scale), but well worth the price! Assembly was not difficult. This is a spectacular display piece. The Hot Wheels Elite will be a much better "hands on" display with more intricate cockpit details, but Jada Toys fits my needs perfectly. I have this displayed in a dust proof acrylic box, so no one will be opening the cockpit to look. Don't get me wrong, the cockpit has some nice detail- but, not as good as the promo pics that Hot Wheels Elite or Hot Toys have released. I'm a HUGE Batman fan and Statue collector. This is my first Batmobile replica. I'd rather spend the big money on figures or busts. I'm very proud of the piece in my display, and you really can't beat the value you get for your buck here! If you can't wait for the release, or don't want to shell out +$150 for Hot Wheels Elite or Hot Toys, I HIGHLY recommend this exceptional alternative.

％商品名: Metals Batman V Superman 1:24 Batmobile Model Kit
レビュー内容: This is awesome. Here are some photos after I put it together

％商品名: Metals Batman V Superman 1:24 Batmobile Model Kit
レビュー内容: This model is a winner. Nicely made, but a little tricky to assemble. Some things to watch out for: 1. make sure you are using the proper screws. The kit comes with 2 coarse and 8 fine threaded screws. The coarse screws attach the rear fender. 2. In the instructions (which is mainly pictures) the axles are opposite what it looks like. The short one goes with the back tires and the long one goes in the front. 3. Caution, when putting the bottom of the car on. Leave the back end loose so you can slip the brake drums on before tightening the screws all the way. Never - the - less, once the kit is completed you can stand back and admire what might become a all-time favorite Batmobile.

％商品名: Metals Batman V Superman 1:24 Batmobile Model Kit
タイトル: Amazing looking Batmobile; just like the movie. Great value.
レビュー内容: The quality of this product exceeded my expectations. Jada impresses me with the value you get for your money. Their products (this Batmobile and the die cast Batman v Superman figures) are very well made and all look great. This Batmobile was pretty easy to put together. Although, I did need to watch a YouTube video for how to correctly connect the pieces around the back tires. Once put together, the car is solid and VERY cool. The cockpit doors "wings" open like the car from the movie. I display this car. I don't think I would recommend that a young kid actually plays with it. Although it is pretty sturdy, I can envision pieces breaking off during play.

％商品名: Metals Batman V Superman 1:24 Batmobile Model Kit
タイトル: An Awesome Model of the Batmobile!
レビュー内容: This model was super easy to put together and only took around 15mins all together. I'm a huge Batman fan and this batmobile is in my top 3, so I have been collecting different versions of this (Lego, R/C, and so on), So far this is the best model out there.

％商品名: Metals Batman V Superman 1:24 Batmobile Model Kit
レビュー内容: Good quality, top cover is the real metal piece, openable doors. Great purchase before the movie release.

％商品名: Metals Batman V Superman 1:24 Batmobile Model Kit
レビュー内容:
I have to say, that so far, EVERYTHING I have purchased from the Batman v Superman series has been very impressive. Including this piece.
It seems like no effort has been spared in delivering a good quality piece.Worth the purchase price.

％商品名: Metals Batman V Superman 1:24 Batmobile Model Kit
レビュー内容: Good size model, sturdy, and not to hard to assemble. Love it! Just in time for the movie too.

％商品名: Metals Batman V Superman 1:24 Batmobile Model Kit
タイトル: It was a sweet surprise to find this excellent representation of the upcoming ...
レビュー内容: It was a sweet surprise to find this excellent representation of the upcoming Bat-mobile from a company I have not heard to much about. The build was easy, and the end result is sturdy. The look is great, and die-cast ads just that little extra. A reviewer on YouTube said this is about a 1:18 scale, but trust me, it's 1:25. Smaller, but still a good size. If Jada made a 1:18 with this quality, I'd get it (it would ad about another 2-3 inches in length. This is well worth it folks! I recommend it!

％商品名: Metals Batman V Superman 1:24 Batmobile Model Kit
タイトル: This is a great model for the money
レビュー内容: This is a great model for the money. It's 1/24 scale so it's a bit larger than most models and the details are very good for a die cast kit. It has an opening canopy (doesn't open the way it does in the movie but at least it opens) to reveal a decently detailed cockpit. The only trouble I had with assembly was the wheels; it's difficult to get the axles into the wheels far enough so that the tires clear the fenders but with some struggling you get there. All in all an excellent, affordable replica.

％商品名: Metals Batman V Superman 1:24 Batmobile Model Kit
タイトル: ... for my husband for his birthday and it's a good size. He had fun putting it together and ...
レビュー内容: I bought this for my husband for his birthday and it's a good size. He had fun putting it together and had a bit of a hard time with two small pieces on the back but was able to figure them out fairly quick. The rest of the assembling was easy and fun. The doors open and there's a lot of detail in the inside of the car. he loves this car.

％商品名: Metals Batman V Superman 1:24 Batmobile Model Kit
レビュー内容: Affordable good looking kit. Totally worth it.

％商品名: Metals Batman V Superman 1:24 Batmobile Model Kit
レビュー内容: Great Batmobile. You can't beat the price for a mostly metal model. The materials are well made, and well colored. The paint has a used effect to it giving it a battle tested look. I would recommend this Batmobile for collecting or play time. Not that a grown man would play with a Batmobile?!?

レビュー内容: love it

％商品名: Crayola Model Magic 4 Oz: White
レビュー内容:
I purchased this before Christmas in order to make an ornament of my baby's footprint. It worked great! I was looking for something that would be easier than making salt dough or working with clay, and this worked out well! I even painted it with acrylic paint afterword and it dried beautifully. My only hope is that it maintains the shape and does well over time. I will update this review once I get our ornaments out next year to see how well it held up after a year.

 This stuff is seriously easy to work with. It doesn't exactly harden like clay though.

％商品名: Crayola Model Magic 4 Oz: White
レビュー内容: Used this to make ornaments for grandparents with my daughter's handprint. Worked wonderfully! Not sticky and easy to clean up, which was particularly important as she is only 6 months old and loves to put her hands in her mouth!

％商品名: Crayola Model Magic 4 Oz: White
レビュー内容:
Great stuff. I made handprint gifts for my son's grandparents using model magic. I bought two packs to make 3 large ornaments that fit both of his (1-year-old) hands. If you were just doing one hand, I'd say that one pack can easily make two ornaments.
Remember to make a hole in it before you leave it to set. I used a straw to punch out a small round circle.

％商品名: Crayola Model Magic 4 Oz: White
レビュー内容: Crayola model magic offers a modeling compound that creates everything from masks to intricate dioramas. Nongreasy formula air dries to a smooth resilient finish that can be painted and decorated.

％商品名: Crayola Model Magic 4 Oz: White
タイトル: Fine for sculpting, but turned everything black.
レビュー内容:
We use model magic to make holiday ornaments every year. Generally, we buy a tub of the white, and then use food coloring to dye it in an array of colors. We never have any problem with the dye leaving residue or staining anything, and the colors dry beautifully. Since black is difficult to make, we bought a little extra black to make details this year. Interestingly, the Black Model Magic made by Crayola seems to turn everything black - hands, towels, etc. The black dye gets everywhere, and is not as easy to clean off as you might hope given that it's made for messy kids.

Bottom line: It dried fine, and was fun to sculpt, but messier than some of the other colors.

％商品名: Crayola Model Magic 4 Oz: White
タイトル: Wonderful stuff, I've used this to craft many things
レビュー内容: Wonderful stuff, I've used this to craft many things. The only downside is that the clay can crack if it dries unevenly. Make sure to rotate whatever you're making every couple hours while it's drying!

％商品名: Crayola Model Magic 4 Oz: White
レビュー内容: It's a good light weight modeling clay. I needed to make antlers for my halloween costume so it needed to be easily molded & light! It reacted well with the paint I applied afterwards, was very easy to mold, i even sanded it some after it dried & that worked well to smooth out the seams. Only issue is it did still crack some after it dried. Otherwise a lil goes a long way & it was DEFINITELY worth the price.

％商品名: Crayola Model Magic 4 Oz: White
タイトル: I was not happy with this purchase at all
レビュー内容: I was not happy with this purchase at all...I received it today and as soon as opened the package I could already feel how dried out the clay was. Definitely will not be buying from this seller ever again and i certainly don't recommend you do either.

％商品名: Crayola Model Magic 4 Oz: White
タイトル: I loved the fact as it was lightweight as it was ...
レビュー内容:
I used this to make a unicorn horn and ears for a halloween costume. I loved the fact as it was lightweight as it was easy to attach to my mask and headband and wear all night. Also the softness kept me from impaling friends when at the party but it was strong enough not to break.
From one package i was able to make two sets of horns and ears... my first try wasn't so great.

％商品名: Crayola Model Magic 4 Oz: White
レビュー内容:
While it's true that it's easy for children to mold with it's actually TOO soft for serious users who are trying to make a piece with any detail. It squishes easily and destroys the area that you previously sculpted! It also does not dry as hard as other sculpting clays so some delicate pieces end up breaking eventually. An example is a smiley sun magnet with wavy 'Rays' that my daughter made. After a week or so the rays broke off one by one and now we have the Walmart logo as a refrigerator magnet! lol
The pluses are these.
No odor
No staining on work surfaces, hands, or clothing.
No need to bake - hardens (somewhat) with air drying.
Very nice vibrant colors.
To sum up - it's perfect for young children but older children and adults will get better results with Sculpey Clay.

％商品名: Crayola Model Magic 4 Oz: White
レビュー内容: There are multiple uses for this product in my studio - I love the fact that I can use a mold to create a thin face with model magic, and when dry, the product can be painted, sealed, and even stitched into!

レビュー内容: Based on the product description, we bought the model expecting it to be at a consistent scale. After measuring the various parts, it was clear that there is no consistent scale applied to the model. The model we were required to build was a "scale" model (whatever scale we decided on). We ultimately selected 1cm to 1 cubit. This model is smaller than that, which would have not been a problem expect for the completely inconsistent scale.

％商品名: The Tabernacle: Tabernacle Model Kit by Vision Video
タイトル: The model is almost perfectly faithful to the Orthodox Jewish tradition. Any deviation form that tradition is easy to correct.
レビュー内容: I've built four of these for my grandchildren. The model is distributed by a Christian company with the Christian community in mind, but from an Orthodox Jewish perspective, the details in the model are almost perfect. Another thing I've noticed is that they have simplified assembly of the model over the years. This is the easiest version I have yet to build.

But these two pieces came with parts broken. I immediately contacted the seller. I explained to him that ONLY these two pieces were broken and if there was anyway that i could get them replaced! I even offered to pay for the shipping only because i didnt expect him to pay for two little pieces. Well he did! He not only sent the pieces i needed? He sent me a bag with all the pieces......and i had them in front of my door in literally one day! Greg!......thank you! You are awesome! And i love this product!

％商品名: Round 2 Ghostbusters Ecto-1 1:25 Scale Model Kit
タイトル: Not too bad all in all.
レビュー内容: It says it comes ready to make the ECTO-1 (first movie) or the ECTO-1A (second movie), but this is not true, it does come with the decals for both, but I had to do some serious retooling of the equipment rack on this to make it into the ECTO-1 version (fortunately I had some spare parts from other models that could substitute for things not included for making the ECTO-1 equipment rack), I had to sand down the tabs on the shell where the signs from the second movie were added, I had to paint the white walls on the tires (they come all black which doesn't match up to the movies), there is no engine to put together for it, the front piece for the grill is completely chrome, I had to paint the white around the headlights, I had to paint the "fins" and the stripe leading from the "fins" to the front of the doors red because the decals that come with it for that aren't quite right in color and there aren't any decals for the stripe, I wouldn't recommend this for anyone who is detail oriented and doesn't have the time/willingness to do retooling and detail painting, however if you have the time/willingness to do retooling and detail painting this can look amazing.

％商品名: Round 2 Ghostbusters Ecto-1 1:25 Scale Model Kit
レビュー内容:
this models is pretty amazing! it only took me about a week give or take to finish it. Building models on occasion is one of my ways of decompressing from a long day at work.

The Ecto 1A came right on time as scheduled and the packaging was absolutly fine!
Its super fun to put to gether. FYI if you want to make it super detailed just have a little patience!

PS. if your wondering.. yes that is the time machine!

％商品名: Round 2 Ghostbusters Ecto-1 1:25 Scale Model Kit
タイトル: fun project while recovering from back surgery
レビュー内容: fun project while recovering from back surgery. I have done several models the past few days and this one was my favorite.

％商品名: Round 2 Ghostbusters Ecto-1 1:25 Scale Model Kit
タイトル: Only for people with too much patience!
レビュー内容: Purchased for my nephew.... it has tons of parts. It's like a never ending puzzle. You also need to purchase paint for some parts. It also needs to be glued together. Ended up just throwing it away because it was, in my opinion, impossible to put together!

％商品名: Round 2 Ghostbusters Ecto-1 1:25 Scale Model Kit
レビュー内容:
The ECTO 1A is a fairly good model, but even though it is well detailed, they should have given you the parts to make the ECTO1 from the original Ghostbusters film. It is feasible if you research it, but the roof rack will have to be modified, some equipment left off, and a ladder will have to be added to the right rear of the car, just behind the door.

This is a "curbside " model-that means there is no scale engine. Body details, plated parts and clear parts arte good, as is the decal sheet.The body detail itself is spot on and should easily convert into an ambulance or a hearse if you care to model one.Be prepared to do some sanding and filling.

Wheels and tires are incorrect fot the Ecto 1. It has big "pimp" whitewalls and standard Cadillac wheel embelishers-hub caps. Also, the clear parts ofthe emertgency roof lights should be a transparent blue, not completely clear as they come in the kit.

I got my model in damaged condition. A small semi circular chip of plastic was broken off on the right rear roof, just above the "C" pillar for the rear door, but I was able to fill it in with balsa wood, sheet styrene and body puty. Besides that, some of the roof equipment will hide this defect anyway.

The only real complaint is not with this model itself, but with Amazon . The nature of the complaint is that it is very difficult to use a gift card .Make this process easier to use, and I`ll be back.Other than that, everything else was OK.

％商品名: Round 2 Ghostbusters Ecto-1 1:25 Scale Model Kit
レビュー内容: I opened the box and checked the item. Everything was inside, instructions are easy and clear. Parts are mostly okay. Only 2 crome part was damaged. Anyway, luckly it is easy to glue without any mark. Good Product, recommended by me. It will be fun to build it up.

％商品名: Round 2 Ghostbusters Ecto-1 1:25 Scale Model Kit
レビュー内容: This is a curbside kit (no engine) of a really big car. I paid around $20 for this one but wouldn't have paid more without an engine. If you have the money and can make it work, you may consider buying the '59 Eldorado model kit and steal the engine from it. Glancing at the picture and parts quickly, one issue I noted was that the flashers on the roof do not appear to be the same as the ones on the Ghostbusters 1 movie. If appears to be a very simple kit for mid-level builders.

％商品名: Round 2 Ghostbusters Ecto-1 1:25 Scale Model Kit
タイトル: Turns out that this MODEL is awesome. Full detail
レビュー内容: I almost didn't buy this because of the negative reviews. Turns out that this MODEL is awesome. Full detail, lots of parts, tons of stickers and lots of oppertunity to paint the hell out of it. Most, if not all of the negative reviews are from people that didn't know this is a MODEL. Yes, you will need glue. Yes, you will need paint. It's a MODEL. I am fully satisfied with this MODEL, it came out great, and all the reviewers that were pissed because it wasn't painted and didn't hold together without glue made me laugh for days. One guy even posted a picture of a fully assembled unpainted MODEL. Good stuff, can't beat it. If you are looking for a MODEL, this is for you.

％商品名: Bandai Hobby #59 HG Gundam Gold Frame Astray Amatu Mina Model Kit, 1/144 Scale
レビュー内容: The astray gold frame amatsu, in my opinion, is the wickedest astray out there. Compared to the other astrays this one is my favorite, there's so much here in such a little kit they all can't stay on at the same time. First off at the time I got this I didn't know anything about gundam, and still I'm not one who knows much about gundam. This guy here just caught my eye and I just had to have it. This kit is awesome! The black it comes molded in is a glossy black and the gold is the normal gold that gundam has with most kits so this one I would defiantly recommend in painting it a better gold. This kit doesn't belong on the ground, the wings on this kit are big and awesome, for this kit to look its best I'd recommend to get an action base. Along with the wings you are given two wires to allow the points on the wings to shoot out but these wires don't do well unless you bend them at a high degree so they'll stay up. This model also comes with a arm mounted shield and a claw that attaches to the arms, along with two swords that attach to the hip skirts but these love to fall off. In my opinion this is an awesome kit, for being an astray that is asymmetric.

％商品名: Bandai Hobby #59 HG Gundam Gold Frame Astray Amatu Mina Model Kit, 1/144 Scale
タイトル: Build overall was fun, and if you plan on getting it make ...
レビュー内容:
Gorgeous model, unfortunately it has a few issues.

The side sword holsters are impossible to keep on; for some strange reason they don't really have a joint to snap them in and are instead just supposed to loosely hang there which never works the way it's supposed to resulting in them falling out 99% of the time. On the same topic, some of the parts don't fit together as well as they should; specifically many of the parts in the arm even after shaving them down a bit don't really sit.

The heels make this thing really hard to stand alone, and the wings make it flat out impossible. It's weighted in such a way that almost any pose will make this guy fall over almost instantly.

The gold plastic looks much cheaper in person, but doing the lining makes it look sort of okay.

Build overall was fun, and if you plan on getting it make sure you have a base ready because this is impossible to display without it.

％商品名: Bandai Hobby #59 HG Gundam Gold Frame Astray Amatu Mina Model Kit, 1/144 Scale
レビュー内容:
The only Astray Gundam that I liked out of all the other Frame Astrays. Be any means, this is a personal favorite of mine and largely due to being an obscure Gundam and my bias appeal to being a female pilot (For the record, twin pilots - male & female NO SPOILERS~)

PROS:
+ This model looks mighty well on display.
+ Decent articulation
+ Lots of nice accessories - Sabers (by on its hips), the claw thingy, the blitz shield/rifle.
+ The gloss finish on the black plates/parts are a nice touch
+ Decent color separation

CONS:
- It is fragile and because of its glossy finish, it is easily scratched and messy fingerprint marks ruins its presentation.
- Too many stickers and for the record mostly the red parts. About 98% (If I remember correctly) that is red is parted by stickers.
- The gold frame of this kit is an ugly cheap looking yellow crossed with some kind of cheap gold.
- Its balance is a lost cause not only because its weight of the backpack/wings but also its heeled feet. An engineering flaw.
- Its not much of a brick for display but a piece of porcelain display - not meant for anything else. Action base stand is your best friend here.
- The packaging to this kit is less than to be desired. If it's being shipped at any point, the plates may rub and scratch each other.

VERDICT: It's getting cheaper on Amazon and this kit is more of a niche choice. If you really like this particular Gundam and you have some experience of painting and modifying a little, then it's an instant-buy. However, if you're the latter, you can leave this kit alone. The NG (Non-Grade) 1/100 version isn't much better than this and personally, I think the HG is much better than the NG 1/100 Amatsu Mina. The metal build... Well too expensive. This kit is getting four rather than three stars because of my bias of liking this Gundam. Otherwise, rightfully it is a three starred product.

In regards, I personally just painted in the red parts, repainted the "gold" plates into actual titanium gold finish, and repainted the black with the metallic black finish when I found a nasty scratch (After it was assembled) and lastly, a gloss topcoat to seal it. I don't particularly minded to go through this process but I have hopes that there will someday be a MG of the Gold Frame Astray Amatsu Mina Custom Re-2 released (I mean why not? The Red and Blue frames got theirs).

レビュー内容: This model kit is amazing. But its really hard to pose without a base. Very heavy once you start moving the wings around. Probably would need an action base to get any type of posibility

％商品名: Haynes Build Your Own Internal Combustion Engine
タイトル: Nice educational kit. (Plus: this review contains correction to kit instructions!)
レビュー内容:
Edit: I decided to come back and add some information to my review with regard to issues with the instructions. Hopefully this will help others who purchase this kit. Our kit instructions and parts list indicate that the timing belt idler pulley is a chrome part number 30. Our kit did not contain a part number 30 but it did have a part number 41 (not on the parts list at all) that looked a lot like an idler pulley. Looking at photos of the kit it seems clear that the manufacturer is substituting this new non-chromed part 41 for the old part number 30. An addendum in the instructions would be nice but, if you get this kit and find part 30 missing -- just use part 41 in its place and all will be good. The other mistake we found was that the part numbers for the crankshaft and camshaft pulleys are reversed but the only-fits-one-way construction on that step made sure we didn't mess up.

I built the Renwal V8 with my dad (the motorized version with the "working" plugs) when I was a kid and loved the experience. Since Revell no longer makes the motorized V8 I thought that I would try this kit with my son (he's 13). We had a great time working on this together. I loved that the whole kit goes together with pressure-fit parts and screws. No glue necessary. I would have gone five stars except the engine has a tendency to seize every once in a while -- but I think I remember the old V8 doing that too.

One tip: lubricate everything liberally. The tolerances on most parts are good but, as with a real engine, there are lots of "moving parts" and that means opportunities for things to catch or friction to get the better of the small electric motor that turns the crank shaft.

With a couple exceptions, the instructions were clear. When we found ourselves puzzling over a step it was almost always a matter of us getting in a hurry and not taking the time to thoroughly read the written instructions as well as looking at the pictures.

％商品名: Haynes Build Your Own Internal Combustion Engine
タイトル: Great Present for my 12 Year old
レビュー内容: I reviewed a number of other brands and was not happy with the reviews. The reviews on the UK site of this model was very high, so we decided to check it out. My Son loves picking at all things... so this was a cool gift. He was able to put the whole thing together in 2 nights and is still tinkering with it. He is delighted with the working parts. Each "cylinder" lights up, the fan turns, the moving parts are cool. He is now wanting to build bigger engines. It is a great model and highly recommend.

％商品名: Haynes Build Your Own Internal Combustion Engine
タイトル: it's educational, mind stimulating & just good fun for those who like to build things!
レビュー内容: The young man we bought this for who loves to take things apart and put them back together claims he had hours of fun with this! And he loves to take it apart and put it back together over and over… So this was a great gift for the young man with a stimulating mind who loves to always be fiddling with something, building, &/or creating something. He's always eager to learn something new and he really enjoyed this little engine with lots of little pieces. And it actually works! It sure entertained a group of guys for a few hours on New Year's Eve and is now a traditional puzzle game for the guys in our family, for future New Year's eve parties ;-)

％商品名: Haynes Build Your Own Internal Combustion Engine
タイトル: Good for visuals but does have some fitting problems
レビュー内容:
It's a relatively simple model but it does have some fitting issues especially where the cylinders were involved. The see through block and electrical motor moving the parts in real time was great for visualization but cylinder fitting issues did not allow for completely smooth movements and so the engine would skip where a cylinder would get stuck and unstuck.

However, even with that it was a great visualization for how the engine internals work. Obviously it's simplified with only the major parts being given attention and if you had enough time and sandpaper you could smooth the cylinders out but this really is only a day or two project and probably doesn't merit the work.

％商品名: Haynes Build Your Own Internal Combustion Engine
タイトル: Completely built by 12 year old son
レビュー内容:
I researched many models of this type since I had built a Revell V8 as a kid. Due to all the negative reviews of that particular model and problems with other similar models, I almost avoided all of them. I wanted one that was powered and had flashing spark plugs and was visible while operating. Saw that many people had problems with this version, but took the chance on the Haynes offering hoping that at least the instructions would be clear.

While it is smaller and only a straight four, it went together in about four hours completely assembeled by my 12 year old son. The only points that could have been clearer would be the orientation of some of the parts and it took some trail and error to figure out a few pieces. All in all a good experience and none of the issues reported,

％商品名: Haynes Build Your Own Internal Combustion Engine
レビュー内容: I bought this for my son as a Christmas gift. It has lights for sparkplugs and you can see the parts move inside. I bought this as an educational tool/toy for him to learn the parts and function of the internal combustion engine. no glue required. the parts screw together. A screwdriver and instruction manual are included in the kit.

％商品名: Haynes Build Your Own Internal Combustion Engine
レビュー内容: This was a pretty fun kit to put together. It also looks allot better than the older generation of this kit which used to be in orange and purple colors (yuk) the new up to date version has parts in more professional looking chrome, black and silver parts with clear parts for the main engine block. It's also cheaper and easier to assemble then the visible V8. What I enjoy about this kit is it doesn't need glue, most of the parts are put together with screws and it uses an electric motor to turn the moving parts and has light up spark plugs which the visible V8 doesn't have. I do wish there was an on/off switch on the battery pack so you don't have to unplug it from the engine when your done using it. I might just build an on/off switch myself. This kit is basic when compared to the V8 but it still looks cool on my desk. I am having some trouble getting it to rotate continuously because it keeps seizing up and it makes a loud clicking noise. It could be something's not properly lined up with the gears so it should be an easy fix. The spark plugs light up properly with no signs of malfunction. (Be sure to test the motor the other electronics before assembling)

％商品名: Haynes Build Your Own Internal Combustion Engine
レビュー内容: I used vegetable on the bearings as directed in the instructions and next morning the screws came out, like the plastic had melted. Also, the spark plugs did not light, none of them. Engine is useless now. Very unhappy with this product.
