％商品名: Haynes Build Your Own Internal Combustion Engine
レビュー内容:
I bought this for my 4 year old son. He's very interested in how things work. We built it with minimal problems. However, the electronics never worked. When the button is pushed we get the engine starting sound, but nothing moves. Very disappointing for my son. He was really excited to see our work pay off. I'm going to try to rig it to work with a power drill to salvage something for my son.
UPDATE- I contacted customer service and the immediately sent a replacement part completely free.

％商品名: Haynes Build Your Own Internal Combustion Engine
タイトル: Nice set with some minor quality problems.
レビュー内容:
I bought this to build with my son and I would consider it a good buy for a father/son project. I am mostly satisfied with a few comments.

It didn't require any glue, which is nice, but the screwdriver that came with it was too weak to effectively screw in the tiny screws that come with it (it actually started to fall apart). I had to get out my own precision screwdriver to make get it together.

Also, towards the end of the instruction sheet it just seemed like the team just gave up due to time or budget and left out some pictures that would be helpful to those trying to build this.

Finally, the biggest problem was that the distributor that comes with it to turn the lights on and off was defective. Luckily I had read about this from another reviewer and shut it down as soon as the motor sounded strained and the lights weren't coming on.

You basically need to pull it apart and remove the plastic piece that rotates with a couple of ball bearings and a spring and place it back together so it rotates smooth. I don't know if they get unaligned during shipping or if it is just poor quality control. The center piece should rotate smoothly. If it doesn't you may have the same problem as me.

If you just want something that goes together without having to work through some issues I would buy something else. If you don't mind doing a little trouble shooting this is a pretty cool set.

％商品名: Haynes Build Your Own Internal Combustion Engine
レビュー内容: The engine is awesome. Tons of moving and intricate parts to assemble. Probably the most detailed model engine that I have seen. The issue is in both the quality of plastic a well as the instructions. Some of the steps were missing. I have lots of experience building engines so it was a breeze for me but I bought this for my son to assemble and would have rather had him be able to do it all on his own. The steps for the ignition timing say to mount the distributor with the wires facing up after you reach top dead center at the #4 cylinder. The object is to base your ignition spark to hit just a split second before top dead center as in a real engine. The problem is, when assembled like that, there is no way to adjust to do it. No matter how far left or right you turn the distributor, it only fires near bottom dead center. I had to remove the distributor and flip it over to where the wires faced down. After a slight adjustment, the timing was perfect. Initially having timing off that much in a real engine would cause the engine to backfire through the intake. Not a good lesson to teach. I also have a stuck valve because the plastic mounting plate is warped. Even more crazy is this company makes some of the best auto repair manuals in the world so I expected top-notch instructions. The plastic that they use is pretty cheap and warped. The manifolds fall off easily. I would still buy it again but just be aware of some of those things.

％商品名: Haynes Build Your Own Internal Combustion Engine
レビュー内容:
Wish I could give it NO stars. I bought this for My son's birthday who loves working with me on ANYTHING I do. I was SO excited to see this and watched him build it by himself. He was struggling at one point and I found that one piston just would not go into the cylinder it was supposed to so I sanded both down to make it work (about an hour). All was working well until he hooked up the batterie box to it. NOTHING but the sound works? The little DC motor will not turn at all on or off the model and the spark wires do nothing at all? All we get is a starting sound once in a while. This was supposed to be a learning experience in engine building and function, not a learning how to control your anger in frustration experience. We spent HOURS together to build, tear down, rebuild and troubleshoot only to find that this product is either inferior or we received the bad apple.

I really hope that AMAZON, HAYNES, or the Storefront reads this message and sends me a new unit. I was so looking forward to seeing the learning experience as well as watching his face as he watched it run

％商品名: Darice 9178-91 Wooden Titanic Model Kit
レビュー内容: The bad reviews are all right. The pieces are inexact, there are some dents, the holes aren't precise, and the instructions aren't anything to bother wasting time reading. You'd almost think this thing was being sold for less than $3... which it is. For the price, it's totally awesome and my 4 year old boy and I had a lot of fun putting it together. It taught him patience and craftsmanship (our own in assembling and painting). If you're looking for an inexpensive model of the titanic for your kid, this is a great choice.

％商品名: Darice 9178-91 Wooden Titanic Model Kit
タイトル: Laughably crappy. It's a "disaster," all right.
レビュー内容:
Look, for the price I wasn't expecting a perfect replica of the Pride of the White Star Line. But this is weird even for a piece of made-in-China junk. The pieces were totally bizarrely misshapen. I mean they look like they were cut from memory by a drunk, half-blind old man with a band saw operated by foot pedal. Looking at the pieces and comparing them to the illustration on the package (which is the same as the illustration shown here) was absolutely comedy gold. I suspect that some of the parts are made of random wood scraps from random projects done by the factory. ("Hey, this is kind of curved! And so is this! Let's put these in the Titanic package and see if they can pass as part of the 'bow'! HA HA unsuspecting capitalist running-dogs will pay for their crimes against our great country!")

Oh, and the radio antennas are placed in very odd places. And the antennas weren't included in the package. But HA HA this Yankee lapdog of the international capitalist conspiracy figured out how to defeat the factory workers' plot: I used bamboo shish kebab skewers. They fit perfectly. They're the only part of this thing that did.

％商品名: Darice 9178-91 Wooden Titanic Model Kit
タイトル: My kids loved this product it was fun to glue it together ...
レビュー内容: My kids loved this product it was fun to glue it together and paint it. For the price you can not complain.

％商品名: Darice 9178-91 Wooden Titanic Model Kit
レビュー内容: Great Product for the price.

％商品名: Darice 9178-91 Wooden Titanic Model Kit
レビュー内容: Tiny

％商品名: Darice 9178-91 Wooden Titanic Model Kit
レビュー内容:
Well, this was a huge disappointment. The quality of the pieces is notably poor, with dents and dings in many pieces, and several of the deck pieces unevenly cut and asymmetrical. The "instructions" lack any characteristic that might be described as actually instructive, except perhaps in the matter of a lesson on buying wooden models sight unseen. I know this is a cheap model, and I wasn't looking for anything even vaguely sophisticated at this price, but even basic competence in manufacture of what should be simple pieces is utterly lacking. I could have whittled better pieces myself using a plastic spork. While driving.

Not even worth the effort to try to fix to assemble.

％商品名: Darice 9178-91 Wooden Titanic Model Kit
レビュー内容: My first thought when I got the model was "I should have paid a little more for a better model". To be honest, for $1.99, the price didn't seem bad at first. But throw in shipping and handling and I ended up paying over $10.00. Let me explain why I don't think it's worth it. In the description of the model it says it's 10 inches long, well it's more like 7"( very small). The package says it's "fun to do" and "easy to make", it's actually far from it. The pre cut pieces of wood don't seem to fit right when you try to put them together. The Kit is actually unfinished pieces of wood that you have to sand, shape and mold to get them to fit right. If you could get away with paying the $1.99 and not have to pay shipping and if you would not mind finishing the wood working at home than it would be worth it. You also have to consider that the model is unpainted. That's another $5.00 or $10.00 for the paint. Like I said at first, if you want a good looking model that's truly easy to make, pay a little more and get a plastic model (unless you're really into wood working).

％商品名: Darice 9178-91 Wooden Titanic Model Kit
タイトル: Fun model kit and great price!
レビュー内容: My 3 year old son loves the Titanic. We put this kit together quickly with a bit of glue, and painted it (with our own paints) to look just like the Titanic. We have had the masts break off a couple times, but were easily replaced with trimmed toothpicks - works great! My son loves to play Titanic with it! The pieces are not perfectly cut, but, for the price, it looks pretty good. Especially when you compare this cost-wise to other Titanic models, you can't beat it.

％商品名: Darice 9178-91 Wooden Titanic Model Kit
タイトル: Perfect for my 8 year old to put together and paint. Low quality, but he didn't care, he loved it! I'd buy more.
レビュー内容: Okay, so here is the thing. My 8 year old is obsessed with Titanic. This was a $2 model that he loved!!! He put it together himself and then got to paint it. He didn't need anything more than that. It wasn't complicated, but some of the pieces didn't fit exactly. He didn't care. It was $2 well spent. He is really proud of it. I would consider buying more of them, just to keep him occupied. If you are a model enthusiast, this is not for you. It is for 8 year olds obsessed with the Titanic.

％商品名: Darice 9178-91 Wooden Titanic Model Kit
タイトル: Even held up in the tub, sortof... Totally worth it! My 4-year-old approves!
レビュー内容:
Without having a tape measure in my head like my husband so I can just picture sizes like he does, I wasn't quite sure how big this would be when I ordered it. I thought it would be smaller than it was. So I was delightfully surprised when it arrived and it was a nice, decent size. Perfect for a 4-year-old boy who loves the Titanic.

You should have seen his face when he opened it. Well, I'm sure you can imagine it. It was brilliant. For three minutes, I was the coolest mom on the planet.

This is great for any Titanic lover! It would be perfect on a shelf, on a desk, or in our case, so much fun for said little boy to put together and paint and then run around with and make fly, zoom across the coffee table, slide across the floor, down the slide, dive into the sandbox, run around the living room, bounce off his sister's, slam into walls, tumble across the floor, slam into his cars, be towed by his tow trucks, bull-dozed, ran over by his Monster Trucks, take a ride in his dump truck, and then he asked to take it in the bathtub. I could just envision it falling apart and swelling with water, and the tears that would follow, but it was $3. What the heck. I could buy a dozen for the tub if it made him happy. So in it went. Yes, it fell apart. BUT it didn't swell with water. AWESOME! He just had more fun gluing it back together again. He said that it falling apart was it sinking. "Cuz, mom, the Titanic sank, remember?"

I'd suggest a water-sealant for water use. I'm going to try that next. Summer is coming, we'll open the pool... Of course now he has his eye on the motorized one...

All-in-all, we couldn't be happier with this purchase. The price is phenomenal! So, I highly recommend it for the Titanic lover in your life- and for those who like to put things together and paint them. Even if they aren't a Titanic fanatic yet, you could get it as a gift and as they put it together and paint it, you could teach them about the Titanic. An idea for homeschooling.

If you're on the fence, buy it, you won't be sorry.

％商品名: Darice 9178-91 Wooden Titanic Model Kit
レビュー内容: This model was perfect for my 5-year-old. He needed just a little help to glue it all together and was thrilled with the result when it was done. It's very simple but looks enough like the Titanic to satisfy him and you can't beat the price.

％商品名: Darice 9178-91 Wooden Titanic Model Kit
レビュー内容:
Wood Model Kit-Titanicby DARICE

This is a great kit to incorporate into the Titanic studies and the price is more then right. If you wanted to spend more time, detail and money I'm sure you could get a more but for a dollar you can see its the Titanic and its relatively easy to assemble.

％商品名: Darice 9178-91 Wooden Titanic Model Kit
タイトル: Poor construction and deceptive sales image
レビュー内容:
I bought this for my seven year old as a gift (he's into the Titanic at the moment) and he was very excited to build this kit. He's made sever other simple wooden models and is very capable of building and painting them on his own according to the directions. This one needed a lot of help from me, though. The smoke stacks were cut at haphazard angles and of varying length, requiring me to even them up with a belt sander. The four pieces that make up the gunwales for the bow and the stern were just garbage. None of the pieces matched each other to make an obvious "left/right" fit and required heavy modification to make even the most rudimentary fit. Once attached and glue was dry, it required more time with the belt sander to make the pieces flush with the hull sides. The hull itself was badly dented and rough with a corner chipped off. There is no way this kit could possibly build the model shown in the example picture without some real, adult level woodworking skills. I wasn't expecting something museum quality, but asking for pieces to fit and be properly shaped isn't asking much.

Unless you are okay doing some serious refitting, pass on this model.

％商品名: Darice 9178-91 Wooden Titanic Model Kit
レビュー内容:
The seller states that this wooden Titanic Model kit is "1.3 x 3.9 x 10.2 inches". The package of the lilliputian model states it is 7.25"L. Maybe a 3" difference does not matter to some, but it surely does to my 6 year old.
The price is fair for the actual size, but I do wish the product had been accurately represented in the description. It's more of a stocking stuffer than a gift.

％商品名: Darice 9178-91 Wooden Titanic Model Kit
タイトル: The pieces are cut wrong and it looks like they substituted a bow piece for one of the ...
レビュー内容:
*** CONSUMER WARNING ****
The real cost of this is $25.00 plus 8 hours assembly time.

Make sure you read all the negative reviews because they are dead on. The pieces are cut wrong and it looks like they substituted a bow piece for one of the stern rails in ours. If you are considering buying a wood model of the Titanic it's probably safe to assume that your kid is going through a Titanic phase and can't get enough of it. Unfortunately if you're not careful this model can turn them right off. There is no excuse for the types of poor quality that this model comes with. I assumed that it would be made out of softwoods and was not going to be as durable (or costly) as something made out of better quality materials. But I did not expect it to be cut wrong. It takes just as long and costs a manufacturer just as much to cut a piece of wood to the correct size as to the wrong size.

My son's fascination with the Titanic has lead to him to want to read and experiment. I'd hate to see something as stupid as this frustrate him and turn him off. So I guess I'll just have to run out to Hobby Lobby and pick up some sandpaper, tools, etc and plan to spend a Saturday cutting and sanding all of the pieces with my son so that we can put it together properly and make this a positive experience.

Better to give the $2.50 to the Salvation Army than to this company.

％商品名: Darice 9178-91 Wooden Titanic Model Kit
レビュー内容:
My 8-year-old son enjoyed putting this kit together and painting it very much. It was quite simple to assemble and paint, and was an inexpensive craft for him to learn a little about working with paint, glue, and wooden pieces.

My one complaint was that a couple of the pieces in the deck portion were splintered off. The finished product was o.k., as we managed to turn them in such a way that it didn't show much. For the money, it was worth it. A great little item to introduce boys to modeling kits & assembling them.

％商品名: Darice 9178-91 Wooden Titanic Model Kit
レビュー内容: Keep your expectations in check, and you should be satisfied. Remember that this is low-priced, so it's not perfect. It's small, and our smokestacks were cut crooked... BUT, all we were looking for was a cheap, fun 4th-grade school project that met the necessary requirements for my son's class. For that, this product delivered fine.

％商品名: Darice 9178-91 Wooden Titanic Model Kit
タイトル: The pieces aren't perfect, but for the price
レビュー内容: My son loves the titanic. This is the first model kit he has put together and painted by himself. You have to buy your own paints of course. The pieces aren't perfect, but for the price, it is a great starter for a younger child.

％商品名: Darice 9178-91 Wooden Titanic Model Kit
レビュー内容: Order arrived quickly. Ships were packaged along with other items ordered from Amazon. For the most part the kits were whole, although a few were missing pieces. We used them for a Titanic Day activity for 5-9 year olds. The teachers had to do much of the gluing but the kids assisted and enjoyed sanding and painting them. They served their purpose, and the kids had fun.

％商品名: Darice 9178-91 Wooden Titanic Model Kit
レビュー内容:
This was a gag gift for my friend, and it completed all the requirements.
1. Did it float? YES
2. Was it easy to assemble? YES
3. Did it float upright? NO
4. Did the third question matter to us? NOT REALLY

％商品名: 1 X Wind-powered Animaris Ordis Parvus Strandbeest Model Robot (Beige)
レビュー内容:
This is a really cool model for a very low price, but the quality is lacking. The parts fit together somewhat loosely, leaving a decent bit of play in the finished model. Also, I had a problem with the propeller.

To prepare the strandbeest for the propeller, a shaft slides into the top of the body. Then the propeller slides over the shaft, and a rubber stopper slides over the end of the shaft to prevent the propeller from sliding off. The shaft in my kit had too small a diameter to fit snugly in the body, and as a result slid in and out freely. Almost immediately upon blowing on the propeller, the shaft would slide out and the gear on the propeller would disengage, causing it to stop working. The rubber stopper was too loose to prevent the propeller from moving and pushing it off of the shaft during operation, also causing it to stop working.

The propeller blades are held onto the propeller frame with provided strips of tape. The propeller blades have a curve to them and are quite stiff, however, so after a day or so the stiff blades pulled away from the tape and disconnected. This could be solved with some glue, but shouldn't need to be.

For this price point, I didn't expect super-high quality, but there are quite a few major problems with this model. It feels cheap, and several parts just can't be assembled as they are meant to be.

％商品名: 1 X Wind-powered Animaris Ordis Parvus Strandbeest Model Robot (Beige)
レビュー内容: This was almost a really cool toy. But several pieces were malformed to the point that the device was unusable. It was also missing parts. Just buy the authorized version and save the trouble of assembling everything and being disappointed.

％商品名: 1 X Wind-powered Animaris Ordis Parvus Strandbeest Model Robot (Beige)
タイトル: It's a great idea and I like how this kit is in ...
レビュー内容: It's a great idea and I like how this kit is in a box that's inside a book, but the wings didn't want to attach for me. The adhesive is not very strong and doesn't work well on curved surfaces. And even when wings are attached, they require incredibly strong current of air in order to move the mechanism. But it does walk in a pretty cool way.

％商品名: 1 X Wind-powered Animaris Ordis Parvus Strandbeest Model Robot (Beige)
タイトル: First kit and replacement kit both had defects
レビュー内容:
The first kit I purchased had a one of its crankshafts malformed and was unusable. I got a replacement kit and that one included two very small rubberbands instead of the one normal size one required for assembling. I actually compared the rubberbands between the two kits received and they were very different in size.

Individually the two kits I received were unassemblable, luckily I was able to use the first kit's rubberband to make the second kit work, then return the first as defective.

Once assembled, the actual strandbeest was very cool, and well worth the purchase, but getting two bad kits in a row makes me think there's something wrong with the supplier's quality checking.

％商品名: 1 X Wind-powered Animaris Ordis Parvus Strandbeest Model Robot (Beige)
レビュー内容: The model contains instructions in english which should be follow carefully to get the Strandbeest properly assembled. It takes about 1 hour to assemble. I wanted a quick understanding of how the Strandbeest works, which this model gave me.

％商品名: 1 X Wind-powered Animaris Ordis Parvus Strandbeest Model Robot (Beige)
レビュー内容: For what is is- It is very cool. However I ordered the same exact item on ebay direct from china for $16 with free shipping and only took a week to get to me. This one I highly overpayed for, no doubt. Also on one of the molds had a defect that I had to carefully chipout with a razor blade...twice... since there was two castings from the same mold. The one I ordered from ebay there is no defect

％商品名: 1 X Wind-powered Animaris Ordis Parvus Strandbeest Model Robot (Beige)
タイトル: A bit on the fence with this one.
レビュー内容:
While I hate to be the one contrary reviewer, it has to be said that it seems quality management of the outgoing kits varied a fair bit. The bulk of the assembly process was pretty straightforward. Having previously built the bipedal version from a more recent Gakken issue, I was able to complete it in just under an hour. Aside from a couple misgivings on one or two of the choices made concerning the finishing bits -the rubber band and the functionally pointless wire shafts and "stoppers"-- I was fairly pleased with it.

That is, I was, until I got to the turbine. This is where I noticed a lot of undercutting in the manufacturing process. A few of the blades had holes half-punched or not at all. Not to mention that they are out of place, as compared to the structure they mount to. In addition, previous kits have had the blades shipped with a predetermined arc already formed into them. That was not the case with this one, and it makes an obvious difference. The plastic seems to be a thicker gage than previous kits and that causes it to spring back into a flat surface, even when mounted with adhesive to the turbine frame.

Because of this, they occasionally come in contact with the frame and pop off. A stronger adhesive may correct this, but as of the initial build, I have four of the five blades trying their hardest to jump ship. Another effect is that, with the holes significantly out of place across all 5 blades, the turbine is completely unbalanced and causes the model to shudder as it walks. This also makes getting it moving in the first place much harder than it should be. Most obviously, when it comes to rest, the turbine always falls back into the same position; indicating that one of the blades is quite a bit heavier than the rest. Looking at it, it appears nearly twice as thick as the others and is the one which most frequently pops off.

Admittedly, I just get these things as a matter of curiosity and not as a serious undertaking in model-making. That said, it seems the models got better in later versions; this being from 2010 and the biped a Dec. 2012 product.

Get this product to scratch that model-making itch, but be aware there may be some functional flaws.

％商品名: 1 X Wind-powered Animaris Ordis Parvus Strandbeest Model Robot (Beige)
レビュー内容: Fun little model to build. If I were to nitpick, I would say that the double sided tape for attaching the "fan blades" isn't that good. I used a small amount of CA glue instead and it works well and is easy. Build time isn't too long, but you have to read the instructions carefully. There is the possibility they could be misread and mistakes made. If you follow the instructions the build goes smoothly and is fairly easy.

％商品名: 1 X Wind-powered Animaris Ordis Parvus Strandbeest Model Robot (Beige)
レビュー内容: It came from overseas, and it was worth the wait, even though it arrived late for my grandson's birthday. He and his Dad had heard about the full-sized Straandbeest machines, so he was really excited to have a model to build, especially one that worked as intended.

％商品名: 1 X Wind-powered Animaris Ordis Parvus Strandbeest Model Robot (Beige)
レビュー内容: I and my kids had a great time putting this little beast together. There many duplicative parts that make up the 12 legs, which allowed for the kids and I to form an assembly line of snipping, filing and sorting. The original straandbeests are just so clever and fascinating to watch and this model kit captures those aspects in a fun kit build. Do pay extremely careful attention to the instructions else you could end up having to start over again. Having had to do a tear down and rebuild of the kit I am happy to report that the plastic that the kit is made from is flexible enough to allow for careful disassembly and reassembly. Enjoy!

％商品名: 1 X Wind-powered Animaris Ordis Parvus Strandbeest Model Robot (Beige)
タイトル: Good model - probably not for kids without adult supervision
レビュー内容:
The model is great, but mine doesn't walk smoothly. I could get it to walk only with a blow dryer, blowing on the highest setting. That leads me to the other issue - the fan blades are weakly secured with double sided tape. The stiff plastic used for the fan blades wants to retain it's flat shape, but the blade holder has a curve in it. So, the tape is too weak to hold it to the curve, and blowing against the fan blades makes the blades easily fly off. I had to solve that by super gluing each fan blade. So far, that seems to work. I also had to trim one of the blades with scissors since it whacked against the body when the fan was spinning - might have been due to mounting holes that weren't punched in the right spot - the other blades have plenty of clearance.

Overall, worth the price, but be prepared to massage it to get it to work properly. I'm an adult and it took me 2.5 hours to get it working properly - around an hour to assemble (and I used a knife to trim all of the pointy edges as I broke them off the part holders used in the molding process) and an hour to fix issues and see if I could get it to walk more smoothly. A couple steps took a while to figure out, but overall, pretty decent directions. I don't think I'd turn it over to a kid without adult supervision - I think they might easily confuse minor steps, which could cause problems. Also, they might now know how to fix issues outside of the normal instructions.

％商品名: 1 X Wind-powered Animaris Ordis Parvus Strandbeest Model Robot (Beige)
レビュー内容:
Very clever design and this model does an OK job in most respects but the propeller design is not well implemented and that's a shame because the mechanism goes together and operates very well. The blades are a poor fit and following their instructions they will not stay on. Double back tape and it doesn't hold. They actually give you a full set of die cut spare tape because they know it won't work. Too bad.

Also, again the propeller, the shaft is way too tight to allow the propeller to spin on it as I believe it is supposed to do. Instead the shaft turns in the holes in the framework, lots of friction. No way you can blow hard enough, I finally tested using compressed air and got it to walk. Now I need to figure out how to make it work right.

Be careful when assembling. Test the sub assemblies for free swinging and if the bind, get out a magnifier and very carefully trim flashing. I took my time and had very low resistance when operating by hand. The prop implementation is a disappointment.

I've continued to work on this and it now works right but only after reattaching propeller blades. They stay on long enough to make the point and visitors are charmed, as I was.

Still, fun to build. Well worth the price.

％商品名: 1 X Wind-powered Animaris Ordis Parvus Strandbeest Model Robot (Beige)
レビュー内容: Simple Yet fun. Had a few spots that needed to be filed on to make it operate smoothly but after figuring out the first leg everything went very smooth. Built and working in under an hour. I did loose a piece so mine has a limp but still fun.

％商品名: 1 X Wind-powered Animaris Ordis Parvus Strandbeest Model Robot (Beige)
タイトル: A great educational and hypnotic build kit.
レビュー内容: This thing is absolutely incredible and I wish it was around when I was a child. Perhaps then I would've become an engineer rather than an overqualified struggling graphic designer more interested in physics than the psychology of selling inferior products. This mini "strandbeest" kit is based off the mechanical designs of Theo Jansen. He designed these massive wind-powered machines based on his knowledge and understanding of human anatomy and motion. The translation is evident in the smooth, almost hypnotic, walking motion that only requires a nominal amount of wind. While this kit may be too advanced for children, it still represents an exciting educational hobby toy that's worth the time and effort of assembly. The price of under $15 is beyond reasonable.

％商品名: 1 X Wind-powered Animaris Ordis Parvus Strandbeest Model Robot (Beige)
レビュー内容: Theo Jansen is a magician (check out youtube videos), and this model of one of his beach creatures is like a magic trick. Everyone I've shown it to has been mezmerized by how it moves. I thought it might be chintzy, but it's sturdy and quite nice to look at. My only complaint is that the propeller blades are held on with double-sided sticky tape. Looks fine, but not strong enough. I'm going to tack them on with some plastic-friendly cement. Building was entertaining - just hard enough to be fun and not frustrating.

％商品名: 1 X Wind-powered Animaris Ordis Parvus Strandbeest Model Robot (Beige)
レビュー内容: I guess I should have counted every piece before assembly - my bad. Assembled the model and only right at the end did I realize that I was missing one critical part. So the model is incomplete and cannot be returned. Seller's order confirmation email states "If you notice any issues ... please contact us so we can resolve the issue as fast as possible ..." Well surprise surprise - when I contacted them they told me to contact Amazon. Wonderful - love the empty customer service promises. Model itself I guess could be fun - if it didn't fall apart because of the missing piece.

％商品名: 1 X Wind-powered Animaris Ordis Parvus Strandbeest Model Robot (Beige)
レビュー内容:
Awesome model! I really enjoy building models and this one was no exception. The little parts all fit together very well and form an awesome little machine. I would say it took me roughly and hour to build this. No glue or paint required.

The strandbeest walks just like it should, you do need to use a fan to make it walk. Just blowing on it is not enough, and will probably make you dizzy if you tried.

％商品名: 1 X Wind-powered Animaris Ordis Parvus Strandbeest Model Robot (Beige)
タイトル: The packaging and instructions are excellent. Thank you
レビュー内容: I purchased two Ovdis Parvus kits, one from my grandson and one for me. The next time he comes to visit then we plan to put them together and race them across the floor to see who wins. The packaging and instructions are excellent. Thank you.

％商品名: 1 X Wind-powered Animaris Ordis Parvus Strandbeest Model Robot (Beige)
レビュー内容: This is a nice pricing and I enjoyed putting it together. It's not a 5 star because the two sided tape tabs supplied just aren't capable of holding the blades onto the windmill structure(not even close to holding in my experience). I used super glue and let the glue dry while little clips held the blades to the windmill structure.

％商品名: 1 X Wind-powered Animaris Ordis Parvus Strandbeest Model Robot (Beige)
レビュー内容: Fun to build, took about 30-45 minutes. Looks awesome and fun to fiddle with. On mine the legs function well when the axel is turned manually but there is too much resistance to turn with just wind power. This could probably be fixed with some sanding but meh, im happy just looking at it.

％商品名: TINKERTOY 30 Model Super Building Set ? 200 Pieces ? For Ages 3+ Preschool Educational Toy

レビュー内容: My 2 year old and 4 year old have a million toys- this is there go to toy. As a stay at home mom they play with this atleast 3 hours a day! No joke! My boys are constantly building and playing. This is a must buy! My son is 2.5 and can just now snap them together like his bigger brother.

％商品名: TINKERTOY 30 Model Super Building Set ? 200 Pieces ? For Ages 3+ Preschool Educational Toy
レビュー内容: I have purchased five sets of the Tinkertoys because in order for children to really have fun with them...several sets are best. That is especially true if more than one child is playing with them. The 200 piece set was good because it had a lot of basic pieces. It is the perfect first set. The pieces are sturdy. They are bright. I also bought a plastic container with a lid to store all five sets and I laminated the instruction sheets. This summer, I let my niece have the Tinkertoys to help entertain her children over the hot summer months. The children play with them a lot. I like the plastic Tinkertoys.

％商品名: TINKERTOY 30 Model Super Building Set ? 200 Pieces ? For Ages 3+ Preschool Educational Toy
レビュー内容: If you have a child that loves to build between 3-6 then these are great toys for your little builders. This is my five year olds second set. He really enjoys playing and creating with them. So does his older sister.

％商品名: TINKERTOY 30 Model Super Building Set ? 200 Pieces ? For Ages 3+ Preschool Educational Toy

％商品名: TINKERTOY 30 Model Super Building Set ? 200 Pieces ? For Ages 3+ Preschool Educational Toy
レビュー内容: Our kids love the variety they can build from their imagination, like a space station for example.

％商品名: TINKERTOY 30 Model Super Building Set ? 200 Pieces ? For Ages 3+ Preschool Educational Toy

And I tell you it's sometimes difficult for me to get the pieces to stick. So they are awesome but don't expect kids this age or even probably up to about 6 or so to be able to properly put them together.

％商品名: TINKERTOY 30 Model Super Building Set ? 200 Pieces ? For Ages 3+ Preschool Educational Toy
タイトル: Nice update to a classic toy
レビュー内容:
Modern update of a classic toy. Reviewers seem to de-rate it because not made of wood but nobody seems to remember what a pain the wood toys were with assemblies coming apart due to worn down wood pieces no longer fitting well anot to mention the cardboard windmill blades that soon became unusable. This set is all plastic and pieces snap in place securely. I hate to say it but I consider the plastic an improvement vs wood. I am puzzled by other reviewers comments about difficulty snapping pieces together. My 4 yr old grandson and six yr old granddaughter have no problem at all.

The pieces are larger than I remember as a kid. Good addition are the long bendable rods.

Both kids are captivated and is easily in their top 3 of favorite toys among some tough competition such as an Amazon Fire kids bundle. I bought 2 of the 200 piece sets and glad I did- fortunately they were on sale. Nice variety of parts though seems to be a disproportionate number of small, infrequently used parts- presumably padding the part count and the reason I rated 4 instead of 5 stars.

％商品名: TINKERTOY 30 Model Super Building Set ? 200 Pieces ? For Ages 3+ Preschool Educational Toy
レビュー内容:
I have mixed feelings about this set since this was one of my favorite toys growing up and the newer version barely resembles it.

The good:
-Versatile with many sizes rods and connectors that are color coded.
-Great open ended creative play.
- There's only a few really small pieces so my baby crawling around isn't in imminent danger while we're all playing.

The OK:
-200 is deceiving. Once it's all dumped out it doesn't look like a ton since many small pieces are included like a connector for 2 rods that's not always needed. You can't build more than one of the suggestions at a time which isn't compatible with showing off your hard work for very long.

-Speaking of hard work- the rods don't always "click" to ensure they're in. It takes some force and finesse for some of the pieces even for an adult. My 4 year old is getting a little frustrated and this isn't a toy she can successfully play with independently for very long, yet.

- Some of the pieces are pretty specific to one building option like the red grid (4 of them!). This won't snap two sides together unless it's a specific width apart so another example of really there's not as many usable pieces as expected.

I'd say the positives outweigh the negatives if you can catch this on a deal price and add another one of the sets.

％商品名: TINKERTOY 30 Model Super Building Set ? 200 Pieces ? For Ages 3+ Preschool Educational Toy
レビュー内容:
This is the third set of TinkerToys I've bought this year, and I can't say enough about the fun level. Of course I bought them to play with my 4 year old grandson, but as soon as they saw it my 12 and 10 year old grandkids got right to "work" making the various models and proudly displaying them. With as many pieces as I have now, we often build identical cars and race them down a ramp. We've built bridges, a Ferris wheel, cars, planes, and many other vehicles and amusement park rides.
Of course it's fun following the directions, but it's more fun putting them aside and just challenging ourselves to come up with our own designs. That way you find out what works and what doesn't, and you get pretty creative designing "work-arounds."
The pieces are far more durable and easy to work with than the wooden sets of my childhood, when the pieces would swell with humidity and not fit together. Plus, they don't break when clumsy little feet step on them.
One caveat: they fit together snugly, and little hands might not be strong enough to pull them apart. But, hey, that's when Grandpa is for.

％商品名: TINKERTOY 30 Model Super Building Set ? 200 Pieces ? For Ages 3+ Preschool Educational Toy
タイトル: Was worried about them being plastic instead of wood. Was pleasently suprised by the quality
レビュー内容:
?????PLASTIC WAS NOT A DOWNFALL?????

I was upset when I found out that Tinker Toys were plastic now. I wanted to get my kids the same great durable Tinker Toys I had as a kid. But to get the wood ones you either need to pay through the nose to get the 'classic' Tinker Toys, or you have to get off brands made in China that all have reviews saying the paint rubs off on everything and lord only knows what is used to make those unregulated paints that are coating the childrens' toy. So no thank you.

But to my surprise the plastic Tinker Toys are not a bad product. First off they feel very durable. They are not cheap junky plastic. They will hold up to 'kid play'. And they snap together so you don't have that situation where the rods fall out of the connectors. Additionally, all the holes and rods are the same size. So every piece fits together. I do remember on my old wood tinker toys that some of the holes in the connectors wouldn't be drilled right, and some of the wooden rods were out of round, so sometimes I'd have problems putting them together in certain ways. But with each piece coming out of the same molds, everything fits perfectly. (Thank you, Eli Whitney, for your contribution to society of interchangeable parts)

So ultimately I'm happy with these.

Note, some third parties are selling them for really high amounts. Be patient and wait for them to come back in stock with Amazon and other reasonable vendors. They should cost around twenty five bucks.

％商品名: TINKERTOY 30 Model Super Building Set ? 200 Pieces ? For Ages 3+ Preschool Educational Toy
レビュー内容: Got this when my son was 4-5 years old and he completely loved it. Legos were a bit challenging for his fingers at that time and these chunky pieces were great. He was able to use them, put them together, and disassemble easily. The colors and durability of the pieces are great for the younger ones and a great beginning toy before K'Nex or regular legos. If you kids really likes them you may need another box as 200 pieces aren't that many especially for a kid like mine who likes to build things and not take them apart and then has no more pieces to build something new. Like K'nex and Legos, this set comes with a book of ideas. We followed these at the beginning but eventually his little imagination took over and was able to build unrealistic things. Almost 2 years later, they are still holding strong for the next child...since his fine motor skills are much better, he has now moved onto Legos (his current passion).

％商品名: TINKERTOY 30 Model Super Building Set ? 200 Pieces ? For Ages 3+ Preschool Educational Toy
タイトル: Too little pieces for too much money. But the kids are happy. Bought a second set so they could really build.
レビュー内容:
TINKERTOY 30 Model Super Building Set (200 pieces)

Too expensive. I grew up with wooden ones that had a lot of pieces so you could build a lot of things, things that looked like real cars or planes, and they could be quite large. With this you can't make that much as back then and most stuff will look odd just so you can say "I built something". I did buy a 2nd kit to get my kids more pieces to play with but then, of course, I consider it more costly.

Materials are strong. Kids like it (as they don't know what little they have). I just know these could be cheaper or give a lot more for the price.

％商品名: BXQINLENX 25 PCS Gundam Modeler Basic Tools Craft Set For Car Model Assemble Building(E)
タイトル: A terrific gift for the novice to professional model builder!
レビュー内容: I frankly don't understand why a few customers were so quick with a "thumbs down" review? I'm a pro builder, with my ship models contracted by the USN Museum in Norfolk. Buy this same stuff in a glitzier box from Brookstone and you'll pay 5x more. One of my sharpening stones was broken, but it's still quite effective. Granted, it's not made in Switzerland, but in China. I like to buy USA made stuff too, but give this kit to the most prolific builder you know, and he'll (or she'll) find something that they'll use every day. It has a set of metric high speed drill bits, from 0.5mm through 5mm in 0.5 increments; I usually use the closest Imperial size when drilling for a tap, but using these, you get the correct pitch diameter for the best strength (Wolf, MSME, PE). It will be a wonderful set of tools fr the novice builder's birthday gift. In truth, I'd cut the last star in half, but the one thing that's missing is a saw blade.

Have already used the 550 grit sandpaper on a couple submarine model kits.
I am a forty year veteran of scale modeling, recently retired, and getting back seriously into modeling. Been getting tools and materials haphazardly, paying more money than this kit for similar items. These can be used for other craft hobbies too. Maybe some items are cheap, but all are fully serviceable. Overall, a good set of tools.

％商品名: BXQINLENX 25 PCS Gundam Modeler Basic Tools Craft Set For Car Model Assemble Building(E)
タイトル: While marketed for Gundam kit builders this toolkit is perfect for any Modeling subject
レビュー内容:
You get exactly what you order. Average quality tools produced in the Asian Market. While marketed for Gundam kit builders this toolkit is perfect for any Modeling subject.

As to be expected, everything is in metric and either japanese or chinese kanjis. They're tools and extremely self explanatory. The lack of English text is not a factor at all for this kit.

The only small detractor is the lack of a Scribing tool, but I haven't seen many kits that include one. I would personally have replaced one of the two sets of tweezers or one of the knife sharpening stones with a scribing tool if I were putting it together.

All in all, it's a solid starting place for a modeling tool kit.

％商品名: Learning Resources Skeleton Model
レビュー内容:
I got this skeleton model for my college Anatomy & Physiology class. It's a very helpful tool for identifying the major bones and sutures of the skull. You can even take the skull cap off to reveal the cranial fossae: anterior, middle, and posterior. The spine includes all 24 articulating vertebrae that are named by their region: cervical, thoracic, and lumbar. Beyond that, this is just a nice desk accessory due to its small size (see customer images).

Contrary to other reviews, my skeleton is quite stable. I frequently move it around without the stand. I can hold it by the rib cage and shake it, turn it upside down, and place it in a sitting position without it falling apart. Just make sure that you have secured the pieces in properly because they shouldn't fall apart that easily.

Overall, I am very pleased with this model. It is very detailed, right down to the shapes and number of vertebrae. I recommend it for anyone taking an introductory class on the skeletal system.

％商品名: Learning Resources Skeleton Model
レビュー内容:
My little brother is really into the human skeleton and he loved getting this as a gift. He was 7 when he received it and was able to put it together pretty easily with very little help.
He has it displayed on his bedside table and its survived several falls to the floor after snapping pieces back in place.
He learned quite a bit from putting it together and was able to use it with some health curriculum since he's homeschooled. Definitely a fun way to learn about the human body.

％商品名: Learning Resources Skeleton Model
レビュー内容:
It's small, like a toy. The way it's made doesn't allow the limbs to have full range of motion, but it has some movement. I'm studying Kinesiology, so I'm more curious about movement. What I really want is a full size skeleton with full range of motion, but those are super expensive. This little skeleton will have to do for now. For $15, it's cute enough to keep on your study desk to help with memorizing the major bones of the body. It makes a basic study buddy or a cute desk decoration.

The pieces are very small and a bit fragile. I read some poor reviews on pieces breaking, so I was very careful when unpackaging and assembling. Nothing broke and it turned out just fine. It's a fun little thing to assemble.

％商品名: Learning Resources Skeleton Model
タイトル: Anatomy Student Recommends as a General Tool for Learning
レビュー内容: This mini skeleton model is not 100% anatomically correct but it comes pretty close. I think the only thing wrong though was number of ribs and vertebrae. If you are an anatomy student, you may need to stick to studying real bone models to learn the different parts of the bones because the model is quite small, but this model is still good to use as it lets you see how the bones articulate with each other. And you can also study which bones are left and right using this model with the exception of the clavicle (this model does not reflect the actual clavicle shape). It is especially helpful in letting you see how the ribs articulate with the spine however. This helped me understand the different parts of the rib and vertebrae because of the model. I would recommend this model as a helpful general overview of the skeletal structure. It was worth the $15. Good deal for the knowledge learned.

％商品名: Learning Resources Skeleton Model
タイトル: Inaccurate; elementary school level detail; no advantage over online images/videos
レビュー内容:
2 Stars: I don't like it.

As far as anatomical models go, this is a pretty poor example with some gross inaccuracies. Case in point: This model does not have thumbs. Granted there are five fingers on each hand, there are no thumbs per se. That is, where the thumbs are supposed to be are instead much longer fingers with an extra joint (the thumb should only have two, the metacarpophalangeal and distal interphalangeal joints; the model depicts three). This is visible if you examine the image closely (which I apparently failed to do).

Overall, the pieces fit poorly and everything sort of sits off kilter. The skull and scapulae are disproportionately large and the curvature of the spine is poorly represented. As a "learning resource," this model doesn't contribute anything over online images, videos, or 3D models. Something of this level of detail might be appropriate for elementary school or junior high school. I would consider it borderline for high school, inappropriate for collegiate student use, and wildly inappropriate for anything medically related (orthopedics etc.).

I'll probably end up using mine as a car mirror ornament.

％商品名: Learning Resources Skeleton Model
タイトル: I found that it was not very useful for the level of detail and extensive bone details ...
レビュー内容: I originally purchased this as a study aid for my Anatomy & Physiology class. I found that it was not very useful for the level of detail and extensive bone details that I needed. However, I think it would be useful for a very general overview of the bones or for an elementary or high school level science class. That being said, I ended up keeping the little guy because I unexpectedly found him to be quite cute and I use as a decoration instead. I'm a nursing student so he's nice to have around as a reminder and motivator.

％商品名: Learning Resources Skeleton Model
タイトル: Okay but not too handy for anatomy class
レビュー内容: This is a nice little skeleton. It can help if you just need to learn the overall skeleton like the major bones but not the smaller ones. The skull lacks the detail you need if you are a nursing or medical student taking anatomy. Buy this if you're not in need of a detailed skeleton or if you just want your kids or students to have something to help them visualize the main structures. This skeleton does not have a detailed manual and only comes with a picture booklet for assembly. Also, it does fall apart easily and doesn't have a very good stand to hold it up. The whole thing is about as tall as an envelope, the jaw, arms, legs and skull move but other than that it's nothing more than a statue.

％商品名: K’NEX 70 Model Building Set ? 705 Pieces ? Ages 7+ Engineering Education Toy
レビュー内容: For beginner K'NEX users, this could be overwhelming to a 7 year old! There are 705 pieces but a lot of them are spacers and tiny connectors. Even though it seems like this is a huge building set from the amount of pieces but if you want to build something bigger and better, I think you need to get a couple of these. You can make some cool things but they are on the smaller side.The box makes this building set look exciting and fun! The box itself is made from cardboard and let's just say it isn't the sturdiest! I can see this not lasting a long time and these pieces everywhere in my house! I decided to put it in a plastic Tupperware style container instead. I mean, this is a good building and learning set, don't get me wrong! My grandson had a blast making things and he did learn patience too ( Grandma on the other hand, didn't do so well...LOL) It did come with instructions but I wish for people like me, that they were a bigger picture and more detailed. I mean, it was kind of hard for me to see which piece was what. I am just old...LOL. He had a lot of fun and he did really love his Birthday gift! It might be a good idea if you have little ones to do this with the older child at nap time. He has made quite a few cool things and he is happy, so Grandma is happy! The quality is there with this building set and seems to be well made. Only one piece broke but that was me...the one with no patience.... Great gift idea and it will keep them busy for hours!

％商品名: K’NEX 70 Model Building Set ? 705 Pieces ? Ages 7+ Engineering Education Toy
タイトル: Love the set, instructions could be a little better
レビュー内容: I bought this big general K'Nex box of parts to supplement another general set and several "Maker" sets that are for specific projects. The kids like to build projects, but the results are often so beautiful that we hate to dismantle them to provide enough pieces for the next project. There are instructions for several projects included in the box with this set, and, now, plenty of pieces. The difference in the instructions with this set and the others is that in the Maker sets, the instructions are laid out in steps, and with each step there is a parts count for the step. This provides a more efficient building process than looking at the diagram, retrieving the necessary parts, then discovering while building that we really needed, say, 5 yellow stars, not three. I put out small muffin pans to help organize the pieces. The little guy, 3.5 years old, is really too young to complete more than the very simplest projects, but he likes to build while his older brother does. We decided that since the box says it is for ages 7 and up, that he could be 3.5, and I would be 3.5, and together we'd be seven and could build the projects together.

％商品名: K’NEX 70 Model Building Set ? 705 Pieces ? Ages 7+ Engineering Education Toy
タイトル: I love K'nex. My children love K'nex
レビュー内容:
I love K'nex. My children love K'nex. But I was rather let down that I fell for the advertising photo this time around, of a box overflowing with K'nex pieces. I love the price I bought it at. That just can't be beat. But what really disappointed me with this purchase was that I got such a big box for a product that was packed as small as a bag of chips. I counted each piece to make sure I was getting the promised 705. (All accounted for.) That's just way too much box! I guess some use the box for holding their creations. My kids like to display their creations and I prefer using a clear plastic bin for storage of loose parts.
I also did not like that this set is more very tiny connectors and spacers than actual rods. As it is, I would need to go and buy another set with more rods to add to this one.
But we will always buy K'nex. I love that it allows the child to build and create with their own imagination than someone else's.

％商品名: K’NEX 70 Model Building Set ? 705 Pieces ? Ages 7+ Engineering Education Toy
タイトル: Perfect for teaching about engineering and physics in a platform your kid will understand... Infinite possibilities!
レビュー内容: What can't you build with these things? I think I have as much fun as my 5-year old son playing with Kinex. We have 4 different sets. The instructions/diagrams are easy to follow. You know its a good toy when there are no sounds out of the kid for hours and the tongue is dry from concentrating so hard. Watching my kid's eye/hand coordination progress while playing with Kinex has been amazing over the last 2 years. Highly recommended for kids that like to build stuff. A step up (and I say this lightly) from Legos in that the STEM features are much more intuitive, and I like explaining the physics of some of the design concepts and using the toys as a teaching moment.. Only drawback is that once a cool creation is made, it has to come apart to make the next one! Colors help keep the small pieces from the clutches of the vacuum demon (mother).

％商品名: K’NEX 70 Model Building Set ? 705 Pieces ? Ages 7+ Engineering Education Toy
レビュー内容:
I like the size of this box. I purchased several of these particularly for Toys for Tots gifts just on the chance of slipping something educational and fun into the choices.

％商品名: Revell 1:48 A10 Warthog
タイトル: Fun, but Beware Flaw in Assembly Instructions
レビュー内容:
Overall, I enjoyed building this model. I haven't assembled a model since I was a teenager. Like a lot of the reviewers, I experienced some challenges with the fit, confusing instructions, and difficulty gluing some of the parts. One thing I have not seen in the previous reviews is the mention of a flaw in the order of assembly.

The second major step is the construction of the fuselage, and the instructions state to add a small weight to the inside of the nose for proper balance. You then seal the nose cavity with Part 3. Later, you attach the tail assembly. This is the point at which you learn what constitutes a small weight. The weight I added was too small, and I had to cut out Part 3 to add additional weight. I would recommend waiting to attach Part 3 until Section 7, after you complete the landing gear, at which point you can best determine the required weight. Perhaps experienced modelers have the foresight not to follow the instructions, but for less experienced people who follow the instructions, it's a serious flaw.

％商品名: Revell 1:48 A10 Warthog
レビュー内容: Kill me, I hate this model and I hate Revell for making me hate it. I have loved A-10s from being a child and was so excited to build one. The issues were that just about every part has some sort of bad fit. I found myself trimming and puddying more than should be reasonable. I read in other reviews that this model takes some babying but let me insure you it takes a lot of patience and persistence. I fought and fought with the wings to get them to kind of be level with each other (and I am butt hurt that my wings are not straight). Other models have a much better convention for getting good looking wings. The instructions are bad (like some dude drew them, literally) and often times you stare at them wondering what and where it is talking about. There are thin pieces on the main body and wings that are very easy to bend off and break due to all the weird angles you will be gluing and holding it. Can this be a great model? Yes. Is it going to take a lot of work and frustration? Yes. It has been sitting in my room with a base coat for weeks now and I still hate the idea of messing with it. Never again, never again

％商品名: Learning Resources Cross-section Brain Model
レビュー内容: I am a therapist and frequently talk with clients about how the brain works on a very basic level, particularly thinking and feeling. I wanted a simple, non-overwhelming model to be able to show clients during this explanation. I was so excited for my brain to arrive but was extremely disappointed with the actual thing. Most disappointing was that it didn't have the amygdala or hippocampus listed among the parts. Also disappointing was that the two halves don't stay together unless you hold them. The outside is gray rather than the bright yellow shown in the image, and it's made of material reminiscent of a dog-toy. I believe this would be good for children which is why there are so many positive comments about it, but if you want it for anything other than that, keep looking. As one other reviewer said (which I should have heeded and didn't), "it's neither a toy nor an educational tool". I certainly expected to get a lot more for the price.

％商品名: Learning Resources Cross-section Brain Model
タイトル: I Use This ALL the Time
レビュー内容: I teach a lot about the brain to children, and I love this model to pair with real brains so they can compare and contrast structures. Often I'm talking about the "thinking brain" (prefrontal cortex) and its function, so I have students look at animal brains to realize they have (comparatively) much more limbic system structures than cortex as compared to humans!

％商品名: Learning Resources Cross-section Brain Model
レビュー内容: This is a great brain for teaching. I did not give it a 5 because I would have liked it larger for classroom use. The kids did enjoy passing it around, looking at it, and feeling the creases in the brain. Colors were helpful.

％商品名: Learning Resources Cross-section Brain Model
レビュー内容:
this foam product is pretty flimsy and really doesn't show or explain much. The price was excellent but I hope something better comes along soon.
I see in my previous review I said, "I hope something better comes along soon." And now it has! The HANDY BRAIN MODEL is based on Daniel Siegel's hand model of the brain. Not only does it show all the lobes of the cortex, but it shows the Cingulate gyrus (that thinks deliberately), amygdala (anger/fear center), hippocampus (that gets shrunk by cortisol in PTSD), Caudate nucleus (big player in OCD), nucleus accumbens (reward center), insula (monitors visceral organs and brings them to homeostasis), and more subcortical areas.
This product was designed by a therapist for therapists!

％商品名: Learning Resources Cross-section Brain Model
レビュー内容: I am a chemical dependency counselor and use this model to help my clients visualize what goes on in their brains when they use alcohol and other drugs. It is kind of small though-about the size of a 10 year old's brain.

％商品名: Learning Resources Cross-section Brain Model
タイトル: Good for a young child, not all that detailed but durable, more of a toy
レビュー内容: The detail isn't great. There is no real texture on the inside of the brain, but there is good texture outside. It is a foam model, there are only two pieces, and it isn't something amazingly high quality to study with. However, I bought this for a 4.5 year old who is interested in the heart and brain. I think it's actually a good choice for him. I almost bought a more advanced model, but I'm glad that I didn't at this point. I think it's a good starter, will be something he can hold in his hands, see the basic parts of the brain labeled inside and get an idea of how it works. It's not too advanced for a young child and will feel like a toy, yet teach him something. If he loves it, I'll probably consider a more advanced model for him in a few months.

％商品名: Learning Resources Cross-section Brain Model
レビュー内容: We ordered this as a prop for a science fair project on the human brain. It was a HUGE hit with all the kids who enjoyed the hands on aspect of playing with the halves and fitting them together. We played hot potato and we did the hokey pokey with the left and right hemispheres to help explain that while they are seperate areas, they work together to control every aspect of the body. I am thrilled with the product and we intend to keep it as a fun reminder to think before acting. I also liked the very quick shipping and the product was exactly as pictured.

％商品名: Learning Resources Cross-section Brain Model
タイトル: Useful educational prop and safe toy
レビュー内容:
When working with parents, this small prop is useful in explaining to them what's going on. I just pop open the brain and point to different color-coded sections. They seem to appreciate having the visual aid.

For the kids, it's spongy, looks and feels funny, and they enjoy it. Haven't been hit by it yet when they throw things, that's also good. But if I am, I expect that this will not hurt so badly due to its spongy nature.

(Child psychologist specializing in developmental and behavioral disorders)

％商品名: Testors 3507AT Liquid Cement for Plastic Models, 1-Ounce
タイトル: Absolutly worthless compared to superior alternatives
レビュー内容:
Wow, I'm shocked to see so many raving reviews. Perhaps many others haven't discovered a better alternative?

This cement is worthless for model building, and here is why:
-Difficult to squeeze: No, I don't need to get a hand exerciser, but when it takes a massive amount of force to squeeze the bottle, you lose dexterity and it becomes harder to put that glue where you want it. It is also impossible to get less than one big drop, so the small precise tip is useless
-The glue dries VERY slowly. Like, perhaps 30 to 45 seconds for a good contact-stick, and a full minute to hold something in place that has a bit of spring to it (such as a part that doesn't quite fit). Do you want to hold each part of a 500 part set for a minute?
-You have zero control of flow. Because of how hard it is to squeeze, your options are one big drop or a squirt.

I was using [LOCTITE 1734231 1g Super Glue Liquid Mini Trio, Pack of 3pc, Clear] while I waited for this crap to arrive, and I immediately went back to it. The Loctite glue has a bigger applicator, but because the tube is easy to squeeze, you can get sub-drop sized amounts. It also bonds almost instantly, so you can move on to the next part while it really sets. Did I mention it doesn't smell? Do yourself a favor, use anything else but this crap.

％商品名: Testors 3507AT Liquid Cement for Plastic Models, 1-Ounce
レビュー内容: the liquid does not come out nicely/easily/fluidly and I'm pretty sure its because of the plastic tube that it comes out of. I got this to compare with my Testors Model Master Liquid Cement - 8872C and I can say model 3507AT does not come close to how good the 8872C was. the tube of the other model is metal and I'm pretty sure that makes a huge difference in quality of the drops. The instructions to cut the tip say not to go past 2mm but in reality I had to cut even more in order to even see the hole the liquid will come out of. AND i have to unclog it every time I use it because it doesn't want to come out!. I do not recommend this for someone needing liquid cement for small precise models. get the other Testor liquid cement model it works very well!

％商品名: Testors 3507AT Liquid Cement for Plastic Models, 1-Ounce

レビュー内容: ... not QUITE as good as the Model Masters version, which Testors also makes. This Testors version does have a very slim applicator (you snip the tip off after removing the outer lid), but the Model Masters version of the glue features an even more precise applicator. Still, this is MILES better than the tubes of Testors glue I used as a kid -- believe me, the glue from those had a way of getting all over everything, including (inevitably) the cockpits of the aircraft models I was regularly botching.

％商品名: Testors 3507AT Liquid Cement for Plastic Models, 1-Ounce
レビュー内容: The glue works well and holds plastic modeling parts together almost immediately. I would advise buyers that they might need to cut off more of the tip than the package instructs in order for the glue to start flowing, and that by doing so the tip may not be as precise as the user might like.

％商品名: Testors 3507AT Liquid Cement for Plastic Models, 1-Ounce
レビュー内容:
What can I say about this cement? It works! And under pretty extreme conditions too. I'm a school teacher and I used this to glue together a bunch of centimeter cubes to make cube puzzles. I glued a couple sets together the other night and they were ready to be lightly played with within minutes. I did a little testing and they held together OK, then I let it sit together all night. The next day I put my puzzle in my pocket and went off to school. Mid-day I remembered the puzzle in my pocket and reached in, sure a piece had snapped off being in there with my huge key ring and dozens of keys all morning at work. Nope, they'd all held together. Great glue!

I had no problem cutting a small piece off the end and love the cap that I can put back on. It came with two small wires to clean out the applicator with if it gets clogged, but honestly I just tossed them as I didn't have a good place to keep them from getting lost. I'll use a toothpick or something else if clogging becomes an issue, but I've seen reviewers say they left the lid off all night and it was just fine.

％商品名: Testors 3507AT Liquid Cement for Plastic Models, 1-Ounce
レビュー内容: I don't know how they did this but even though you forget to put the cap back on, the applicator still works. Bought another one to finish the project, a four feet USS Constitution. Most useful in preventing a knot from coming undone.

％商品名: Testors 3507AT Liquid Cement for Plastic Models, 1-Ounce
タイトル: Great plastic model glue applicator - maybe the best
レビュー内容: Excellent product that provides a very precise way of gluing together styrene and a couple other plastics. Cut the funnel at the width you want (start close to the tip than you think, you can always cut off more of the tip to get a larger application hole) and gently squeeze the bottle. I've had mine for over a year and it still flows very well.

％商品名: Fascinations Metal Earth ICONX 3D Laser Cut Model Kit Kawasaki Ninja H2R Motorcycle
タイトル: A real project, but well worth the effort.
レビュー内容:
I should star outright by saying that this model kit isn't perfect. A couple of the parts seemed poorly designed, and didn't quite fit the way the directions wanted you to install them. There were also a couple instances where the directions were either ambiguous or just plain wrong. One series of blueprints in particular told me to bend all of the parts on one of the late body panels in the wrong directions. But I'd still rate this 5 stars simply for the fact that the finished product is so utterly amazing looking.

Also, this being one of the more in depth and difficult models in the lineup, it'd be best to get some experience with these model kits before you try to tackle this one. And I'd assume most people who have experience with these kits know to look ahead a few steps, and to check finished model pictures to see what you are doing is correct.

I've made a few kits in the ICONX lineup, and this us thus far my favorite. It's really detailed, and it's built in such a bit at that it doesn't lose much at all from transition from real bike to sheet metal model kit. Plus this is the first kit of theirs that I've seen use a bit of color in the built. While not necessary, it's a neat addition, and makes a lot of the details pop.

The hardest part of the build, for me at least, were all of the tiny details on the engine block. Lots of tiny and fragile parts to put together. Once I got passed that, and onto the body of the build, things went faster and smoother. I actually didn't encounter a problem with the handlebars, as some reviewers mentioned, but I did need to use tin snips on a couple identical pieces, as their perforations did not go all the way through the parts that needed bent and folded. Not a big deal though, with the right tools at least.

And even though it says tools aren't needed, you should at least provide something to cut the pieces out of the sheets. My kit did include a free pair of tweezers, which us a nice inclusion that I've noticed random ICONX kits come with. So if you don't have a pair, this kit should have you covered.

Overall, in spite of some oddities and annoyances, this is a highly recommended kit from me. I'd recommend some prior experience before making it, but steady hands and patience could get you through it too, with some frustration. For its price, it's now a favorite of mine in the Metal Earth catalog, and well worth checking out.

％商品名: Testors Hobby Supplies Paint Kit
タイトル: Has everything you need except paint and glue...
レビュー内容: I used to build models as a kid, and I decided to revisit my old childhood hobby. I picked out a P40 plane, and then I realized I would need paint, glue, and knives, etc. When I saw this kit, it looked like it had everything when it came to tools, and it does. It has the Xacto (very sharp!) to cut pieces off the tree and trim flash - Sandpaper to smooth edges (great to have, I use the sandpaper to smooth pieces and they look better, plus you can rough up the surface for better glue adhesion), 3 paint brushes (small, medium, large) which will cover most painting jobs (however one might want to get a tiny, tiny brush for the faces of the pilot, etc.) - Lastly it has tips you put on the glue tubes, to direct glue correctly and to achieve smaller drops. Great to get your hobby started or re-started. I recommend getting paints and glue separately of course, but this covers your tools. I recommend this.

％商品名: Revell SnapTite 2017 Ford GT Model Kit
タイトル: The rims are sprayed in silver and look really nice pressed into the black rubber low profile tires
レビュー内容: After I saw the GT Win at the 24 Hours of Le Mans on Sunday June 19th, I thought that these kits won't be around too long before they disappeared forever and I would really regret not grabbing one while they are still available. It is the only 1/24th scale replica out there in circulation that looks accurate. It's a snap together so it goes together in about 20 minutes or so, with no moving parts other than the rolling wheels. The rims are sprayed in silver and look really nice pressed into the black rubber low profile tires.The wheels do have strong metal axles. There is an embossed engine profile under the rear glass. If you're looking for a replica similar to the old style dealership plastic demos that they handed out in the 50s and 60s, this is the ticket! The quality of the kit is excellent. I used single edge razor to clean the flashing off the plastic parts before snapping them together, not really necessary, but I'm a perfectionist with this kind of stuff. The 2017 GT is truly an amazing Super Car that will go down in the racing history books for sure! I just had to have one to display on my desk at work and this kit works great for just that! When they release the decked-out Racing version, I'll be buying that kit too.

％商品名: Revell SnapTite 2017 Ford GT Model Kit
レビュー内容: Giving it five stars for service and overall exceeding of my expectations. This was not designed as a "modeler's" kit, so don't expect a lot of detail, but it did have more detail than I expected (can't believe they actually had the buttresses in the body, I thought for sure this would be solid plastic!!!) I had planned to paint this model, but once I received it, I nixed that idea but for painting the interior and the engine (interior is not that visible anyway). The body is molded in the appropriate color and requires no painting (purists might note that the "glitter" in the metallic finish is perhaps too large for this scale). No detail on the undercarriage whatsoever. This model was designed for a child to put together and play with, though some parts, such as the axles and rear-view mirrors may require adult strength and dexterity. Mirrors are made of a softer plastic (think army men) than the rest of the model so they likely won't break easily but will bend. The body is relatively thick, and not the flimsy plastic that Revell uses for airplanes. I'm quite pleased with this purchase. FYI, Hobby Lobby has this model for $17.99.

％商品名: Revell 1:24 Shelby Mustang GT350H
レビュー内容:
My twelve-year old nephew expressed an interest in putting together a model car, so I did some research and landed on this kit for us to work on together. Well actually, I bought this one for my twelve-year old nephew, and another one that I thought my seven-year old nephew and I could put together (with lots of help) at the same time.

Uh, NOPE. Manufacturer recommended age: 10 years and up. Are they KIDDING with this? I ended up basically putting the whole thing together for my older nephew. It was all just too tedious for him to keep his attention. We actually never finished it. No WAY would my younger nephew have been able to work on his, even with extensive help from me.

Now, this is a good kit, barring the recommended age being, in my opinion, just plain wrong. The instructions were reasonably good and there was nothing really wrong with it. I just wish that I had chosen something else that he could/would actually do by himself.
