％商品名: 4M Earth and Moon Model Kit
タイトル: Good Educational Value, but Don't Touch It
レビュー内容:
The 3D Solar System Kit by Toysmith is a good educational/learning tool that introduces children to the world of astronomy. This planetary system includes spheres representing the eight planets and the sun, sized in relative order (not to scale). It hangs from the ceiling as a mobile unit and includes special glow in the dark paint for added fun.

This solar system kit comes completely unassembled and part of the enjoyment for youngsters is the application of the paint. There are two strips of paint included with several different colors. This allows kids the chance to explore their creative side. Some kids will choose to paint the planets according to their actual color, such as painting the planet Mars red. Others will mix and match and create all sorts of different color combinations. Kids will enjoy this part of the process almost as much as they will enjoy looking at the completed mobile itself.

Once the fun of painting is over, it will then be time to assemble the pieces together. This is easily the most frustrating part of the process and depending on the ages of your kids, you may very well have to complete this step for them. The reason this is so frustrating is because of the very small size of the hooks and the rectangular pieces that are anchored into the spheres. The tiny hooks and even tinier rectangular pieces have a small hole in the middle through which you have to thread the fishing line. This takes time and patience and you have to tie the ends securely enough that the line won't come loose. A single knot isn't good enough. You need to make two knots if you want the line to stay in place. The pieces are so tiny, many young children will be unable to complete the task and even many adults will grow frustrated. The manufacturer should rethink this aspect and, if nothing else, increase the size of these pieces, in order to make them easier to work with.

Another possible trouble spot with this solar system module is the fragility of the pieces. The mobile looks interesting hanging from the ceiling and its lightweight design means it will slowly turn, with the slightest amount of air. However, because the pieces are so light and fragile, you have to keep the mobile away from wind/air sources. The air movement from a fan, for example, could be enough to make the planetary bodies come apart and/or cause the nylon string to become untied. Even the air movement from a heat duct could be enough to cause problems. It's best to place the mobile far out of the reach of small children. If little ones can easily touch the mobile, the constant handling will cause the pieces to fall apart.

Taken as a whole, the 3D Solar System Kit by Toysmith is still good educational toy for kids that introduces them to the world of astronomy. Assembling the tiny pieces can really try your patience and the fragile nature of this mobile solar system limits its quality. However, it still has enough positive points to earn a slight recommendation.

％商品名: 4M Earth and Moon Model Kit
レビュー内容:
Got this for my 6 year old kids' holiday gift. We painted and partially assembled it together during a couple of afternoons, then I strung it together by myself. It's definitely not a project they could do on their own, but it was fine with an adult helping -- as long as the adult isn't too picky about the end product! Overall it was relatively simple and the directions were good enough.

Pros:
* Sufficient paint. We did though run out of some colors -- don't expect to use the same color on several planets.
* Easy to snap the planets together -- and pull them apart again if needed. Kids did the painting and snapping together themselves, once I showed them how to align the pieces correctly (so the two halves of the hole for the hangar pieces line up).
* Plenty of fishing line for hanging, though you won't think so when you first see it.
* Assembly is easy enough, though still enough challenge for an older kid to enjoy. I did have to map it all out on the table before starting to string them on the support pieces, since the planets are close enough in size that it's not easy to tell them apart.

Cons:
* I was surprised to see that the unpainted planets were a dark blue plastic -- most paint colors covered it OK, though needing a bit more than they would otherwise for coverage, but getting a light color meant first "priming" it with white.
* Barely enough glow paint, and it doesn't glow much. It does if you shine a bright light directly on it for a few minutes, and then make the room really dark. But since it's a mobile, most kids' bedrooms aren't going to have a bright light *under* it. And having one over it simply makes the top of the planets glow -- which you can't see unless you're really tall.

Another minor problem I ran into is that the assembly instructions showing where on each hangar to hang each planet are only in centimeters. I couldn't find a ruler anywhere in my house with metric on it so I had to pull out the calculator and convert to inches. I won't deduct any stars for that, since I'd rather the US went metric anyway, and I have no good excuse for not having a dual-system ruler in the house. But be forewarned.

Liked, it and would buy it again.

％商品名: 4M Earth and Moon Model Kit
レビュー内容: I'd give this 4.5 stars if that were an option (and why isn't it an option, by the way?). It was perfect for our needs as an elementary home school family. My first grader loved it and was able to learn from the 3D, hands-on experience. There's no better way to learn an abstract concept. I snapped the planets together and sanded them slightly with the sandpaper square to "rough them up" before painting, as suggested. My seven-year-old and I snapped them into position on the model and then painted them together. The paint adhered to the planets very well. The glow paint didn't work well when we mixed it with other paints, but it did work well on the planets that we applied it to as a top layer (just a little FYI). This model is very small, but that works well for us. Just for reference, the "sun" is about the size of a ping pong ball. Jupiter is about the size of a giant marble, maybe a bit larger. The planets and distances between are not to scale but served our purpose well. We were wanting to learn about orbits, positions of the planets, and sequence from the sun. The only thing I would have liked to change was the fact that the set doesn't include Pluto. Yes, I know it's no longer considered a planet as it is now considered a "dwarf planet". Still, I would've liked to have it in the set.

％商品名: 4M Earth and Moon Model Kit
レビュー内容: I love this product so much. My husband is so into the universe and space, so I had to get my son a solar system mobile. I was originally planning on making him one with crafting items from Michaels, and then I ran across this one on Amazon and just had to get it because you are able to paint them on your own. That was my favorite part. I love crafts and I love art, so this item was perfect. I didn't mind the limited amount of colors and the fact that I had to mix colors to make certain colors. I really enjoyed putting this together for our son. And he really loves looking at it. He's always reaching up towards it wanting to touch it. Every time I go into the room with him, I tell him the names of the planets in their order and I point to them so he could know. The ONLY thing that I didn't like was that it shows Venus as blue when it is in fact known for being yellow due to the dust and gas. Luckily, I knew the colors of the planets, so I could correct that myself. I just hope that other people look them up online or something before they follow the guidelines given.

％商品名: 4M Earth and Moon Model Kit
レビュー内容:
You know I almost did not buy this because of the reviews for everyone. First let me say that this is NOT a toy. This is not something to be played with like you would a car or Barbie. This is an education toy that sits and waits till you need to use it for school. this is what I bought it for and this is what it was manufactured for.

Second, the parts are smaller then I thought they would be, BUT, not so small that my 8 year old could not handle it. I do recommend you use your own paint brushes. You know how these children kits are, the brush is so huge that there is no way you can do any detail work. I happen to have a brush set for my child and we just used that.

Lastly, I think this was well worth the money. We were going to put together one of those Styrofoam ball solar systems, but this is WAY better! It is not hanging from my ceiling and it comes to the table every Tuesday and Friday when we learn about our solar system. Even my 5 year old is starting to understand the solar system and this educational toy has been a great help in learning about rotate and revolve.

I highly recommend you give this a try, especially if you are a home educator or a parent who just wants to spend some time with your kids learning about the solar system. For the price, really what do you have to loose but a little time having fun painting it and putting it together with your children!?!?!

％商品名: Morphun Mega Junior Model Mathsphun Addition Board Side Joining Bricks, #44204b *Holiday Gift
Gundam Modeler Basic Tools Craft Set For Car Model Assemble Building Kit by Alemon
タイトル: The best starter set on Amazon
レビュー内容:
This is the best tool kit for the asking price on Amazon, better than the Tamiya starter set by leaps and bounds. The side cutters are not the best quality, but are comfortable to hold and cut very well while sharp, however I suspect they will dull quickly. They are a good first pair for beginners and will last until you decide to upgrade to a nicer pair.
The Tamiya set only includes one set of flimsy angled tweezers. The 2 tweezers, angled and straight, are very pointy and have a quality heft to them.
The screwdrivers are nice and long with good handles, well suited to smaller jobs like gunpla.
The pen knife is very nice, smaller blade than xacto and a very comfortable tapered handle. It is very comfortable in the hand. Included are a small vial of replacement blades, they look like snapped off sections of a retractable box cutter blade, which coincidentally comes with the Tamiya set. Personally I find that type unsuited to modeling due to the blade not locking in place.
Three files are included, a flat, a rounded and an angled. These coupled with the sanding sticks (6 different grits!) will ensure no gate nubs remain on your finished kit.

The last inclusion is a humble piece of yellow plastic with angled edges. No one understands it's true purpose, but you will find it indispensable on the journey you will soon embark upon. Hold it fast against your breast, for it is the only thing that will keep you safe when the horrors come to call. Heed my warning or ye be lost to the darkness.
Like I said though, it's a great set.

％商品名: Gundam Modeler Basic Tools Craft Set For Car Model Assemble Building Kit by Alemon
レビュー内容:
This toolkit is a great all-around set of tools for those looking to start building model kits.

It includes:

- Three metal files of differing shapes/angles
- Three sanding boards of differing grit levels
- Two tweezers (bent and straight)
- One hobby knife plus refill blades
- Part separator
- Two screwdrivers (phillips, flathead)
- One pair of clippers
- Plastic case

The clippers are not the greatest, and I've noticed a slight dulling after just three HG kits, but they're far from being obsolete. The three sanding boards come in three perfect grit levels for me. Since they're unlabeled, I don't know exactly what number they are, but they're a nice selection of coarse, medium and fine grit that work well getting rid of those nubs and seams. The knife is comfortable, and has a textured grip to prevent slipping. The blades are easily swappable, and I was well into work on my third kit before I had to swap one. generally find the metal files to be too coarse for my needs and preferences, and tend to only use them in rare instances. The tweezers are really nice, with very thin tips to get into small crevices. Of course, I mostly just use them for sticker application. The part separator is one of those items I thankfully haven't had to use more than once or twice so far, but worked very well. I haven't used the screwdrivers at all yet, but they don't seem particularly remarkable in any way - good, or bad. The plastic case is nice but I wish it were a little bigger. It fits all of the included items just fine, but doesn't leave much room for anything else you may want to add.

The only reason I may suggest going with a different kit over this one might be to get one that includes a cutting mat, but you can pick one of those up separately..

％商品名: Gundam Modeler Basic Tools Craft Set For Car Model Assemble Building Kit by Alemon
タイトル: Its alright to start, but you'll be upgrading soon
レビュー内容:
For the price point of this tool kit isn't bad at all. You'd fairly get a good amount of things, 12 in all including the box (which i like the most). So ill break it down with my experience on this tool set.

-First thing is the 3 files with the red handles arent your normal files. They have this weird coat on them and dont look like files at all. Either way I thought id tested them on the feet of the kit im currently building (00 Exia MG). It scuffed the paint off the paint as i was sanding down the excess nib with the file, thus im going to never use it again.

-The nippers that come with it are alright, but im considering upgrading to the GP nippers (Gundam planet). They are suppose to rival the god hands and the price point is a fair amount cheaper too. Gundam planet nippers are $35 (popular choice) vs God hands $45-50 (plus theyre not always in stock). So my advice is to buy better nippers and do research for the one that you'd like. (invest your money in better nippers and you'll see your investment do its work).

-Moving onto the modeler's knife or X-acto (whichever you want to call it, either is fine). Its not all that great either. The blades arent really sharp and its flimsy. Plus the rotator near the grip unscrews itself making the blade lose out of its housing. I'd have to check each time i scrape off the excess when i cut it off the runner. When i put down the modeler's knife, it rolls off of every surface (i may be exaggerating a little bit, but the damn thing doesn't stay put the first moment you place it down lol). Its becoming a nuisance. My suggestion is to get a better X-acto knife with better replacement blades like the Tamiya pro modelers knife $16 (which is what im going to buy next as well).

-So all in all, i dont use much of the tool set that they provided within this set. The biggest plus to me is that when you do buy this tool set, you'd have a nice transparent box to put other things/upgraded tools in. You can also hang it too :D

Pros:
-3 sanding bars are good
-2 Tweezers
-1 part separator (yellow piece)
-1 box (the case the whole tool set came in)

Cons:
-Bad files
-Flimsy modelers knife and replacement blades
-Nippers are alright

％商品名: Gundam Modeler Basic Tools Craft Set For Car Model Assemble Building Kit by Alemon
レビュー内容:
The set is exactly what is described, a bunch of cheap tools gathered in a plastic box. I have no major issues with the tools but they are not great quality tools either. The only two complaints I really have are:

1) The nipper blades are really thick, with what seems like a 45 degree angle on the blade. They work but it's hard to sometimes get them in tight places around the sprus.

2) The sanding sticks don't have a "buffing" stick so there is no way, with this kit alone, to get a nice shiny plastic finish again after sanding. This doesn't affect me because I paint my models anyway, however when my son tried using them he was unable to use these to sand down without adding that buffing stick.

％商品名: Popculta 8-set 3D dinosaur jigsaw puzzle assembly model assorted (Pack of 8)
Fascinations Metal Earth 1908 Ford Model T 3D Metal Model Kit
タイトル: ... put together more than 50 metal earth models and love every one of them
レビュー内容:
I've put together more than 50 metal earth models and love every one of them. Many times you can find a set of multiple models for a much lower individual price. Some are just harder than others. A few considered "easy" on metal earths web site have been harder than ones considered "challenging" or "expert". I like the harder ones. Spending $7 to $10 on a model that I put together in less than 20 minutes sucks. Having the proper tools is a must. A pair of small wire cutters (I purchased the Hakko CHP-170 for less than $5), a small pair of pliers or two (I purchased at Hobby Lobby in the jewelry section), a set of small electronic/watch repair screwdrivers (to bend the tabs or to take apart when I mess up), and since my eyes are not what they used to be, a head magnifier or cheap reading glasses you can get at any dollar store. I search around the house for things that may help. Round pencils, small wood dowel, markers of different sizes, anything that fits the shape I need.

Many of the pieces in the models are very small, and the tabs to be bent or twisted are hard to get to or manipulate. But isn't that the idea of a model? With all Metal Earth models, take your time and if something doesn't seem to fit then stop, backtrack, and look and see if you missed something or have a wrong piece in the wrong place. The instructions are easy to read, but on the more than 50 models I have put together only 2 or 3 have had an error in the instructions. I have learned that if you come to a spot in the instructions that is hard to understand then slightly twist the tabs. This allows for a much easier time taking apart. You can then bend or twist the tabs when you know it is correct. The tabs can be bent several times before they break (I can't seem to put together any of them without messing up and having to take a piece or two off to correct).

％商品名: Fascinations Metal Earth 1908 Ford Model T 3D Metal Model Kit
タイトル: Its simple fantastic and fun to assemble !!!!
レビュー内容: This car model is my second purchase of a laser cut model (after a tractor). I was in love with the idea of these laser cut model. they are finely cut in to a metal sheet. It is shipped as two sheets of metal which have all the parts of the described 3D model cut in the metal plate. It comes with a large detailed chart with step by step instructions. And its very easy to assemble these models if you follow the instructions meticulously. The only care you need to take is while removing the pieces from the metal plate and be careful not to break them. Having said that, its very easy to remove the parts from metal plate and assemble them in to a 3D model. I am sure it will be liked by kids and adults alike ;)

％商品名: Fascinations Metal Earth 1908 Ford Model T 3D Metal Model Kit
タイトル: This is a very small but challenging model and NOT a toy.
レビュー内容: This product and all of the Metal Earth items are not toys. They are an intricate model that takes patience and skill to complete. They were not FUN to put together but challenging. The result s very satisfying and the models striking. Do not give this to a child or anyone who has a short attention span or gets frustrated easily. They are fragile before you start building, during the building process and after. The metal bends very easily and care must be taken to properly shape those pieces that require shaping. The right tools are essential. You will need fine needle nose pliers, tweezers, straight edges for bending, a shear cutter to remove the pieces from the metal sheet and a good magnifying lamp. The effort will be worth it.

％商品名: Fascinations Metal Earth 1908 Ford Model T 3D Metal Model Kit
タイトル: This is NOT an easy model, but impressive when finished
レビュー内容:
I bought this model to make for my grandfather who collects model cars. It came in two sheets of lasercut metal and a yellow sheet of instructions. Altogether, it took me about 3 hours to put together (I took my time as it was a gift) and it came out beautifully. My grandfather absolutely loved it and marveled at the detail and intricate parts.

A lot of folks are complaining about how hard the model is or how unintuitive it is. To respond to their first complaint: duh. It is a model. If you want something that is easy to put together, get a tube of tinker toys or legos. The whole idea behind a model like this is to have something that is challenging, takes time, and when you are done, you have something exquisite. The model was meant for adults, not five year olds.

To respond to their second complaint: The instructions are a bit cryptic at first, but on closer inspection, they are actually quite simple. The instruction look like something IKEA cooked up - simple, a tiny bit cryptic, but very effective. If you take the time to read the legend, the instructions are easy as pie.

％商品名: Fascinations Metal Earth 1908 Ford Model T 3D Metal Model Kit
タイトル: TOUGH little model but will look very cool when completed.
レビュー内容:
Just began on the model a couple nights ago. Had to stop because I realized I needed much better flush cutters. After buying a couple of MUCH needed tools (magnifying light stand, FLUSH side cutters) I restarted building. The small round pieces are not impossible to do correctly BUT be warned, you should have a set of metal dowels or drill blanks or gage pins to help roll/form the circular parts.

 This will take me at LEAST 10 hours to complete (my best estimate). I am a skilled tool and die maker and I am used to working under a microscope. I have nearly every tool imaginable at my disposal, but I needed that magnifying stand, these are VERY small parts indeed and my 49 yr old eyes wouldn't do it without help!!

 I think a dentist or surgeon would enjoy this model, needs a lot of care and precision to make. This model is NOTHING like a plastic model. Soem basic knowledge of steel is helpful. The stainless steel parts are very ductile (soft). The sheet is annealed, so it bend very easily. this is good AND bad sometimes. It is a bit tricky to bend one thing and NOT make bends where you don't want them, you need some long nose small pliers with NO serrations in the jaws. GET A REALLY BRIGHT LIGHT!!

I include a few pictures of how far I've gotten. The little radiator cap was not too bad, but the headlights were difficult to do nicely. Like I said get some metal pins/dowels to wrap around to pre-form and it makes it easier. Use a small abrasive stone or a Dremel and diamond point to remove any flash that can interfere with fitting to other pieces.

％商品名: Fascinations Metal Earth 1908 Ford Model T 3D Metal Model Kit
タイトル: This was more fun than I imagined
レビュー内容: Great kit, maybe not the FIRST one you want to ever buy and build. It has some good features and details that make this kit a little more challenging than other Metal Earth kits. You will want to make sure you have small needle nose pliers for this kit as the tab twist method is a must in some spots. It also makes this a super nice kit to display once done.

レビュー内容: Looks nice once finished but it was a challenge to do. I'd put it up there with the tractor. There is a lot of bending required so care must be exercised to ensure the pieces do not break. It took a few tries to get windshield supports to stay in place and there were a few other time consuming tasks involved. I'd recommend for someone who has experience with Metal Earth models.

％商品名: Fascinations Metal Earth 1908 Ford Model T 3D Metal Model Kit
タイトル: Such a cool piece to display, Loved the Model T
レビュー内容: I originally bought these for my Father in law who is 84. But when it came in a flat package the size of a cd, I thought, oh wow, this is going to be way to challenging for him. So I gave it to my hubby for Christmas. He loved doing these! I bought 2 different models, this one Model T car and a tractor . The instructions were clear and easy to understand, we found using tweezers and needle nose pliers were the easiest way to bend the tabs, to make the parts. They turned out really cool looking, when he got them done! It's amazing that a flat metal piece can turn into the objects like this! Awesome. I will be buying more!

％商品名: Fascinations Metal Earth 1908 Ford Model T 3D Metal Model Kit
タイトル: My first and I enjoyed it
レビュー内容:
This was my first metal model and I really enjoyed putting it together. I found it to be the right level of challenge for me -- not too easy and not too hard. Others might find it more challenging than they expect/want.

Some cautions/caveats:
* Some of the pieces are extremely tiny. It's very easy to drop a small piece and then spend the next 15 minutes trying to find it under the couch. It's a good idea to work on a piece of black fabric, so pieces are easy to find if you drop one.
* Don't even think about trying to put this together without at least a pair of needle-nose pliers. Tweezers, wire-cutters, and a tool that lets you bend the metal into curves are also very helpful.
* Follow the instructions closely and don't rush. Trust me, once you attach a piece, you don't want to have to detach it.
* There are a few points in where the instructions aren't as detailed as they could be. Notably, assembling the wheels and attaching them to the chassis has to be done in a set order that the instructions don't sufficient emphasize -- you may want to attach the inside wheel-rim to the tire/outside wheel-rim before attaching the entire wheel to the chassis, but it's important to attach the inside wheel-rim to the chassis before attaching the rest of the wheel to the inside rim. The instructions should make that clear, but they don't.
* This took me about three hours of work to assemble and the result looks very nice!

％商品名: Fascinations Metal Earth 1908 Ford Model T 3D Metal Model Kit
レビュー内容: Not great instructions so if you aren't experienced with model building you might find these difficult. My son and I have a made a few of them together. They are time consuming, probably averaging 1.5 hours with the two of us working together. The final results are wonderful.

％商品名: Fascinations Metal Earth 1908 Ford Model T 3D Metal Model Kit
レビュー内容:
This ended up becoming a Christmas present for a friend, so I don't have any completed pictures for the finished product. But it turned out extremely well in the end.

It was a bit surprising, because it did look a little daunting at first. There's a lot of small parts. Many parts you have to bend into shape. And it's got it's share of fragile parts. But everything on the model fit together the first time, and I never felt like I had to struggle with some problem parts. Only issue I had was with the tires, and that was just because they are pretty thin, and bending the tabs into place kept warping them a little. Though they reshaped just fine.

I'd say this kit took me a little over 2 hours as a result of the many small parts. The build wasn't fun per second, since there was a lot of tediously small parts. But it's not as difficult as it looks.

The finished product looked quite nice. It's one of the best finished products I've made in the Metal Earth model line. Nice enough that one of my friends kinda locked in on it the first time he saw it, and I pretty much had to gift it to him at that point. Not that I mind, since I already have enough model kits of various origins on display at my house.

Overall, it's a great kit that can be bought for a little less than $8. And while I would not recommend this ad a beginner model kit, it isn't as difficult as it looks. Maybe pick this one up if you've done a couple of these kits already.

％商品名: Revell B17G Flying Fortress  1:48 Scale
レビュー内容: This B-17G model kit is a Monogram, now Revell-Monogram, classic. It is a huge model that is fun to build. The kit has been around for a long time and is the only 1/48 scale kit available of this magnificent World War II bomber. The interior, engines, guns, and landing gear have plenty of detail for the novice and expert modeler alike. The kit also includes a bomb cart, 4 bombs and a few aircrew figures for display purposes. The instructions are straight forward, the decals are the normal Monogram-Revell quality, a little thick but fairly decent. The decals allow for two different paint schemes, either olive drab over neutral grey or an all natural aluminum finish. A nice brochure with photos and tips on how to build a diorama is also included if one desires to make a diorama to display the finished model. Plenty of aftermarket decals and other accessories for the B-17 are avialable through online hobby retailers like Squadron.com, MeteorProductions.com and SprueBros.com, to name a few. I built my model just using a set of aftermarket decals, with some hand crafted details and an airbrushed finished paint job. The completed model more than met my expectations. Most of the pieces fit together very nicely. I had to apply some putty along the bottom edge of the wing to fuselage joints and to one edge of both waist gunner windows. Other than that everything came together quite well. I am more than likely going to purchase another one soon and hang the next one from my ceiling.

％商品名: Revell B17G Flying Fortress  1:48 Scale
タイトル: In order for this B-17 model to come out good, it will take lots of patience and some ...
レビュー内容:
In order for this B-17 model to come out good, it will take lots of patience and some advanced skills in scale model building.
There are fitting issues with just about every part, and as someone pointed out, some of the parts are not really in proportion to the 1/48 scale of this airplane...also the instructions are overly basic.
The bomb bay doors are molded shut and if you want them open to display the bombs on the bomb racks, you will have to cut them open which is not a job for a beginner but and advanced modeler.
All that being said, a beginner can put this model together and it will look OK. Keep in mind that when it is finished, it is rather large!

％商品名: Revell B17G Flying Fortress  1:48 Scale
タイトル: A Nice Large Revell B17G Model. I Recommend You Give It A Try!
レビュー内容: a nice Revell model. it did have quite a bit of trimming to be done. there are a lot of pieces and a lot of detail to it. but being that i an hanging it from the ceiling doing a hanging diorama i do not need all the interior detail. i am building three of these to represent a small partial formation. so the next two i assemble i will omit a lot of the interior detail. i really like the assembly procedure for attaching the wings. no need to glue with the siding and locking construction. this is a great addition if you decide to store the model, you can take the wings off! my only complaint was trying to get the wrap around main windshield installed. it did not fit correctly so i had to cut it in half and install the two pieces separately. not a big issue really, more of a small bump in the road. and take your time while installing all the glass windows. mine were tight in places and loose in others.

Overall I am thrilled with this model!

％商品名: Hot Wheels, 2017 Factory Fresh, Tesla Model X [White] 97/365
Revell 1:39 Wright Flyer "First Powered Flight"
タイトル: Very Good model for an Advanced Modeller
レビュー内容:
I purchased this because I'm a retired A&P Aviation Machinist. I love aircraft. I also live in NC. One of the reviewers talked about how bad the model was, the directions, etc. This is a great little model. The instructions are a full eight pages, plus four pages of how to make it more realistic. I agree it is not for a young model builder. But how many 8 yrs old are going to build a Wright Flyer from 1903 without guidance from an adult. The instructions also state this is a re-release of a 40 yr old model.
One of his big complaints was the flashing and sprues. FOR the record and this will help model makers just starting out understand the sprue and tabs.
When you look at any model you'll see the little round pieces of plastic attached to the parts, you will need to trim these carefully. Look at their location. They have an EXTREMELY important task in life. They are contact points for the the ejector pins within the injection machine mold. The ejector pins push against them pushing the "tree" out of the molding cavity. You cannot push against the actual part because the part is (1) still hot and you would scar or mark it with the stainless steel pins, (2) the ejector pin bosses on the sprues are located at stress and weak points that could break. The more intricate and thin the part the more ejector bosses.
Don't be miss-led by a non verified reviewer. I've put models together for over 50 years and this one blew me away when I first opened the box. One of the best detailed and instructed I've bought ever. It will take me a while to put together, because I want it right. but for $9.99. OUTSTANDING purchase.

％商品名: Revell 1:39 Wright Flyer "First Powered Flight"
レビュー内容: Model or look very good, but not very fine, some details do not very good, there is the need to glue things too much, ha ha, finally winding is also quite complex, I just simple around.I made it an afternoon with my brother.A very good experience

タイトル: I would not recommend unless you have a lot of time on hand
レビュー内容: It's really difficult to make out the parts and separate them from the single plastic tree. I would not recommend unless you have a lot of time on hand

％商品名: Revell 1:39 Wright Flyer "First Powered Flight"
レビュー内容: This kit is well instructed and relatively easy to build right out of the box. Glue required, and Mom's permission ha ha to use the kitchen table !

％商品名: Revell 1:39 Wright Flyer "First Powered Flight"
レビュー内容: This was a model airplane so I don't expect any model to be very durable. This was a good first model kit that my son and I did together for his Social Studies project. Not too much detail and not too many small parts. I recommend this as a starter for any kid with parent supervision.

％商品名: Revell 1:39 Wright Flyer "First Powered Flight"
タイトル: It is what it says it is, and surprisingly more
レビュー内容: I ordered this model for my 6th grade daughter who was doing a report on the Wright Brothers. I was able to do a "quick assemble" in about 40 minutes. However, I was really impressed with the detail in the model. For the price, it has way more than expected as far as actual "Wright Bros. detailing". If you would build this to it's full potential, I would take your time, as the detailing (especially the cables made of thread) is wonderful, and plan to place it in a diorama, as the model includes the two brothers, cameras, tools, etc. that are not glued to the airplane itself. The only drawback I can think of is that is is fairly small, so it's a one person working at a time model.

％商品名: Revell 1:39 Wright Flyer "First Powered Flight"
タイトル: Do not buy for your child's Wright Brothers school project
レビュー内容:
If you are into building models, are over 14 (the 10+ age recommendation is not remotely accurate), and are really patient, this is a great little inexpensive model.

If you are a parent that bought this because you thought it would be a cool prop for your child's Wright Brothers project at school, buy a pre-assembed model or print something from the interwebs.

Frankly, I work full time and I am busy. I have too many things I want to do on the weekend--building models is not one of them. This isn't snap-tite or a simple toy car; it takes a solid 8+ hours even if you don't paint it and cut or sand off all the little tooling marks. Then, there is the thread--the thread is a giant pain. You have to pull tiny thread through all the little holes to simulate the rigging. But, the holes aren't big enough. So, you have to bore out all the holes with a straight pin. Then, the thread won't go though unless you burn the end of the thread. Then, the thread will be too big to go through the hole. Repeat this process dozens of times and you begin to get the idea.

I don't know what the parts that connect the upper and lower wings together are called (beams, spars?). You are supposed rig these together with thread, but it doesn't really attach cleanly. Perhaps, you are supposed to clean these parts out with a hobby knife? I didn't really know or care. But, because I didn't care or ever figure it out, I had to manually glue the thread at each point and I could never make it look taut.

Again, if you like models, this is cheap and challenging. If you are doing this for a project, buy something pre-assembled and spend the time saved doing something you enjoy.

％商品名: Revell 1:39 Wright Flyer "First Powered Flight"
レビュー内容: Had a wonderful time with my eight year old son building this replica. It had enough parts that were easy enough for him to assemble and had some challenging sections to test my building skills. I can say with great confidence it is an excellent representation as we took a trip to the Smithsonian half way through our build and saw the real Wright Flyer, a very cool experience for both of us.

％商品名: Revell 1:39 Wright Flyer "First Powered Flight"
レビュー内容: I purchased this to use as a prop for my little boys' presentation on the Wright Brothers. This was about a year ago and they have played with it ever since and it has never broke! AMAZING! I'm serious y'all. This is an extremely durable model. And loads of fun to put together with your kiddos!

％商品名: Revell 1:39 Wright Flyer "First Powered Flight"
タイトル: Not too bad to put together
レビュー内容: Not too bad to put together, you just have to be careful with the narrow pieces of plastic as they break easily. For the most part the directions/diagrams were pretty good. Clearer directions for the rigging would have helped immensely. That drive me crazy, but I did it. I also did not use the thread that came with it, but fishing line which had it's own difficulties. I like the way it turned out, as did the people in my Wright Bros. book review.

％商品名: Revell 1:39 Wright Flyer "First Powered Flight"
タイトル: I like it. Good model for the money.
レビュー内容: Well it's been 40 plus years since I made a plastic model....I'm 56 now. Not sure this was the one to start with but wanted to start with the old planes. I love wood, but this will work if you take your time with painting to look like wood and canvas. I do two or three steps a day to include the painting first, wait a day and glue. It has been 4 weeks and I'm about ready to start with rigging with the provided thread. I thought about using real metal thread but hey, I'm just getting back into this. Take your time with this and you will enjoy it. Not for a kid under 11 unless they are gifted and want to me a surgeon some day. Not for the shaky or nervous. Very small parts are tough to deal with and rigging looks pretty intricate.

％商品名: Revell 1:39 Wright Flyer "First Powered Flight"
タイトル: ... the Ann Arbor Airport and she has fallen in love with them
レビュー内容:
My granddaughter and I have been watching planes at the Ann Arbor Airport and she has fallen in love with them. I bought her a book on the history of flight with lots of photos and I bought this model so she and her father could put together the very first airplane; the Wright Flyer. They did a beautiful job together. You will need a series of paints to accomplish the best results. And the rigging for the wings takes some time and work.

But it is a beautiful model to have in child's room; especially if they love flying as my granddaughter does!

％商品名: Revell 1:39 Wright Flyer "First Powered Flight"
レビュー内容: This was the first model airplane that I ever built. It says on the package "moderate" difficulty level and was intended for a child aged 12 years and up. I'm 17 so I thought it would be a piece of cake. Not so. When I opened the kit I was daunted by the hundred or so teeny-tiny pieces, some of which I almost lost because they were less than half the size of my pinkie nail. The instructions themselves give hardly any clues as to what materials you need to buy. However, the "Tips for Building a Diorama" can be helpful about what kind of plastic cement and paints you will need. The total cost of materials (including a hobby knife) was around eighteen dollars--pretty cheap I would say. However, I was not ready for what was in store. The plastic pieces are quite flimsy, and on my last day working on it I broke an important part of the plane. I was nevertheless able to painstakingly cement it back together (sort of), but the model needs more attention than a 12 years old could lend. When I got to the rigging step of the process, things got even more challenging. You need tweezers (and the sharp eyes of an eagle) to be able to gently coax a gray piece of thread through a hole smaller than the eye of a needle! I spent at least five hours on the rigging alone, sometimes getting so frustrated and red in the face that I had to stop or I thought I would throw the model on the floor in exasperation. The lengths of thread that the instructions say you need are wildly incorrect; when they say you need 16", 10" or so would suffice. While this may be a good thing (as it allows you to easily tie knots), it initially made me nervous, thinking that I was assembling it incorrectly. All told, I spent about 9 days building it, working on it at least three hours a day. A more experienced model-builder could probably have done it in an afternoon, but as a novice I put in way more time than I had expected. Nevertheless, building the "Wright Flyer" really made me love assembling model airplanes. Despite all the blood, sweat, and tears--or perhaps because of it--it is a truly satisfying feeling of accomplishment when you step back and look upon the plane that you built with your own two hands.

％商品名: Testors 3509C Testors Plastic Cement Value Pack
レビュー内容: This is the great old-school glue I was looking for. This stuff seems like the same stuff available decades ago (just look at all those warning labels, must be good stuff). Works great for gluing ABS and PLA together. Also, the precision tips included (you get like 5!), work great for making your glue line as thin as a pencil line.

％商品名: Testors 3509C Testors Plastic Cement Value Pack
タイトル: Yes, this is the cement we used for our plastic models
レビュー内容:
Yes, this is the plastic cement that you used as a child for your models, the stuff with the really strong smell that melts the plastic together.

I had a broken piece of plastic and couldn't find any of this smelly cement anywhere where I live in Maryland. Perhaps there are local laws about using this stuff because of the fumes--I do remember stories of children sniffing glue, and I think this is what they sniffed. So do exercise caution about breathing it.

It worked. After I'd tried three or four other locally purchased products, this welded a plastic bowl that had broken. It's been in our family for 50 years and we didn't want to throw it out. Now it holds water again and is back to daily duty as a mixing bowl.

％商品名: Testors 3509C Testors Plastic Cement Value Pack
レビュー内容: Strong like I wanted and it works exactly as I wanted it to. YIPPEE!! This is the same old model glue from my childhood that I wanted. It melts the plastic parts together. Not that lemony smelling glue that only glues them together with a weaker bond between the plastics. No, no, this is the stuff that actually fuses the two plastics together. Used it for a shower head that wouldn't keep straight and kept turning and spraying water all over the walls. So I glued on a little piece of plastic and now is sits in the position that I want it to while I lather up!

％商品名: Crayola Model Magic Modeling Compound Classpack Assortment, Assorted Colors, 1-oz. Pouches, 75-count, Great for Classrooms, School Art Projects
タイトル: Product is great, but it is not in the nice box shown in the photo.
レビュー内容:
My kids love model magic, great for all those school projects. Easy to paint once dry. You can also mix colors (with a lot of kneading) to make secondary colors. And in the classpack it comes in nice small foil pouches so less is wasted.

 It stays moist for at least 2 years in the pouch (that is how long our last box lasted). Once modeled, it dries in 24-48 hours to a very lightweight and sort of foamlike consistency. It does NOT have a shiny surface when dry.

Each 1 oz packet when rolled into a sphere about 2 inches in diameter. I uploaded a photo of one packet worth with a ruler and a soda can so you can see what volume it takes up. Since the stuff is quite light, it is fairly large.

However, when ordering from Gamingect the pouches came all mixed together in a regular cardboard box. This does not bother me much, as I already had the box pictured (with the lift up flap lid) from my previous order. That box had nice dividers in it for the 4 colors so you could see at a glance how much of each was left. It may be that this is how the product is shipped now. I preferred the old box that is pictured in the photo. I did not deduct any stars, since the box is not the product itself.

％商品名: Crayola Model Magic Modeling Compound Classpack Assortment, Assorted Colors, 1-oz. Pouches, 75-count, Great for Classrooms, School Art Projects
タイトル: So much fun. My kids can play with this for hours
レビュー内容: So much fun. My kids can play with this for hours. We find that a few drops of food coloring can make the white clay any color you like. I'm not sure if they will harden more or not but my son likes the feel of it. It would be hard to crack or break at this point since it's still very soft. I love that it came in individual packets. It will last us a very long time.

21 White
18 Blue
17 Red
17 Yellow

We pre-color BEFORE we mold it and then it air dries! LOVE this stuff!

レビュー内容: My grandchildren love this magic clay. Because of that I am constantly purchasing bags of it. This classroom size was huge, but I have found the kids use it. ％商品名: Crayola Model Magic Modeling Compound Classpack Assortment, Assorted Colors, 1-oz. Pouches, 75-count, Great for Classrooms, School Art Projects
レビュー内容:
My kids love playing with model magic clay, and I much prefer for them to play with this rather than playdough because it makes so much less mess. It is soft enough for even my 3 yo to mold it and use cutters on it.

Pros: I always buy the white ones and have my kids color it with markers into whatever color they want. There's so much less bickering about who gets which colors this way. They stick together well, and there's no crumbling of little pieces since it doesn't dry as fast as playdough.

Also great for classroom settings - I have used it with small groups of preschoolers and they have a lot of fun with it, and so much easier cleanup compared to playdough.

Cons: I notice that after we open a new pack and I wrap it up with saran wrap and store in zip locs, after a few days it's not quite as soft as when I just open the package. This is why I buy the individually packed ones instead of the bigger bags. That way it's not a deal if after storing it's not as soft anymore, I can just toss it and open new ones.

％商品名: Crayola Model Magic Modeling Compound Classpack Assortment, Assorted Colors, 1-oz. Pouches, 75-count, Great for Classrooms, School Art Projects
タイトル: I like the small packages because when we bought the large ...
レビュー内容: My kids can't get enough of this stuff. I like the small packages because when we bought the large packages and they didn't use it all, it would dry out. Perfect in goody bags and I send some to school for treasure box. I love the versatility of the white color because we can use washable markers to change the color. I, YES ME THE MOM (HEEHEE), like to poke color in the clay and then create what looks like watercolor swirls. Of course, the more pokes, the darker the color. And, when it does dry, it isn't crumbly or breakable and it is so light to carry and display where we want.

％商品名: Crayola Model Magic Modeling Compound Classpack Assortment, Assorted Colors, 1-oz. Pouches, 75-count, Great for Classrooms, School Art Projects
レビュー内容: My kids love model magic. These small packs give them just enough to do a project without wasting a giant tub. The box has 72 packs and lasts a long time. There is also plenty to share when friends come over. Love it.

％商品名: Crayola Model Magic Modeling Compound Classpack Assortment, Assorted Colors, 1-oz. Pouches, 75-count, Great for Classrooms, School Art Projects
タイトル: Great for building up crochet hooks.
レビュー内容:
This stuff is fabulous for building up crochet hooks for comfort. So lightweight, like nothing added. I covered three hooks with one package. To color, I used food color and dabbed the food color container to the compound and then worked the color in. Adding more or other colors to create a variety of colors.

Recommended by a crocheter who built up her favorite crochet hook years ago and it's still going. Actually, if you mess up, just put it and a bit of water in a small mason jar or a bowl covered with plastic wrap and let it sit until it rehydrates and start over.

If you do cover crochet hooks, let it dry air for 48 hours or more. To dry faster, put it near a window and let the sun warm it to dry fully to the interior. If you want to mold it to your hand grip, give it a squeeze before it's completely dry (the interior will collapse a bit to shape. Then allow to dry.

I don't know if any protection needs made to crochet hooks that usually won't be near water. So far, so good.

FYI: This is not sturdy enough to use when stitching Tapestry Crochet which requires a tighter stitch. It will break from your grip. For Tapestry crochet build up of hooks, use polymer clay (the stuff you bake). Search Google for m
any tutorials for building up hooks with polymer clay.

％商品名: Crayola Model Magic Modeling Compound Classpack Assortment, Assorted Colors, 1-oz. Pouches, 75-count, Great for Classrooms, School Art Projects
レビュー内容: We use this product to make paw prints for pets who passed away in our clinic. The client absolutely love it and its a great way to keep there pets memory close at heart!

％商品名: Crayola Model Magic Modeling Compound Classpack Assortment, Assorted Colors, 1-oz. Pouches, 75-count, Great for Classrooms, School Art Projects
レビュー内容: I found this product to be lacking. It is difficult to sculpt much detail and it does not dry overnight as advertised. It is basically foamy. That is the best way I can describe it. Picture a soft foam. When you create something out of it the resulting piece "dries" in that it can no longer be re-shaped but it retains a strange foamy feel to it. It never hardens. We had bought this so kids could make "fossil" impressions to take home. It worked but was fairly lackluster. A true trying clay would produce better detail and not turn into a weird foam disk with a faint shell impression on it. This make be good for some projects you can imagine but it was far from "magic" for us.

％商品名: Crayola Model Magic Modeling Compound Classpack Assortment, Assorted Colors, 1-oz. Pouches, 75-count, Great for Classrooms, School Art Projects
レビュー内容: I love Model Magic and the 1 oz 75 piece Classroom pack is perfect for large group projects. The kids at camp (70 kids ages 8-12) love to create things with it. Then they can choose to let it dry out and keep the design or squish it and start over. I give them the choice and some choose to save the project and some choose a bag to save it in so they can continue to create more things later. Some kids love making impressions of things and some made balls and bounced their Model Magic. Something for every one.

％商品名: Crayola Model Magic Modeling Compound Classpack Assortment, Assorted Colors, 1-oz. Pouches, 75-count, Great for Classrooms, School Art Projects
タイトル: use it fast and use it all
レビュー内容: This product is way over priced anywhere you buy it. It cracks when it dries. It has to be used up pretty quickly. If any air gets into the bag, it becomes stiff. Typically, two of the 4 large bags in the primary color set already have air leaks when you purchase.

％商品名: Crayola Model Magic Modeling Compound Classpack Assortment, Assorted Colors, 1-oz. Pouches, 75-count, Great for Classrooms, School Art Projects
レビュー内容:
This was perfect for the project I wanted so much model magic for - making a "mold" in a basket to protect a tea-set - one for each of my 5 nieces. And each "household" of nieces gets a different combination of colors - no mixing them up ;)

I note that some reviewers say there were less than 75 in this package - my son counted twice and I counted once and we each counted exactly 75 as the product description noted. Yay!

I love working with this material for certain projects specifically because of how light weight it is, yet relatively durable. For our tea sets in baskets, it added almost no weight - perfection!

％商品名: 29pcs Mixed Model Trees 1.5-6 inch(4 -16 cm), OrgMemory Ho Scale Trees, Diorama Models, Model Train Scenery, Architecture Trees, Model Railroad Scenery with No Stands
タイトル: Great product for a diorama project.
レビュー内容:
We bought these for a diorama project for my daughters school project depicting Narnia. I have never bought this type of product, but I have to say for 8 bucks you get quite a selection of trees, both in number, size and type. We were able to fill up the back of a boot box with trees to create a forest and still have trees left over. We used model railroad snow to add glue to the trees to finish the effect and were able to plunge the trunks directly into a styrofoam based without any gluing.

Suffice to say the trees looked great and held together well, although a little of the "foliage" fell off with handling, but not much considering.

After my daughters project is graded, I plan to pilfer some of the trees to use with RPG miniature diaramas and bases. The size range means I can use them as anything from tall trees to bushes depending on the miniature.

I will post pictures of the different uses for these trees when I can.

％商品名: 29pcs Mixed Model Trees 1.5-6 inch(4 -16 cm), OrgMemory Ho Scale Trees, Diorama Models, Model Train Scenery, Architecture Trees, Model Railroad Scenery with No Stands
タイトル: My Review Because The Seller Really Wanted Feedback (i luv u bb ;J)
レビュー内容:
So I can't show a picture of it atm, but I can tell you what these are and what I've done with them:

They're miniature tress made of plastic. If you're in the neighborhood for something to spice up your board games, then definitely buy these. I bought them specifically for Warhammer 40k matches, and they're serving the emperor well. I bought plastic, figure bases to go alongside these, and drilled tiny divots on top of them. By doing this, I was able to super glue the pointy ends of these on, and now they're stable as physically possible on the field of battle!

They're really good quality for what you buy. Up close, they retain their natural look, however, you will see that they're plastic. (Because they're plastic and you should expect that.) There's not a lot of options to move around branches here, and that was great for shipping. By doing this, they didn't fall apart getting here and that's all I wanted to begin with. Tree figures that don't fall apart. Just don't play with them, and I'm sure that you'll have them for years to come. Why I say you shouldn't play with them is because the leaves are the plastic you'll see on fake pine trees for Christmas celebration. I've had long experiences with these, and I know how many petals decide to just fall off. I actually started playing with a few to see if they would, but they didn't. I'm sure they'll be fine if all of them survived transit with nary a scratch. Just treat them well and they should return the favor, as with all things.

TL;DR: Use these for a hobby and expect them to be great, plastic models.

％商品名: 29pcs Mixed Model Trees 1.5-6 inch(4 -16 cm), OrgMemory Ho Scale Trees, Diorama Models, Model Train Scenery, Architecture Trees, Model Railroad Scenery with No Stands
タイトル: the various trees looked great. I'm using them for a miniatures game and ...
レビュー内容:
I received the shipment very quickly which is always a positive. They arrived in a small container (roughly 6"x6"x4") which means that they were pressed together inside. That made some of the trees either bent or pushed the branches into the trunk. I was concerned at first but they quickly relaxed and assumed their normal tree-like shape. Once settled, the various trees looked great. I'm using them for a miniatures game and they fill the background woods roll perfectly. I'm not sure how it would have changed the look but an epoxy coating or even hairspray might have been a nice touch.
The packaging wasn't an issue as mentioned above but I have noticed that the "leaves" tend to fall off when handled. I'm sure this is fine when simply used for mock-ups but as discussed, I move these around often. Would have rated 5 otherwise.

％商品名: 29pcs Mixed Model Trees 1.5-6 inch(4 -16 cm), OrgMemory Ho Scale Trees, Diorama Models, Model Train Scenery, Architecture Trees, Model Railroad Scenery with No Stands
タイトル: Good quality, works awesome for tabletop games
レビュー内容:
I bought these for terrain use in Tabletop gaming (specifically Dungeons and Dragons). As stated, they do not come with bases, but it was easy enough to make some out of clay and glue them in. Sounds like other people on here were able to just push them into some craft foam.
A couple of the trunks and branches were a little bent, but still very use-able (otherwise would have been 5 stars). The amount of leaves "shedding" off the trees seems alarming, but I certainly don't have any noticeable bald spots. I was actually able to save the shedded parts and use them as underbrush on my new bases. I think shedding is only natural with these sorts of minis, and once the loose stuff has fallen, the rest seems to be staying on fine. I may trying spraying some to see if it helps
Here's a picture of them with some standard 1" miniatures for scale. I haven't made bases for the smaller trees yet. Please note that I made the bases and painted the black stripes on the "birch" trees, so they are not accurate to how the product arrives.

％商品名: BXQINLENX 15 PCS Gundam Modeler Basic Tools Craft Set For Car Model Assemble Building(F)
タイトル: Support your local hobby store and get some better tools...
レビュー内容:
So, I figured I'd pick this up for my brother as he is trying to improve the build quality of his Gundam model kits. The kit was at an okay price and looked to be of a decent quality, but the reality is much different.

We'll start with the cutting board. I am used to a store-bought, self healing cutting board and assumed that the one included in this bundle would be similar; alas, it is not. It is about as pliable as shale and incredibly heavy for as small as it is. In addition to that, I am legitimately worried that it will break a hobby knife blade if one would end up slipping and cutting into it.

Next are the cutting tools. This kit includes a hobby knife, an extra set of blades, the cheapest box cutter on earth and a pair of small cutting scissors. These tools are probably my biggest disappointment of the whole kit. The hobby knife is very flimsy, the scissors are all but useless and not the same as the ones pictured, and the box cutter is only good for breaking down the box that this stuff came in for recycling.

Also included are some tweezers and a basic metal ruler, which are useful and are of an okay quality, but find limited use for a beginner builder.

The files and sanding blocks are the only thing I can give a real thumbs up to, because they seem sturdy and are some of the most important tools in a builder's kit. Please note, however, that I have not used them and cannot say in 100% certainty that they're effective/good.

Overall, my opinion of this kit is simple: spend a few extra bucks and piece together your own set of tools. The quality of these items are subpar at best and incomplete. One would be better off using coupons at your local hobby/crafts store to buy the knife, cutting mat and files; and you could also purchase a set of cheap nippers, which are omitted from this kit for whatever strange reason.

I will update this review after my brother tries these tools and gives me feedback.

％商品名: P50B 100pcs Model Trains 1:50 Scale WHITE Figures O
タイトル: Good figures, worth the price for certain
レビュー内容:
These are very nice figures, well sculpted, and presumably in the correct scale. I don't have any others to compare them to.
They're a good fit for larger wargame figures, 28mm (heroclix, Reaper) if that helps. I'll be using the remainder from the project for civilian figures in my games.
The figures have a vaguely 50's feel to the clothing style, mostly on the women, but there's nothing specific that would limit them to any point in time. They paint well after Gesso priming. I made a number of changes to them using green stuff, and it took just fine. I did not need to cut any of the figures.
The plastic is hard, it files well. There were a few mold lines, mostly in the crooks of the bent arm figures, and a small flash point on the tops of the heads, but nothing excessive on any of them.
The figures are very nice, and excellent for the price.

レビュー内容: My son loves his yokai watch toys! This watch has a nice quality projection on it. Don't get me wrong, it's not super quality but for the price it's bright and clear enough. The medal pieces are fickle about how they go in and come out but my 5 year old figured it out with no problem!

％商品名: Yo-kai Watch Model Zero
タイトル: It's a little obnoxious thiswatch doesn't actually tell time
レビュー内容: It's a little obnoxious this watch doesn't actually tell time, it would have been fairly easy in my opinion to add a small digital time piece. It's also quite large, on my 6 year old the medallion area is actually lightly larger than hi wrist is making for a wobbly fit. None the less, said 6 year old found the projection feature super cool and now wants all of the little expensive coins that power this thing. I would say unless your kid directly asks for it like mine did, skip it, cool or not based on the price of the coins alone (though you can catch them on sale in store on occasion, for example at Christmas I found them $1.50 each at Kroger).

％商品名: InAir E-Z Build C-130 Hercules Air Force Model Kit
レビュー内容: It's "ok" The pieces snap in. They do not fit very well together. You can see where they were obviously snapped together. It's not a seemless snap. There is a small gap. The wings on the plane are also very easy to break. Where the hooks are that hooks inside the actual plane, snap very easily. Once they break, there is no attatching the wing. This does not come with glue or anything to reenforce the parts together.

％商品名: InAir E-Z Build C-130 Hercules Air Force Model Kit
タイトル: Troublesome assembly mars an otherwise decent model.
レビュー内容:
Assembling this model was not as easy as expected. The fuselage needs to be snapped apart to insert 3 metal rods, and a square piece of plastic for where the stand will meet the body. The steel pins fit snugly and some pressure is necessary to insert them properly, this must be done carefully or the plastic will be snap. It was also a struggle to assemble the engines since the plastic feels brittle. The engine and propeller assembly is supposed to snap into the wing engine protrusions, but snapping them in proved difficult since the parts do not line up correctly.
The model does not have retractable landing gear as stated in the product description, it must be displayed on the supplied stand. The model is good for a beginner since not many parts, glue or paints are involved, and with minor guidance the finished product can be quite good.

％商品名: InAir E-Z Build C-130 Hercules Air Force Model Kit
レビュー内容: I bought this for my younger brother that loves air planes. Initially, one of the propellers wouldn't snap on. So we were never able to completely finish it. But after just a couple hours, the plane had already broken some more. It's made of a cheap plastic which explains why it breaks easy. Definitely not recommended for children, nor anything other than simple building it to put up somewhere and look at it.

％商品名: InAir E-Z Build C-130 Hercules Air Force Model Kit
レビュー内容: Requires almost no skill to assemble. Be mindful that there are two pins that must be inserted at the BEGINING of the assembly process, or you will have to take the plane apart to add them in hindsight. We personalized this model after assembly and hung it in our nursery. Have also given the same model as a retirement gift to a friend in the aviation realm. Petite, easy to assemble, nice little model.

％商品名: InAir E-Z Build C-130 Hercules Air Force Model Kit
レビュー内容: Not as nice as some of the other models in this series. General appearance is OK, but a bit shiny. Propellers look chrome-plated and not realistic. I painted the spinners matte black, the blades aluminum, and the tips black, which seems to agree with a number of photos. Parts fit fairly well but with a few gaps. Engine cowlings are tough to put/keep in place - I whittled a bit and added a drop of Crazy-Glue on each to solve that problem.

％商品名: InAir E-Z Build C-130 Hercules Air Force Model Kit
タイトル: This model lacks fine details and quality craftsmanship
レビュー内容: The model is a bit on the cheesy side. I purchased several models from different companies at the same time. I bought one from each through Amazon and was not impressed with this company. This model lacks fine details and quality craftsmanship.

レビュー内容: I bought this for my son who truly enjoyed the colors for his car models. I used Testors when I was a kid and I was happy to buy these for my son. It is still a great product.

％商品名: Testors Model Car Acrylic Paint Pot Set
タイトル: A good deal for the price.
レビュー内容:
The acrylic paint cleans up with water and covers well. I used it for some very small plastic figurines.
The brushes were acceptable. I cut them down for fine work.
All in all I was satisfied with the purchase. I had to buy some additional colors but the ones supplied were fine.

％商品名: Testors Model Car Acrylic Paint Pot Set
レビュー内容: Even after mixing coverage was thin and required another coat for good appearance. I was quite surprised since I've used Testors for many years.

％商品名: Testors Model Car Acrylic Paint Pot Set
レビュー内容: I've been using this paint on my models. The paint has pretty good coverage. It stays on pretty well. I'm able to touch the model after it's painted and it's not sticky. I also like that this set comes with a little plastic mixing bowl. Unfortunately, the two brushes included aren't particularly good. The bristles are stiff and one set fell off when I tried cleaning it. Overall, for the price, this is a pretty decent set.

％商品名: Testors Model Car Acrylic Paint Pot Set
レビュー内容: These are great quality paints, but I am not crazy about the colors in this set. They are all kind of dull. The paint brushes it comes with are of very poor quality too. I would have been happier with one of their other paint sets I'm sure.

％商品名: Testors Model Car Acrylic Paint Pot Set
レビュー内容: Great starter kit for models. I bought and used for a model car I was building. I went through just about all the paints as they are pretty small. If you plan to use one color for the entire model you will need more than what you get here.

％商品名: Testors Model Car Acrylic Paint Pot Set
レビュー内容: These paints have most of what I wanted and are easy to use. I wish it had a yellow though. That would have included all the primary colors and allowed me to make other missing colors like green.

％商品名: Testors Model Car Acrylic Paint Pot Set
タイトル: Okay paints at a good price
レビュー内容: I bought this set to paint a resin model gun. The brushes were nice, but the paints did not cover well and required multiple coats. The black was especially hard to paint on. I've never had problems with acrylic paint covering before on resin models...but maybe it was something about this model. It still ended up looking great in the end so it worked for me...was just a little more time consuming than it should have been.

％商品名: Testors Model Car Acrylic Paint Pot Set
レビュー内容: I'm not sure what I was thinking when I bought this. The brush is junk. you might use the mixing tray, I don't and have too many as it is. The paints don't cover well and require multiple coats, and you do not get a lot. This is about .15 or .20 oz. much smaller than even the 1/4" testors you normally see. if you want a basic starter set, for the money this is ok. But I think I should have paid more and gotten something more useful for me.

％商品名: Testors Model Car Acrylic Paint Pot Set

％商品名: Testors Model Car Acrylic Paint Pot Set

レビュー内容: Highly detailed. Made one for my wife and she loved it! Made one for my mom's coworker and she paid me for it!

％商品名: Fascinations Metal Earth 3D Laser Cut Model - Merry Go Round
タイトル: Just make sure you know what you're getting into!
レビュー内容: I decided to try this since I am a great fan of 3D puzzles. This is completely different from a 3D puzzles. Make sure you know what you are getting into when you buy this! The metal sheeting is very thin and easy to bend and break. This is more along the lines of a complex metal model than a puzzle. Freeing the individual pieces is hard because they are very delicate and detailed. Then, once you get them loose, the minuscule tabs and slots are difficult for someone not used to working with them. I eventually broke a piece and was forced to give up. The finished pieces look beautiful, but it's not a challenge for someone who's never made one of these pieces before.

％商品名: Fascinations Metal Earth 3D Laser Cut Model - Merry Go Round
レビュー内容: Excellent product. Very detailed.

％商品名: Fascinations Metal Earth 3D Laser Cut Model - Merry Go Round
タイトル: Not at all what the bad reviews say
レビュー内容: Difficulty level: medium/3 on scale of 1-5. It's not hard, and I read reviews that people had difficulty cutting out the horses due to the legs bending. I don't know what the people who said that were doing to cut them out, but I had NO problem. It took about an hour to get together completely. working in tandem with my daughter, this was our 9th model. Very cute, and not at all that difficult if you've done some before. I used fingernail clippers, to cut the tabs that hold them on the sheet. Not at all what the bad reviews say. If you're going to do these, plan on it being a hobby, and you must have patience. If you want them put together to display in a matter of a few minutes, then these Metal Earth models are not for you.

％商品名: Fascinations Metal Earth 3D Laser Cut Model - Merry Go Round
レビュー内容:
I've become slightly addicted to metal earth, and I really enjoyed making this one. I will admit that some models are frustrating and some steps can be nearly impossible, but this model was extremely reasonable to create with a healthy amount of challenge. It's a little tinier than I would have imagine, which is the only disappointing part.

Not one of my favorites from metal earth, but definitely fun to make. It's cute to give as a gift to someone who can appreciate the time spent it takes to make a metal earth model.

％商品名: Fascinations Metal Earth 3D Laser Cut Model - Merry Go Round
タイトル: This model kit is fun and looks fantastic
レビュー内容:
There are a total of 21 pieces, 8 of them being horses. This is not a model for beginners. I would rate the difficulty as "easy to moderate". If you have already done a few Metal Earth models you will probably have no problems.

Pros:
Etching work is amazing, even better than Arc de Triomphe
Instructions are clear and easy to follow
Pieces fit well, good alignment of tabs and slots
Looks awesome when finished

Cons:
Hardest part of model is getting the horses removed from the metal sheet, especially their front legs. I use tweezers, manicure scissors and lots of patience.

Take your time and you will be rewarded with a beautiful model.

％商品名: Fascinations Metal Earth 3D Laser Cut Model - Merry Go Round

レビュー内容: This was my first model. I am thinking that I should have started with something a little easier. However, it did come out great and I really like my little model. It held my attention to the point where I finished it in one night.
