％商品名: Revell 1:48 P - 40B Tiger Shark Plastic Model Kit
タイトル: A Great Model for the Price
レビュー内容:
As someone who has rediscovered building model aircraft after a ten year hiatus, I have to say that this is an excellent kit for the those with an intermediate to advanced skill level. The first perk of this particular model is that is has a fair amount of customization available out of the box, with instructions and decals for three different schemes: American Volunteer Group (Flying Tigers), RAF circa 1941, and US Army Air Corps circa 1940. I put the kit together in about three days time, but it could be put together sooner, and would make a great kit to do with a child. The decals were also top notch, and the glue instantly bonded unlike some other models I've had to deal with. The decals also molded exceptionally well to the model, and the rivets and panel lines were clearly seen through the decal even without using the solutions some use when applying them. The fuselage and wings are exceptionally detailed with clear panel lines and rivets, and the fit for most of the parts is snug and seamless. Additionally, the landing fear is stable and strong, with none of the weak fits and layouts of other models. I painted the kit with a combination of acrylic and enamel paints in the USAAC livery, and it turned out better than I had originally hoped.

However, there are also flaws with the model. The fit between the wings and fuselage is loose (same between the engine cowling and fuselage to a lesser extent), and will require putty if gaps bother you. The wing flaps too are liable to simply fall out of place (they're on a hinge sort of system in the wing), which is fine if you want to simulate a parked P-40, but would be annoying if anyone wanted to hang it. Finally, the plastic itself is very thin in many pieces and makes fitting the fuselage together with the cockpit intact a challenge to put it mildly. Thankfully the model is durable despite how thin the plastic is, and stood up well to the creative means I had to employ to get the fuselage to fit together. A final con against it, although rather minor, are the gun sights. This model features bead sights mounted on the fuselage fore of the canopy, which honestly is a nice touch. The con is that the holes in the fuselage are about twice the size they need to be to fit the sights themselves, and will require some patience as well as manually holding them to the fuselage until your glue cures enough for them to stay upright on their own. Otherwise the front bead sight will fall straight through, and it will take some creative shaking to get it to come out through the flaps.

Finally, I purchased the kit for $9.99 with prime shipping, and actually got it the next day. So kudos to Amazon on that, it was a great model at a great price.

Pros:
Excellent Price.
Clear and unambiguous instructions.
Excellent customization.
Stable and sturdy landing gear.
Great overall detail, it authentically looks like a P-40 should.
Rotating propeller that is neither too loose nor does it get stuck.

Cons:
Loose and/or tricky fits between the fuselage and wings, fuselage and engine cowling, and fuselage halves.
Thin plastic in much of the model makes fitting various parts even tougher.
Holes for the bead sights are much too large.
Getting the wing flaps to stay in position can be tricky at best.

Overall rating:
8.5/10

％商品名: Revell 1:48 P - 40B Tiger Shark Plastic Model Kit
レビュー内容:
I've grown away from aircraft modeling, recently finding a great niche in ship kits. But I wanted a P-40 and P-51 to round out my WWII classic american fighters collection, and this was readily available and I didn't care to do too much to it. I did research, didn't follow the directions or the paint scheme, and added wires, folded up the landing gear, and perched it in-flight on a stand with brass tubing.

All that being a mission accomplished, this was a hard build to get into. The obvious choice for decaling is the AVG, which would make this a Tomahwak IIB, not really an American spec P-40B. Typical Revell inaccuracies, and I understand it's dated. BUT the fit problems on this peculiarly thinly molded kit was ridiculous. Maybe I've just spoiled myself, but there was no real surface contact in all the places it was desperately needed. The nose of the plane is a complete cluster of seams. I was careful in my clamping, and the cockpit and wings onto the fuselage didn't give me significant problems like others have said, but fitting the fuselage halves and the nose gun fixtures and basically all the landing gear doors front and back were more than aggravating enough to counteract that upside.

I do appreciate that the drop tank hole made an excellent spot to mount it on the tubing.

Overall, the money spent on a newer kit would be well worth it. There were more than a couple times that I regretted purchasing from Revell again after the past taught me to steer clear, and I'm not one to write off a kit for poor quality if the subject matter is worth it. I enjoy the challenges of more technical kits and I knew going in that filler was going to be a must, and I feel putting in that time and effort on any kit is always worth it, but this one definitely pushed my stance on that.

Back to ships for me. Buy a different brand P-40.

％商品名: Revell 1:48 P - 40B Tiger Shark Plastic Model Kit
レビュー内容:
I used to build models as a kid, so I am revisiting my childhood and rediscovering the fun of modeling. I also have more patience and better skill, and enjoy it more now. I decided to start with the P-40B, because I was always fascinated with planes, and the monster teeth on the P-40.

The kit is very simple, but not so easy it is like a kids toy. You can build 3 different versions, I went with the "Flying Tigers" version. It took me about 3 to 4 days, for I took my time and snipped each part well, sanded and fitted prior to cementing, and then waited for the glue to dry. I pre-painted many pieces, and then re-touched later on.

Make sure you get a "military flats" acrylic paint kit. They should be "FLAT", not "glossy"; and be browns, greens, etc., and get a nice small brush. Also, you will need an X-acto knife, sandpaper and glue. Get the kit that comes with it all. Very fun if you go slow and have patience. Well worth the price.

％商品名: Revell 1:48 P - 40B Tiger Shark Plastic Model Kit
レビュー内容: Small pieces were difficult to handle. These parts are tiny. Instructions could be clearer. All in all, this is a nice model of the P-40. I bought it to put together with my grandson. He enjoyed building it. As this was his first model, I did a lot of the work for him. I only rated it a 4 because of the instruction sheet which was difficult to follow. My grandson is 11 and I don't think he could have built this without help. It's going to be hung from his bedroom ceiling, so it meets our purposes. The model should have included a stand for an optional display mode.

％商品名: Revell 1:48 P - 40B Tiger Shark Plastic Model Kit
レビュー内容:
Terrible fit of parts, definitely NOT for a beginner.

I will probably buy this kit again, just to build it 'right' now that I know how to fix all the things that are wrong with it.

Fuselage halves fit was awful...worst I've ever seen. Took lots of putty to make it even reasonably right. Same with the wings, and those moveable flaps are a joke. I ended up cementing them in place. You'll need that clear Testors plastic glue and window maker stuff to get the canopy on, the fit is awful. Just a poor, tired old product that should be re-tooled. Warped wing part, too. If not for CA glue, clamps, and a lot of patience and experience, I would have thrown it in the trash halfway through.

％商品名: Revell 1:48 P - 40B Tiger Shark Plastic Model Kit
レビュー内容: This is one of the best models I have built yet. It went together nicely and had great detail I liked how the canopy came in one piece if you want it closed because I have had trouble with ones that have several pieces not fitting right. I also like how the flaps move on the wings. Overall it's a great model.

％商品名: 29pcs Mixed Model Trees 1.5-6 inch(4 -16 cm), OrgMemory Ho Scale Trees, Diorama Models, Model Train Scenery, Architecture Trees, Model Railroad Scenery with No Stands
タイトル: Great product for a diorama project.
レビュー内容:
We bought these for a diorama project for my daughters school project depicting Narnia. I have never bought this type of product, but I have to say for 8 bucks you get quite a selection of trees, both in number, size and type. We were able to fill up the back of a boot box with trees to create a forest and still have trees left over. We used model railroad snow to add glue to the trees to finish the effect and were able to plunge the trunks directly into a styrofoam based without any gluing.

Suffice to say the trees looked great and held together well, although a little of the "foliage" fell off with handling, but not much considering.

After my daughters project is graded, I plan to pilfer some of the trees to use with RPG miniature diaramas and bases. The size range means I can use them as anything from tall trees to bushes depending on the miniature.

I will post pictures of the different uses for these trees when I can.

％商品名: 29pcs Mixed Model Trees 1.5-6 inch(4 -16 cm), OrgMemory Ho Scale Trees, Diorama Models, Model Train Scenery, Architecture Trees, Model Railroad Scenery with No Stands
タイトル: My Review Because The Seller Really Wanted Feedback (i luv u bb ;J)
レビュー内容:
So I can't show a picture of it atm, but I can tell you what these are and what I've done with them:

They're miniature tress made of plastic. If you're in the neighborhood for something to spice up your board games, then definitely buy these. I bought them specifically for Warhammer 40k matches, and they're serving the emperor well. I bought plastic, figure bases to go alongside these, and drilled tiny divots on top of them. By doing this, I was able to super glue the pointy ends of these on, and now they're stable as physically possible on the field of battle!

They're really good quality for what you buy. Up close, they retain their natural look, however, you will see that they're plastic. (Because they're plastic and you should expect that.) There's not a lot of options to move around branches here, and that was great for shipping. By doing this, they didn't fall apart getting here and that's all I wanted to begin with. Tree figures that don't fall apart. Just don't play with them, and I'm sure that you'll have them for years to come. Why I say you shouldn't play with them is because the leaves are the plastic you'll see on fake pine trees for Christmas celebration. I've had long experiences with these, and I know how many petals decide to just fall off. I actually started playing with a few to see if they would, but they didn't. I'm sure they'll be fine if all of them survived transit with nary a scratch. Just treat them well and they should return the favor, as with all things.

TL;DR: Use these for a hobby and expect them to be great, plastic models.

％商品名: 29pcs Mixed Model Trees 1.5-6 inch(4 -16 cm), OrgMemory Ho Scale Trees, Diorama Models, Model Train Scenery, Architecture Trees, Model Railroad Scenery with No Stands
タイトル: the various trees looked great. I'm using them for a miniatures game and ...
レビュー内容:
I received the shipment very quickly which is always a positive. They arrived in a small container (roughly 6"x6"x4") which means that they were pressed together inside. That made some of the trees either bent or pushed the branches into the trunk. I was concerned at first but they quickly relaxed and assumed their normal tree-like shape. Once settled, the various trees looked great. I'm using them for a miniatures game and they fill the background woods roll perfectly. I'm not sure how it would have changed the look but an epoxy coating or even hairspray might have been a nice touch.
The packaging wasn't an issue as mentioned above but I have noticed that the "leaves" tend to fall off when handled. I'm sure this is fine when simply used for mock-ups but as discussed, I move these around often. Would have rated 5 otherwise.

％商品名: 29pcs Mixed Model Trees 1.5-6 inch(4 -16 cm), OrgMemory Ho Scale Trees, Diorama Models, Model Train Scenery, Architecture Trees, Model Railroad Scenery with No Stands
タイトル: Good quality, works awesome for tabletop games
レビュー内容:
I bought these for terrain use in Tabletop gaming (specifically Dungeons and Dragons). As stated, they do not come with bases, but it was easy enough to make some out of clay and glue them in. Sounds like other people on here were able to just push them into some craft foam.
A couple of the trunks and branches were a little bent, but still very use-able (otherwise would have been 5 stars). The amount of leaves "shedding" off the trees seems alarming, but I certainly don't have any noticeable bald spots. I was actually able to save the shedded parts and use them as underbrush on my new bases. I think shedding is only natural with these sorts of minis, and once the loose stuff has fallen, the rest seems to be staying on fine. I may trying spraying some to see if it helps
Here's a picture of them with some standard 1" miniatures for scale. I haven't made bases for the smaller trees yet. Please note that I made the bases and painted the black stripes on the "birch" trees, so they are not accurate to how the product arrives.

％商品名: Estes Hi-Flier Flying Model Rocket Kit
レビュー内容:
This rocket is built for speed and for height. It is small with a very durable fin system. It is not a difficult rocket to make and it will take you about an hour to make it - depending on glue drying time. Everything about it is designed to minimize weight without sacrificing strength so it can go fast and high.
It has a streamer rather than a parachute which is a good thing because of the height it attains. With a parachute it could very well sail off quite a distance from your launch zone.
I like the solid fin system. They are stronger than normal. I found the recommended painting scheme to be a bit too much, even though I did it by the suggested way. You might just want to spray paint the whole thing one solid color.
Nice little rocket, cheap and fast.
Remember that this is just a rocket. You still have to purchase engines, wadding and a launcher if you are just starting out in the hobby.

レビュー内容: The hi-flyer lives up to its name, a bit too well! I put it together so carefully and painted it this cool yellow on black pattern. Unable to constrain myself I loaded a C6 and launched. I barely saw it go up, and never saw it again. Great model and a real thrill, just don't put too much effort into it!

％商品名: Estes Hi-Flier Flying Model Rocket Kit
タイトル: Awesome rocket! Took it out today for the first ...
レビュー内容: Awesome rocket! Took it out today for the first time, a little cold and no wind. First launch we did was with a B4 and it went up high. Second launch was with a B6 and good lord it went up there and almost went out of sight. On our third launch we wanted to push the envelope a little and launched it with a C6, well it's gone. It just kept going. My 8 year old son and I couldn't believe how high and fast this little rocket went out of sight. Well I just bought another for us to build and we both said we won't use a C6 again, a B4 or B6 is plenty of engine for this thing. It takes off fast and climbs quick.

タイトル: Made it with my daughter and was a fun project with her (age 7)
レビュー内容: Simple but very lightweight rocket. Made it with my daughter and was a fun project with her (age 7), we used CA glue and painted it lightly. I tried 3 estes motors and found they were unreliable due to inadequate igniters, I had a pack of Quest motors, and it worked first try, unfortunately it was a c6-0 motor and it went straight up into the clouds never to be seen again, even with no wind. We were impressed by the launch and it was worth one launch, multiple cars stopped at the road to watch it go up due to large smoke plume.

レビュー内容: I got this for a friends kids birthday and we had so much fun building and launching them. You have to buy the engines and wadding and launch pad but if this is something you want to do, buy a bulk package and go have fun.

％商品名: Estes Hi-Flier Flying Model Rocket Kit
レビュー内容: No engine clip which was annoying, this caused the engine to blow itself out rather than deploying the recovery system, because of the weighted nose the rocket free fell and imbedded itself about four inches into frozen ground. Don't know if I got a faulty kit or if the problem is wide spread. Other than that, it was great!

This is actually 2 2.5oz bags one each of red and blue and 4 .5oz bags one each of the other colors. ％商品名: USS Missouri BB-63 US Navy Battleship RC Marine Warship 1/250 Military Model Boat by POCO DIVO
タイトル: Fun Boat - Maneuvers Very Well - Tight Turns
レビュー内容: This is a fun boat, but there are a couple of tips that might be helpful. The only directions are on the bottom of the box. Don't forget to look for the little bag containing the two cannons that install at the stern near the helicopter. Also, the directions describe two vents, one at the rear, forward of the helicopter, and one at the bow. These are to release vapor after use. I haven't seen the need for this, but you may wonder what those are for. To the rear of the helicopter are two sensors. Place your thumb over those and the remote will operate the boat for the purpose of testing. Otherwise, when the boat is in the water, the boat will operate. The remote has two controls, one for each propeller. Both forward and the boat goes straight. Using only one will steer the boat, however, one forward and the other in reverse will make it do tight turns. It's very responsive. Also, it seems fairly watertight, but I did notice some water coming out of the stern at those two sensors. So after I use it, I tilt it up to see if any water will drain. The battery does not have any charging indication, so I don't know how long it takes to fully charge. The directions say 5-6 hours. The directions also say it will operate for 20 minutes. I suppose that's continuous use, which means longer otherwise. I've played with it for nearly 40 minutes. There is no low battery warning, but when the speed begins to get slower, there's still plenty of charge to bring it in. I've not run out of range. It's quite enjoyable - a fun boat!

％商品名: Estes Alpha III Rocket Launch Set
タイトル: Would be 5-star with the pictured launch pad
レビュー内容:
As others have mentioned, they swapped out the launch pad in the picture with a lower end, but acceptable, launch pad. But it really does come with most everything you need as a starter kit except the consumables. Here's what you'll need to fly:

Glue
Scissors
Pencil
A small sharp knife (like an exacto)
A 9V battery
A pack of standard Estes motors (I suggest: A8-5, B6-6, C6-7)
A pack of igniters (usually comes with the Estes motors)
A pack wadding (special tissue-like paper that goes between the motor and the chute)

My son and I were able to assemble everything in an hour or two (using gel crazy glue for fast drying). It was really easy if you carefully read the directions.

WARNING TO CALIFORNIANS: Please, please, PLEASE be aware of the laws in CA for launching rockets. You need explicit permission of your local fire marshal and the property owner as well as meeting a bunch of other laws. In practice that means you'll probably need to find a rocket club with launching privileges to be able to launch legally. Many launch illegally without a problem, but please note it is a $1000 fine for EACH launch if a cop decides to nail you. There are horror stories of unaware parents getting multi-thousand dollar fines as a cop watched as they launched a handful of times without incident from the local park. It's up to you if you want to take the risk, but I'd hate for people to be unaware of how pricey the risk they are taking could be.

％商品名: Estes Alpha III Rocket Launch Set
レビュー内容: Fantastic product!! I have a 7 and 5 year old girls who absolutely loved it. Putting it together was relatively simple. I supervised the construction and it took them about two hours to put it together over a couple of days. The 7 year old did the bulk of the work and the only reason we spread the work over a two-day period is because we had to wait for the paint to dry (cheap spray paint for our first project). I did a little research beforehand and purchased the engines and wadding at the same time we purchased the kit, so we had everything available when it was time to launch. For about $50 bucks total we had a great time. The Estes website offers lesson plans free of charge which enabled me to confidently discuss some basic concepts with the girls. They really enjoyed it! Moreover, we set up assigned launch positions, rotated them around, and they loved the entire launch production. We used two different engines and both worked great. Two A8-3 engines to start out, then we switched to a B6-2. They loved both. Naturally the B6-2 was a bit more exciting due to the extra altitude achieved. As a dad who is gently nudging his girls towards STEM related subjects, this was great. We spend quality time building it, and had a “blast” launching it!

％商品名: Estes Alpha III Rocket Launch Set
タイトル: I forgot how much fun model rocketry is
レビュー内容: My 6 year-old and I had fun putting the rocket together Christmas morning (she dropped the Shopkins for the rocket), and after picking up some motors at the local hobby shop, we went to a local field and let 'er rip. Four launches and four successful recoveries later, and we're looking forward to building bigger and more intricate rockets. Can't wait for spring (or another good freeze).

％商品名: Estes Alpha III Rocket Launch Set
レビュー内容: Grandson & I put this together in an hour or so even though the instructions are not all that great. Can't see it lasting for a year as after a half dozen launches the cardboard is starting to get soft and pliable and the nose cone getting looser. It does get up and go and the company was very quick in replacing the defective launcher that came with the original package.It does go high enough that you need a large field to shoot in. Any wind at all will make it drift quite a ways.

％商品名: Estes Alpha III Rocket Launch Set
レビュー内容: The rocket is more or less the starter model... just push everything together, glue on the guide tube and the parachute and stick on some stickers and you are ready to fly. My 8 year old loved it and everything worked perfectly. Don't forget to order engines and parachute wadding. Also don't be surprised if your kid gets addicted and wants you to build a 4' tall multistage rocket next!

％商品名: Estes Alpha III Rocket Launch Set
レビュー内容: Nephew thoroughly enjoys shooting rockets with this kit. The only downfall of this kit is the cheaply made launch controller. Launch rating with this controller was about 40% and that was after it blew out the igniters without launching the rocket.. We went out and bought the Estes E Launch Controller and haven't had a misfire yet on 6 launches and no burn outs. The Alpha III rocket was easy to assemble and climbs to incredible heights. Loads of fun for the entire family!

％商品名: Estes Alpha III Rocket Launch Set
タイトル: Great for first time rocket builders
レビュー内容: Everything you need for the beginner. Go ahead and buy some of the larger engines for future flights but be sure to go to a wide open area to launch because the larger engines will make it travel probably 3 times the distance.

％商品名: Estes Alpha III Rocket Launch Set
レビュー内容: all worked well!

％商品名: Estes Alpha III Rocket Launch Set
タイトル: Launch system does NOT include electron beam launch controller & porta-pad II launch pad!
レビュー内容: Even though the picture shows the electron beam launch controller & porta-pad II launch pad, and the description lists it as the Launch system included, it is NOT. I comes with the inferior Astron II Launch Pad and Astron II Launch Controller. I called Amazon and returned this item and asked Amazon to update the picture and description to reflect the inferior parts included.

％商品名: Estes Alpha III Rocket Launch Set
タイトル: Do yourself and your kids a favor and get an Estes kit today!
レビュー内容: I grew up doing model rockets. I have recently gotten back into it with my 2 year-old son and 4 year old daughter. What a great way to spend a few hours on the weekend. The kids love watching the rockets launch and then chasing them down. Estes is still the easiest way to get started. This kit is an easy an introduction and starter to model rocketry. Do yourself and your kids a favor and get it today!

％商品名: Estes Alpha III Rocket Launch Set
タイトル: Beware - now includes newer, less capable launch pad
レビュー内容: Estes is now providing the newer and cheaper Astron II launch pad and controller instead of the Porta-Pad II launch pad and Electron Beam Controller shown in the picture. The Porta-Pad II can be expanded with a 3/16" MAXI rod for launching mid-size rockets, but the Astron II CANNOT, meaning the Astron II launch pad can't grow with you. The part number on the package (001427) did not change. Still a good kit, but not nearly the deal it used to be.

％商品名: Estes Alpha III Rocket Launch Set
レビュー内容: This kit will provide you with everything you will need, except engines, to get into the sport of model rocketry. The set up is very easy. A saturday afternoon is all you should need to complete it. I send this kit to friends with kids very often to get them interested in the hobby. Everyone seems to love it.
